links_reviews_text: Thought it would look cuter but it was pretty normal once I put it on (nothing special). Overall, fit true to size and was pretty comfortable.
I didn't want to send this one back. The material is fantastic and it's seriously so stylish!
Runs on loos fit side, great leopard print, not a warm sweater, but pretty, long sleeves, longer then average
Great comfy sweater. Nice thick fabric. Worn to work
The material was not itchy but just not comfortable without another layer between. I didn't end up wearing but it is a fun pattern.

I think you could size down in this - it was a little more oversized on me than on the model. Heavier weight material, so I think this would be pretty warm, and there's definitely room for a layer. I didn't wind up wearing it but I'd consider it again when it's colder.

I rented this sweater for a trip to Europe in mid-December. It was so comfortable and fit me perfectly (sometimes I have problem with length due to being 5'10). I then wore the sweater to work and for Christmas dinner before returning it. Very tempted to buy it, although I ultimately didn't. One of my favorite rentals!

I wore to work. It felt soft in comparison to other sweaters. I was comfortable in a M but I could have sized down. I am 5"5' and wear a 6/8. I didn't realize there was also green in this sweater. I loved it.
Cute oversized fit -- I wore it multiple times. Great weight and texture.
Roomy sweater that looks great dressed up or down. Fabric was a little irritating to me but could be a personal preference.
I would normally wear a medium, but got a large for the oversize look. I paired with with leather leggings which worked great with boots!
Loved the style and fit of this sweater!
Rented for a trip to Charleston. Loved this summery dress. Only thing I remember being funky was the top part was a little loose around the cut out, but overall will definitely rent again!
Wore this to Hawaii and I love this dress! Does run a bit big imo. And wrinkles easily

Runs at least 1 size small. I'm normally a true 6 and sized up to the 8. I have a large rib cage and small bust. Did not need to wear a bra! Wore to dinner date in Maui and was very comfortable, even in the heat. Great quality, adjustable straps, buttons are functional and reinforced with hidden snaps which was a bonus. Great rental!

links_reviews_title: Runs small; cute but not the most flattering
links_reviews_text: Cute dress, but runs small so size up. The material isn't flexible, so if you have a bust, be prepared for the snaps to unsnap constantly (don't worry, it'll still stay closed with the buttons). Didn't love where it hit me on the leg, as it wasn't the most flattering, but still cute.
This dress was so cute ! Loved the material an pattern. A+ for curvy girls

This dress fit perfectly. Straps are adjustable-- great for tall girls. Lots of reviews mention the fabric being wrinkly-- it's linen, so that's to be expected. I didn't find it to be an issue. The print is super cute. It was comfortable and breathable for vacation in the keys. Loved it
Rented this for a party and it was very comfortable linen material. Dress was just the right length, not too short. I had to pin in the underarm because the bust was too big but skirt fit great!

links_reviews_title: Super light and comfortable summer dress!
links_reviews_text: Loved that there were little clasps between the buttons to fasten so gapping did not happen.

links_reviews_title: Super cute and fun for an Italian vacation!
links_reviews_text: Beware of the buttons/odd placement. Other than that, VERY light, airy and all around adorable.

The buttons have supporting snaps to help things stay out, but they wouldn't stay closed it was so tight. I wear an 8 and got a 10, will try the 12. Pattern and fabric is beautiful linen -- bummed it didn't work out.
Fit and material were 100. It was incredibly comfortable and fun dress for my friend's bachelorette.
Runs slightly small so size up. Wore it on a very hot day and it was light and comfortable while still being a very cute dress. Felt great in it.

links_reviews_title: So so cute but wrinkles when you breathe!
links_reviews_text: This dress just like everyone has said is adorable!! I sized up per reviews and it really did fit perfect for me in a size 6 (I'm between a 4/6) I didn't wear a bra and felt comfortable as the straps are adjustable. My 34b/c chest fit with some room to spare. The waist and hip room was perfect felt fitted but not tight I have about 28 inch waist and 36 inch hips. The cut out was petite and perfectly placed on trend. I will take this on vacation in Arizona and I think it will be good in the very hot weather as I wore it today in about 85 degrees and felt good. Literally the only con is that it wrinkled as soon as I stepped into it, after steaming it even. It's cute how it buttons but also snaps for extra secureness. The wrinkles almost looked like they went with the dress so it ended up not being too bad to me. I'm glad I have this all month I will get lots of use out of it! I paired it with a nude pair of wedge sandals. Hubby loves it.

I wore this dress to an outdoor event in 100 degree weather. The linen material was perfect, although wrinkly. My particular dress arrived a bit wrinkly, too. I am usually a 6, and ordered the 8 as a backup. It did not come, and while I could wear the 6, I might have preferred the 8. It did stretch a bit as the day progressed. It has little silver clasps in between the buttons, but mine kept coming unsnapped. Overall a great dress with a fun pattern and flattering.

Rented for a girl's weekend and got lots of compliments from strangers. There are POCKETS! It's held together with little snaps to supplement the buttons and even though it was NWT when I got it, a snap right below the boob area popped off. I don't know how this will hold up to wear and tear. Definitely size up - I'm usually an 8-12 but the 14 was tight and short!
Summer perfection. Husband didn't like the color with my untanned skin so I sent it back but will be renting it when it pops up again. Love the fresh print and linen fabric.

This dress was great but I would say you have to size up. I wear between a 6&8 and I loved this dress enough that I would rent again but in a 10. It was beautiful standing up but when I sat down it puckered too much. The colors are beautiful and fun.

links_reviews_title: Just okay - amazing pattern but tight fit!
links_reviews_text: This dress is so pretty but it runs small - couldn't wear a bra with it either. The buttons kept popping open especially around the chest area. The pattern was soooo pretty but the fit was meh!

links_reviews_title: Orange ya glad to see this dress?
links_reviews_text: Cute but wrinkly material. I loved the orange print! It fit well but I couldn't wear bra. It was too tight with bra. No give to the fabric at all. I may have been happier with a 6 for this one.

Loved everything about this dress - the pattern, the center cutout, the fabric, the length were all perfect. HOWEVER, it definitely runs small. I'm between 4/6 and the 6 was snug, especially after a vacation feast. It has adjustable straps and extra snaps to keep it in place, and easy to wear a normal strapless bra with. Overall highly recommend with one size up!

Perfect fit! So flattering! So many compliments every time I wear this dress. It's a perfect summer dress -- so happy and chic! I've worn it to happy hours, brunch, and date night! You can dress it up or dress it down.

I liked the light fabric, bright colors, and the snaps between the buttons were a game changer. I wasn't worried about busting out or flashing anyone. It does run very small so I sized two sizes up based on reviews. I probably somewhere between sizes but didn't mind the extra room.

I got tons of compliments on this dress. The pattern is so fun and perfect for summer. I wore it for a day party. It fits true to size for the most part, but buttons were a little stretched on the chest and bottom area if you are a curvier shape. But still fit and loosened up a bit as you wear it. Overall really really cute and will rent again for another vacation!
Very charming print and and cut. The gap under the bust is pretty tame. The buttons also have little snaps in between which kept it from gapping, so handy!!

I wore this on vacation! It's a linen material so it's light weight and comfortable. It has snap enclosures in between the buttons which are nice, but one of mine kept unsnapping. I got lots of compliments on it!

Fits really well. Has little metal buttons to secure the buttons you see in the center of the dress. Linen so it'll get wrinkled but the print distracts from that. Perfect dress for brunch that could transition into a night of fun NYC style!
This dress has a really cute shape to it and has a super cute print. It's perfect for the summertime and I'll definitely rent this dress again!

This was such a cute dress and I would love to be able to rent it again. It seemed smaller than a thought, but it fit. I just had a different look in mind. Cute dress, perhaps better for a more tomboy figure and less than a curvy figure.
Flattering dress with a happy, cute print. It's very short (like too short to bend over more than a little). That said it was super cute to wear on a casual day.
It fit well in my waist and hips but It was a little tight where the little clasp at the top wouldn't stick. I am a 34DD. I am usually a 4/6 in clothes. The 6 fit
Love the dress, but I couldn't even button it up all the way because it was probably two sizes too small. I will be ordering it in a larger size!

links_reviews_title: Super cute print, but a bit on the small side.
links_reviews_text: I normally wear a 4-6, but ordered an 8 based on the reviews and I'm glad I did. It fit like a glove. I possibly could have even gone to a size 10 for some breathing room (I have a very wide rib cage). I liked the hidden snaps around the bust and waist that helped keep the fabric closed around the buttons, though I felt it could have used an additional snap around the hip area (it gaped when I sat down). Overall, it's a super cute summer dress but you MUST order a size (or two) up!

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear was too small on chest
links_reviews_text: Needed size up
perfect for brunch and walking around WV after

a little snug in the hips. The pocket placement was a little odd and the fabric was very wrinkly. Overall a very cute dress though! Has snaps to reinforce the buttons so they don't pop open in between.
The fabric did wrinkle a little and the pockets were hard to keep pressed.
Too small. Never wore it.
Cute but couldn't wear

links_reviews_title: Cute dress, shorter than I expected.
links_reviews_text: Super cute, I would definitely size up. It is shorter than I expected, but doable. Good for brunch or a party
Definitely runs small! I'm going to size up by two!
My new go to black pants. They are flattering and the satin finish adds a little flair. They ran slightly large on me in the waist, sizing down recommended. Will rent again, for sure.

links_reviews_title: Fun pants for a night out in Vegas, but some fit issues
links_reviews_text: These pants have a satin finish and were just what I wanted for a night out in Vegas. The pants were fitted, which I liked, but they also tended to slide down a bit and I had to keep hiking them up at the waist. When they did start to slide down, then they would get bunched up a bit at the ankles. Apart from those issues, the pants worked for my purpose. I think they definitely look best with heels and I wore a thong to avoid panty lines.

I sized up because theory always seems to run a little snug. Should have stuck with the 10. I loved them. Great with heels. They are satin and shiny. Can be dressed up or down. Love the ankle zippers. Totally want to buy these.

links_reviews_title: But too tight beautiful but too tight
links_reviews_text: These are beautiful pants and they are on the shiny side in fact they are shiny but beautiful. I am between a 10 and a 12 and the tan was very tight so I believe it runs small
I rented these pants for a trip to Vegas and I loved them! Great fit! Gives you the look of leather but it is a light, stretchy, and breathable fabric. Would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: These are satin pants that fit like cigarette trousers.
links_reviews_text: I didn't know when I ordered them that they were going to be so shiny, but once I put them on with a long sweater over them I fell in love. Very cute, but warning: the material is thin so if you have any bumps and bulges, they will show. It might be possible to wear spanx underneath but I never got around to that.
Nice pants but they run very long. I am 5' 3" and unable to wear these as they were 4-5 inches too long.

links_reviews_title: Amazing Pants! So chic. And comfortable. I'm in between a 4 and a 6. The 4 were a perfect fit.
links_reviews_text: They tended to stretch out just a tad bit throughout the day. Would consider buying them. Perfect pant for work, every day .

These pants surprised me. They were shiny satin which I hadn't realized. They are also extremely thin so I'd say better suited for summer/fall/spring than winter. They have nice lines but were way too long for me at 5'3.

links_reviews_title: Pants way too long to look polished
links_reviews_text: I love this look in theory but the pants were way too long to look chic, they looked baggy around the ankles
Very shiny material. They fit, but were not flattering on me.
This was soft and cozy. It's hard to find sweaters without wool in it. I could have sized down. Love the bubble sleeves and v-neck.
Bought it!

I was hoping for an oversized fit, but the sweater hit right below my waist band. It would have been cute with jeans if I wasn't pregnant, but was looking to wear over my bump with maternity jeans/leggings. Order up if you want that oversized fit.

links_reviews_title: Perfectly oversized and so so comfortable!!
links_reviews_text: I wore this like three times - it was comfortable and a great staple! I loved the sleeves.
awesome
Obsessed with this sweater! So cute and I got so many compliments.

Love this funky sweater! The sleeves were the perfect length for that cozy, slightly oversized look. I will warn that it's pretty cropped, even on my petite frame, but totally fine with high-ish waisted jeans! The colors made me happy all day!
Love this sweater and would have purchased if it were a lower cost. I went with Medium and I'm glad I did. It's cropped and small would probably have been too short.
High quality, comfortable cropped sweater. Fashionable oversized look for petites! Color is so unique and the contrasting ivory collar took it up another notch. Would rent again!

Loved this sweater. Thick and warm so didn't need jacket. Super cool color. Wore a couple of Times. Once with black jeans and once with blue and looked great both times. Not "sexy" by any means but cozy and comfortable and chic as hell. I could have gotten I small probably but I liked the baggy look of the sleeves and wouldn't want it too tight on my neck.
Awesome color and really well made. Wore with a navy pencil skirt to offset the boxy shape.

Received multiple compliments on the color of this sweater and wore it multiple times. The knit is really pretty close up and comprised of a variety of subtle colors. It is very soft and comfortable and definitely warm. I am petite so did not find the cut to be too short, though it is boxy (see pic), but I liked it. Looked great with jeans! It arrived a little pilled but was easy to remove the more egregious pilling. Swapping for a few new pieces but will rent again in the future.

I LOVED wearing this sweater!! It's your RTR dream - something I'd never purchase in a store, otherwise would never wear, received a million compliments and now wish I owned it! The sweater is a crop top. It hit me right at the waist line of my higher waisted jeans. I wore a navy tank under it so that when I lifted my arms you didn't see my stomach. The sleeves were a good length (I've noticed they tend to run long on me).
fab sleeves and cropped waist fit. unique color adds a pop to any look. super cozy and comfortable.

I actually got a handful of compliments on this sweater which reminds me of a puke green but it works for some reason. It is cropped so I wore a white tank underneath but it's super warm and cozy. My fav part is the contrasting white neckline!

links_reviews_title: Take a chance on this color!!!
links_reviews_text: This sweater is so beautiful and soft! Don't let the fear of wearing yellow/green stop you! The ivory around the collar was very flattering. I loved this sweater and got soooo many compliments!

I sized up so the sweater wouldn't be too cropped- normally I would get a small but opted for the Medium. I liked the fit! Was perfect with high wasted jeans and wasn't too short. It's a soft sweater and really unique color! Was a fun piece to brighten up my wardrobe!
Nothing special about this...but it was warm and cozy and perfect for daily wear in winter. I'm normally a small but sized up to a medium bc I like my sweaters roomy.
This sweater is much more cropped than it shows in the photo. I wasn't able to wear it because it didn't work since it was more cropped than I was expecting.
Such a comfortable sweater! The color is bright and the knit is so soft, could easily dress it up or down depending on the occasion. I received so many compliments when I wore it!

links_reviews_title: Loved this. Color is unexpected, but works (even with my pale skin).
links_reviews_text: XS was a bit too cropped to wear to work but great for weekends

Love the color and feel of this sweater but the length and sleeves are super cropped. I wore it over a denim shirt because I didn't have any pants high-waisted enough to cover my midriff in this sweater. I would definitely get more use out of this if it fit better - give it a shot if you're more petite than me!

Perfect length for petites if you size down a size. If it wasn't $$$ I would definitely purchase. Also, my garment came with a small stain that I couldn't help notice every time I wore it. It didn't stop me from wearing it, though! Super cozy and warm! The model in the pics is wearing a size too big for her. Size down and you'll be set!

Adored this sweater and was terribly sad to have to part with it. Extremely flattering and well made. I was worried the green might be too bright but it was beautiful in person. Very comfortable and cozy. I dressed it up a couple nights with heels but was also able to wear it with jeans and casual flats. Would rent again.
As usual, Tibi doesn't disappoint. This was a heavier weight than I expected (in a good way) and was super soft and cozy to wear. The color was fun and unexpected – would rent again!

links_reviews_title: This is such a cute sweater, especially when paired with high waisted jeans.
links_reviews_text: The fit on this is perfect, and the sleeves are a great length!
This was a heavy sweater but very comfy on. The color is great. It's a little shorter than it appears in the pictures, so high waisted pants are mandatory.

links_reviews_title: Rented this for day to day.
links_reviews_text: Too much of a crop top, unable to wear.

I know the description says cropped and I was expecting it to be cropped but the length still caught me off guard. The boxy fit was great, I definitely could've sized up to the medium so some more length and a fit more like what's seen on the model. Four stars because this sweater was very much pilling and I'd expect better from a designer piece with such a high retail price!

links_reviews_title: Great color, much more cropped than expected
links_reviews_text: I'm normally 2/4 and Would size up to M next time

links_reviews_title: loved the color- got a lot of compliments :)
links_reviews_text: loved the color- got a lot of compliments :)
The color is a bit more green in person than in the pictures which I actually liked a lot.
Great piece would rent again. Cropped so even though it was oversized everywhere else I couldn't have sized down for length.

links_reviews_title: There's a white colar at the top and the color is a little bit more green. It was very heavy.
links_reviews_text: It fit just really heavy and the fabric was itchy.
Color is fun but the fit is awkward.

links_reviews_title: BEAUTIFUL fabric (SO SOFT!), amazing colors, perfect fall sweater
links_reviews_text: I wore this for an outing with my boyfriend's family. Everyone was so impressed by how different the colors were in this sweater. It has some orange threads weaving through the green and makes for a truly beautiful texture. The collar reminded me a bit of RBG but that only made me love it even more.
Got lots of compliments - soft, easy to wear. Loved it

links_reviews_title: Of all the LBD's I've loved before
links_reviews_text: Super cute and function black dress that made me feel like a 'working girl'. Size up!! IDK why Victoria thinks I'm a 10, but whatever

links_reviews_title: Runs very small. I typically wear a Small or XS and I could barely get a 6 on.
links_reviews_text: Arms are very tight and are a non-stretch fabric.
Really small around my bust and hips, but was cute anyway.
It fits but I agree with other reviewers that the pockets don't add anything unless you're straight up and down skinny. On the shorter side too
Loved the dress but the arms are very small. I lift weights and this dress is definitely not cut for an athletic body.

Agree with others who said this runs very small - I could barely get it on, and the top of the dress was so tight that I needed help taking it off (the sleeves are also super tight/seem to be made for very thin arms..), I did like the style though, so will size up next time (I think an 8 or even 10 could be okay, and I'm usually a 0..)

links_reviews_title: Dress runs very small and short.
links_reviews_text: Dress runs very small. I should have read the previous review carefully. You will need to size up 2 maybe 3 sizes up. Also, it is very short. No way could I have worn it to work even if it had fit.

links_reviews_title: Very cute, but the bottoms up top can come undone! Also, definitely need fashion tape

links_reviews_text: Loved this dress. Wore with black tights and booties to work. Dress looks expensive and front of the skirt/ pockets are a cool detail. Fit is slightly small, especially in the arms but still fit fine and was cute enough to not bother me. I'm also short, so length was fine on me but might not be as work appropriate on someone much taller. All in all, I loved it! Would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Super sleek dress, great for work!
links_reviews_text: Based on the reviews, I sized up to a 14 (I'm normally between an 8-10) but I think I would've been fine with a size 12. The dress itself was made with a thicker material than I expected, which was nice because I wore it in the dead of winter. This would definitely look more flattering if you're tall and lean (think VB...), otherwise if you're short like me, I recommend wearing the dress with some heels to help make it fall a bit more flatteringly.
The Dress is great, but runs very small. I wear a 4 in most US dresses, and the 8 fit like it was a 2. So my recommendation is to size up. Way up!!

links_reviews_title: Felt very powerful in this little dress!
links_reviews_text: Fit was a little snug on the hips- but otherwise very flattering. I have a wider rib cage up at my bust, so I had issues with the buttons gaping open-an issue fixed with a little hem tape! This dress is extremely versatile, the fabric is soft and forgiving. Can dress up, down, punk, etc.

This dress is so pretty and the fabric is amazing BUT the sleeves on this dress belong to a dress a size smaller. The dress fit perfectly from everywhere but the arms, I couldn't go up a size bigger because it would be too loose around my chest and hips. If planning on wearing this dress I would recommend ordering a few days before just in case you have the same issue.

links_reviews_title: Too tight on the thighs and butt
links_reviews_text: Cute dress but couldn't wear since just a little too tight on the hips and butt (I wear size 31 jeans) and arms were tight but I would have worn it if it wasn't so tight in the thighs.

It is a little on the shorter side (I have long legs); however, I felt comfortable wearing it to work since I wore textured tights with it. The button at my desk didn't lay right and would pop open, but I wore it with a scarf around my neck to hide the "gap".

links_reviews_title: Way too short (although I am tall at 6'1") but also super shapeless. Not flattering just boxy.
links_reviews_text: Way too short (although I am tall at 6'1") but also super shapeless. Not flattering just boxy. Definitely size down. This felt big and boxy on me. If you are in between sizes go for the smaller size, but I just found this so unimpressive. Totally Meh. Sending back without wearing.

I was so excited this look was available to rent with the matching top. I paired it with a stretchy sock heel boot and loved the track pants styled this way. Super urban chic and a great matching set for a Friday at work or weekend in the city.

I wore these in so many different ways. Dressed em "up" for a basketball game. Loved them for throwing on over workout clothes on a cold day. Wore em to the airport because they're super comfy. Wore em to brunch for a casual street wear look. Every time got a lot of looks and felt like the best dressed person in the room. I recommend a tight top with an over sized jacket and dad sneakers. Want to keep!!
This is what RTR is all about. Wearing some hip outfit from some hot designer that even if I could afford, would be sold out! Loved wearing this outfit!!!

These were so comfortable. They look and feel very high end, people straight up told me they looked expensive. I wore them 3 times - to work, for a run on the Golden Gate Bridge, then to an EDM concert.

An elevated jogger! I wore it as a set and got compliments all night. I even considered keeping these as they're such a great every day pant. I'm typically a 27/28 in jeans and would normally go for a M in pants like this, but the S actually fit fine! You can size up or down depending on how loose you want them.
A little on the short side, will ride up to Capri length when you walk. Stiff material. Edgy, recommended!
Loved the detail/look of these track pants but they ran large on me!

Perfect for a weekend athleisure look. I paired with a cropped hoodie as shown but not the same brand. Super cute, but the pants hit higher up on my leg than expected given the look on the model who I assume has longer legs than my 5'5" self. More like a capri length.
I wore this as a set with the matching top. They fit so well. It was a simple look but very cool. I felt super comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Large and pink- the perfect statement piece
links_reviews_text: These earrings , despite their size, don't weigh too heavy and pair nicely with clothing due to their neutral colors. Very fun to play with and a wonderful resin texture you'll want to examine all over
Huge earrings. I did not wear them, they looked ridiculously large on my ears. However, if you're looking for a statement piece, these earrings were very light when trying on!

I rented this dress for work. I work in fashion in a resort town, so easy breezy dresses are perfect. Wore it once with full coverage wedges & once with Frye campus boots. Sleeves look best rolled up IMO, but I wore them both ways. It's flattering & well-made & low-key sexy.
Be careful on windy days I'm 511 and it's short but works great!
I loved this!

links_reviews_title: Hello? Did no one else have issues with the neckline?!
links_reviews_text: Pretty color, nice embroidery but seriously? The front opening approached my belly button! I didn't expect that at all. I probably could have worn with a tank underneath and leggings to make it work, but instead, I sent it back unworn.
It's a cute dress but protect yourself in windy conditions as it will expose you

links_reviews_title: Bold color and easy to wear
links_reviews_text: Super comfy dress that can dress up or down.
Great color for olive skin tones! I have a booty and this dress served its duty - to make me look hawt! If you're curvy it will be a bit short . Loved it
This dress is really beautiful, but pretty short! It was also tight through the bust area for me.
Great fit and easy to wear. Didn't wrinkle like I thought it would which was a relief.

Perfect for a cool, sunny, spring day at the office. I wore this dress with regular bikini briefs and no lines were visible. This fluttery and airy masterpiece is perfect for a business casual work day and also a fun date night! Fit was perfect and true to my curvier figure.

links_reviews_title: Is it supposed to be baggy?
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a birthday party but I'm not sure if I loved it. I can't decide if it's supposed to be really baggy or if I should have sized down. I'm sure it would have been more flattering without pants, but It was a cold night! May try renting again closer to summer.

I rented this to wear to work and then to a dinner afterwards. This dress is super comfortable and definitely easy to wear (very lightweight). It's the kind of dress that you can put on and then just go about your day. I didn't have to worry about it being too short, too constricting/limiting, etc. The sleeves are a little long - but I prefer that compared to having sleeves that are too short (granted I have long arms). I wore in the winter with tights, but I plan to rent again in the spring when the weather is nicer.
I'm 8 months pregnant so this was more of a tunic for me that I wore with leggings. It was very pretty and comfortable. It did seem true to size. I ended up wearing a bralette underneath.

Fits well. A little short- I'm 5'6" and couldn't lift my arms up without showing off my underwear. Was great for a date night, but might be difficult to pull off if you have to bend over or lift children at an event. Very comfortable. Lace detail is very pretty. Hangs perfectly without being baggy, fitted throughout the chest and loose elsewhere.

This dress is designed to be loose and flows beautifully. The color is a beautiful shade of red and I wore red lipstick too. Got many compliments all day. It's a great dress to rent, and not own because it is such a statement piece. One of my best rentals. Loved it!

links_reviews_title: Perfect to wear on Valentine Day.
links_reviews_text: Material is a bit too thin. It's more of a spring or fall dress.
Fits true to size and is super adorable. The red color is bold. I got a bunch of compliments. Definitely stand out in this piece!
Everything about this was perfect. At 5'11, it is definitely not a dress- luckily it paired nicely with jeans!
I wore this for my bridal shower and it was a hit! Amazing color. The sleeves were a bit long. The hips were tighter than I expected for a shift dress.
Incredibly flattering. Lightweight material, plan to layer. If you have a larger chest this isn't right for you
Love this dress. Super comfortable and can dress up or down.

links_reviews_title: Awesome dress for a nice lunch out!
links_reviews_text: Soft fabric, comfortable fit but flattering and girly. Loved it!!

links_reviews_title: Yes, this was a few sizes to big, and yes I wore it anyway.
links_reviews_text: I picked this for a Thursday night downtown. The plan? Meet my grown daughter for a drink and chat before heading to The Public with my partner. I'm thinking over jeans, under a sweater, with platform boots and hoops.

links_reviews_title: Easy to dress up or down but too big for me
links_reviews_text: Beautiful and very comfortable dress but it was just a little too big for me. It fit perfectly through the shoulders and arms (I have broad shoulders and long arms for my frame) but the actual bodice hung just a little too loosely. Still a great dress and would definitely recommend - easy to dress up or down too! I was planning on wearing it with a pair of Chuck's and a leather jacket.
I wore this as a shirt with leggings and boots for work and it was adorable!
Sleeves were a little long but fit great otherwise. A little short, but fine for a party. I'd size up if you want it more flowy.
Dress fits nice and looks cute, but it is way too low cut. I pinned the dress, but probably should have worn a tank under
Normally wear a size 2 or 4 but ordered a 6 because I am 13 weeks pregnant. Fit was great and received many complements
If you're busty like me, it's a no go! Otherwise if you are as full chested it would work!

links_reviews_title: I sized up and it was STILL too small!
links_reviews_text: I recommend going two sizes up. The invisible zipper is really tough to finagle.

links_reviews_title: Flattering, easy to dress up or down
links_reviews_text: Dress fit true to size, slightly tight in the arms and the sleeves were a little long. Long enough to wear to work with flats (I am 5'6) and could easily transition into a date night dress. Overall, would wear this dress again!
This is a nice light summer dress but it is very boho, and looks a bit sloppy. And the sleeves are way too long.
It was too large in the chest and shoulders and I have DDs

links_reviews_title: No event. Just worn to look nice.
links_reviews_text: Great fit. Very comfortable. Arms a bit long.

links_reviews_title: Arms way too long, unflattering in general
links_reviews_text: I wanted to love this, but even with my very long arms the arms of this dress/tunic were ridiculously too long.

links_reviews_title: I didn't wear this dress. The sleeves were super long and the fit was off.
links_reviews_text: Sleeves are very long, the dress is not good for curvey petite women.

Wore this dress to work then dinner and a concert. Was comfortable while sitting at my desk and not too hot for an outdoor concert. Was maybe a little too short on me for work but I received many compliments! Love this dress!!
Love this dress. It was the perfect dress for work and then straight into after work drinks. I wore it with black chunky boots. It gave me the exact boho vibe I was looking for.

I loved this! I wore it with leggings and booties and it was so cute and I felt very comfortable in it and got many compliments. I would have bought if it wasn't for a major defect in the back where the zipper bunches up or something and comes out like a big hump in the middle of your back. It is also way too short to not wear with full leggings under (at least for me) and as summer is starting, I'll have to wait until fall/winter to order again if I do. Wish the back could be fixed and it would be perfect!
Sleeves are super long. I ended up pinning them to make it look less ridiculous. The top is see through. I wanted to love this but it didn't meet expectations.
Loved this dress! Wish it wasn't as see thru in the bodice but it's fine. Very classy and a little edge. I paired it with tights and booties.
This dress does not look like it is expensive. Very thin and see through on top. The cuff detail was a little too accentuated for me.
LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS DRESS

Rented this for a work event and adore it. But ordered a size bigger thinking it would be fine a little bigger (and it was all that was available) but thank god I did! This runs super super slim, size up 2 sizes- I usually can wear a 2 in my tops because I'm smaller on top and this 8 was SNUG
Such a great fit. One of my favorite rentals.
I plan on renting these again but I'll get the size down. They are so comfortable and go with lots of things!!
They fit great, very comfortable. Will be keeping these for awhile!

links_reviews_title: I love the button-up instead of a zipper!
links_reviews_text: Such cute jeans! I am kind of short so they hit right at my ankle but would also be so cute if they were a little cropped. I've already worn them a couple of times and they go with everything
Perfect high waist. Didnt gap at the back and held shape throughout the day. Love them.
These are grey jeans with the perfect amount of stretch. They are extremely comfortable! I was going to buy, but, missed out on the one day sale and then just couldn't do it.

links_reviews_title: These were really comfortable with nice stretch and higher waist.
links_reviews_text: I liked these pants-- super comfortable as they have a good amount of stretch to them. But because of that i felt that they stretched out a bit quickly and they didn't look as flattering as when i first put them on. They are a bit long for "ankle' pants, so looked better with higher boots. Not my favorite, but totally fine.
Really liked this to add to my rotation of everyday comfy jeans. I would have purchased but they have just a little too much stretch. Will size down next time
Stretchiest jeans ever. They definitely became a little loose. Loved the front buttons but they did seem a bit bulky.
Great fit, trendy, versatile

links_reviews_title: Didn’t fit me great but jeans are hard for my body type.
links_reviews_text: Fits loose and stretches through the day. I probably should have sized down. It was cute but won’t wear again.
Loved style and color and fit, but unfortunately one button was missing, so I didn't get to wear it.
Don't want to give these back. So soft and comfortable- very flattering and the color is great. I get compliments every time I wear them.

links_reviews_title: On trend wash that goes with everything.
links_reviews_text: Generous fit- probably could have sized down.
They don't really run big but are VERY stretchy. Size down.
Very nice fit, Although they felt a bit big. Very stretchy and extremely comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Runs true to jean size and is very stretchy!
links_reviews_text: RTR recommended a size 30 (I'm usually a size 10 in pants but a 28-29 in jeans-Though I find jeans from RTR to run a bit small). These were too big! They are very stretchy and were falling down within a couple of hours. Also found them to be a strange length. I have short legs, but even for crops, these were quite long. Definitely stick to your regular jeans size, or even down one. Material is nice.
great fit comfy and flattering!
These were very comfortable and the fabric was a great thickness with just the right amount of stretch.

I loved these jeans. Even though they were a size big, they were super comfortable and I didn't mind the fit. Ideally, I would've worn a 29. I probably would've bought them if they were a 29. I wore the 4 times, ankles cuffed. Super cute.

The pants looked as shown and were good quality. The problem: They were much longer than I expected (I'm 5'6"). I was hoping that they would hit at my ankles like they do on the model (they are titled "Ankle Jeans" after all), but they hit about an inch past the top of my sneakers, making them look like boot-cut jeans. I tried folding the ends up but that didn't work either: The legs are too wide to be cuffed.

Very soft, loads of stretch. My first time wearing this brand and I really like them. True to size. Really easy to wear. Button up. These were a brand new pair. I could be tempted to buy.... great staple item.
It's silk with nice textured material. I went up a size based on some reviews but this is more TTS.
Wore it working from home. High quality, unique fabric, great fit and pretty neckline.

I really liked this blouse- so different from my usual. The only Astros were gorgeous and I felt so posh knowing how $$$ it was. But I'd never pay that... wore with black and gray slacks. Has nice stretch.
Loved the material and fit. The lining did stick out further than the shirt though and I did have to adjust it a few times
I really liked this top. Fits TTS. Comfortable and loved the sleeved. It's a full zipper in the back so you would probably need someone to help. Would rent again.
This is a special shirt! Between the colors and draping....I felt expensive in this top. Would rent again!
I love the pattern and felt comfortable in it. This didn't garner much compliments. Not a crowd pleaser but definitely easy to wear and would rent again.
This top is beautiful and unique. It definitely adds flair to your work wardrobe. Such a classy and elegant piece

I loved this shirt. The fabric, the fit, the cut. All amazing. I loved that it was lined and the drape. It hugged in all the right places. I received so many compliments. This shirt does not disappoint.
This is an elegant and very comfortable blouse. It's not my usual style but I'm so glad I wore it. The way it is structured is subtle but special. Would pair with jeans or a skirt.
Absolutely gorgeous, beautiful draping. The blouse is a little short.
The fabric pattern and fit were perfect. True to size. Great to transition into Fall. Perfect with winter white.
Loved it

links_reviews_title: Lovely top to dress up or down
links_reviews_text: I can't believe i didn't get a picture of this! I wore several times. The drape and cute are gorgeous and very figure flattering. Fabric has a texture in addition to the print that was nice. Colors were a little light for winter but worked well when paired with dark denim! Not much give to fabric or construction - top is lined. I dressed it up and down easily, very pretty piece.

links_reviews_title: I had to rent size 8 after I read the reviews and looked at how it fits other women.
links_reviews_text: fits really well with a skits or pants
Normally wear size 6, but 8 was just right for me.
Note that the sizes are UK sizes, so a size 4 is a US 0.

This blouse is nipped and tucked in just the right places to accent the waist. Sleeves are absolutely beautiful! They are gathered at the wrist so sleeve length isn't an issue. I normally wear a size 12 or 14 and sized up to an 18 because of previous reviews and was so happy I did. Size up and enjoy this fabulous blouse!
Fits perfectly
Was beautiful!!! But didn't fit me well. Needed next size up maybe?

Gorgeous, flattering and on-trend blouse. If it weren't so expensive I'd buy it. The draping on the torso is beautiful, and the puffy sleeves were much more flattering than I expected. The fabric is a bit shiny and has some texture to it - really stands out. I wore for a regular work day and a weekend day and had so many compliments.
Excellent quality material. Love the color. Wore it with jeans and it really dressed up the outfit.
I got so many compliments from my coworkers when I wore this top. It fit like it was made for me. Loved it.

links_reviews_title: It's such a pretty top! Unique, well made, flattering.
links_reviews_text: Flattering, very pretty color.

I got a lot of compliments but the slits on the sides were so high that the fabric moved around a lot and it got annoying throughout the day. The dark red/orange color was on trend. Went to my knees and I'm 5'1". Overall ok sweater.
Love this cardigan but it was way too big. I will rent again and size down to a small. The material is thick, but it flows well and is very flattering.

Looooove this slouchy burnt red orange cardigan! Because of the fun slots all the ya up the sides, it's flattering and not too baggy! The perfect color and high end quality material. Annnnnnd POCKETS :)
True to size, unique cut, heavy knit. More burnt orange than true red.

I loved this piece! It adds effortless style to a simple outfit! It drapes well and is extremely flattering, even with the oversized fit. I wore it multiple times - with jeans, leggings, and work pants! It worked well with everything! I recommend!

I took this sweater as my jacket for a fall trip to Mexico City, where it's warm during the day, but chillier in the evenings, and it was a perfect quick-transition piece. It went well with nearly everything I brought (only exception was a burgundy short-sleeves button-up that clashed). It's refined and functional. I really loved it
Literally the PERFECT sweater poncho and I'm going to need one in every color! Just the most comfy and flattering fit!

links_reviews_title: Very warm & cozy, a little bitch itchy
links_reviews_text: Overall a nice sweater for everyday/work. Very warm and the color is beautiful. It was a little itchy, so I had to wear it with long sleeves and a scarf to keep it from touching my skin.

links_reviews_title: I'm seriously thinking of renting this again soon
links_reviews_text: I seriously would wear this all year long ... oh such drama on windy days and such mystery when you're all curled up in a coffee shop.
Looks great dressed up or down with high waisted pants or leggings. Unique design, soft material, and great fit. Will definitely rent again.
It was beautiful but the fit was off. I should have sized down but I'm not sure that would have helped.
Super easy to wear, looked great for a casual client dinner. Can dress it up or down. Loved that it was a flattering oversized look for someone curvy.

links_reviews_title: Adorable, chic, cozy - so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: I love this cardigan! The fabric was super comfortable, not itchy at all, and the open sides make it so chic. I may have to buy it!

links_reviews_title: Love this. Great color and pairs well with loads.
links_reviews_text: No issues. Quality, fun & versatile. The slits up the sides were a bit weird at first, but no problem. Would rent again.
I paired this with some super cute high-waisted jeans, a gray top, and yellow flats. So cute and cozy.

Oversized but went well with a lot of outfits. I can see how it would be overwhelming or feel like you're drowning in it but I wore tights and tighter long sleeves to define my body underneath the cardigan. Definitely an outfit enhancer. Size down from what you normally wear, the S felt like a large blanket but you can make it work. Received many compliments. Would rent again.
Favorite rental so far. Very comfortable, great material. Perfect for work and every day.
I liked this sweater, but it's not a true red. It was definitely more rust. Fun design and I enjoyed it.
The photo doesn't show that it hangs nicely in the back
this sweater is perfect. i love the side slit detail, it spices it up.
The item looks red in the photo but when it came it was closer to the color orange. Not really the look I was going for but still nice
Loose fit with the perfect drape and pockets - it's hard to find sweaters like this anymore!
I really liked this piece. I think I would rent it again.
I wore this shopping, to work, and to an academic conference. You can dress it up or throw it on with leggings! LOVE the cut!
Received a lot of compliments on this. Great fall sweater. A bit too oversized for me but apparently looked fine from the outside!
Great open side panel fit, stunning rust color

links_reviews_title: Soft like being hugged by a thousand kittens
links_reviews_text: Soft!! Very cute and feminine shape. The orange-red tone is very flattering for ladies with warmer skin tones like myself!

links_reviews_title: I need this in my life!
links_reviews_text: I wore this sweater around the house, to a concert and dinner date, and to the office. It is so comfortable! It's oversized but not so big you can't doll it up. I will definitely rent again and might just have to buy it
Exactly what you think; it did have a slit type under the sleeves but I enjoyed that.
Warm but not flattering
Loved that it was warm but not bulky, and the split sides were unique.

This sweater is oversized, but the deep slits on the sides make it more stylish than just a typical baggy sweater. The color was more orange or orange/red than in the photo, but I loved it with jeans for the weekend and tailored pants for the office.

links_reviews_title: Make my butt look great, but uncomfortable in the crotch.
links_reviews_text: These jeans are flattering, they made my butt look great! But they're uncomfortable when sitting down. Even standing I kept feeling like I had to pull them down because the groin area was stiff, unforgiving and uncomfortable. I would definitely size up.
Probably buying these tomorrow. Excellent it, perfect everyday jeans!
Great jeans! Order up one size as they as form fitting and not stretchy!
I liked these way more than I thought I would. They were super comfortable for traveling in and great dressed up.

I sized up to a 28 based on reviews (normally a 27) and they fit really well, but I probably would have been fine with my regular size. They were tight around the waist to start, but loosened up quickly as I wore them. Thighs are usually where I get caught with rigid denim, but these are pretty spacious. I didn't think the shape of the leg was super flattering for me, but cute otherwise.
They might be great jeans for a different body shape. I tried the recommended size and couldn't button them.
I love the color and cut of these pants, but I would buy one or two sizes up. I couldn't even get mine on :(

I've attempted to rent so many jeans at RTR and always end up returning them the next day. These were the first pair of jeans I've rented that fit like a DREAM. I recommend you size down since they're stretchy and end up looking a bit stretched by the end of the day. They're super comfy and cute 10/10 WOULD RECOMMEND
Beware, these run much smaller than other sizes so make sure to size up! A bit more baggy in the waist than I would have liked but still cute. The length was perfect!
Great for everyday. True high waist
These jeans were super cute and on trend. I rented my normal size and they did fit, but the wait was pretty tight. I think the next size up would have been more comfortable.

The waist is a bit stretchier than I normally experience with Levi's. I'd size down especially if you have a slim waist and fuller hips/butt (the waist was gapping). Also these are full length on me at 5'4

links_reviews_title: The pants were very comfortable and high waisted.
links_reviews_text: I am tall and have a long torso so they hit me right at my belly button but on a shorter person they would probably hit higher. I was not in love with the length...they are a little short for my liking but on a shorter person they would definitely be the perfect length. Definitely recommend!

I liked this top more than I expected to. It's cropped, but not too short with high-waisted pants. It has thick, sturdy fabric but wasn't boxy. Despite what "they" say about horizontal stripes, I thought it was super flattering!
Fabric is heavier than expected, can tell it's really well made. Definitely a "boxy" shape as described but cute with jeans. Size down if in between sizes.
It's super adorable if you wear it with the matching skirt. The material is also very comfy. It's soft but also structure.
This might work for other heights and silhouette, but it did me no favors as a hippy short person
Cute shirt for everyday casual wear
cute
Ordered a XS because reviews said it was bigger but it ended up being a little small due to the fabric. Tight in the arms and the fabric in the body was thick but more fitted than it looks.

links_reviews_title: Surprisingly cute for a simple piece!
links_reviews_text: This shirt fit well, and ended up being super flattering. I wore it twice.
It's a cute structured knit top, but if you have a larger chest it becomes very cropped, especially if you also have a long torso to begin with.

links_reviews_title: This was way too short. Not meant for the full busted woman.
links_reviews_text: Looked like a belly shirt on me and I even ordered it in a size up. Couldn't wear it. Very disappointing.

links_reviews_title: A cute top that's slightly more put-together than a plain tee
links_reviews_text: I really liked how this looked, and I thought the thicker material and all-white sleeves gave it a bit of interest. My work dress code is casual and this was nice for wearing there.

I love me a good striped top. This one is really thick material and didn't wrinkle at all which was great since I used it for a weekend getaway to Seattle. It's pretty boxy, but the cropped nature keeps it flattering in my opinion. I'd rent again.
Nothing really special. Made me look boxy. Fabric is thick probably best for colder months. Didn't really like it.

links_reviews_title: Slightly cropped, thicker than you think
links_reviews_text: Found this top extremely well-made but a lot thicker than I thought it'd be. As long as you're ready for that, wonderful top. A slight crop to it, but not aggressively.
Wore a few times to work. Great structure and cute with dress pants or jeans!
Really wanted to love this top, but was super cropped

links_reviews_title: Love so much, I bought it
links_reviews_text: Crazy flattering, comfortable, and versatile. I wear this piece all the time!
The tencel is really comfortable and lightweight and the color is nice. Form fitting but not too small. I wish it were discounted more but I think it will be a good staple so I might buy it.

I probably should have rented a medium. This is a basic, soft, turtleneck. It's quite stretchy so it will hug your every curve. Nothing to write home about, but easy to dress up or down depending on the situation.

links_reviews_title: Perfect top for work or everyday. Great fit and color.
links_reviews_text: Slim fitting and flattering.
It was fine. Nothing special. I thought it was going to be more of a thick sweater but it was pretty thin and ribbed so I didn't feel like it was appropriate for work (even though we can wear jeans).
Great turtle neck that is not too thin or too thick. It tucks nicely into jeans and was a great color. Fits true to size (not see through)
I'm usually a medium but the XL fit snug but not too tight. Nice classic piece that tucks in nicely.
A fun color turtleneck for the holiday season. I wore this to wore with slacks and to a party with a black mini skirt and tights. It's a nice piece that fits well.

links_reviews_title: Super cute blazer! It fit a little more boxy than I expected, but I love the print and style!
links_reviews_text: I wish they had a size 0 when I rented, but the 2 worked and didn't look too big. It was a little boxy, but overall good fit and comfy! Great work piece!
Makes a great suit with matching pants. Runs a bit large, and wish the arm length was 1/2 inch shorter.
This suit was the perfect outfit for a spring work event. I felt appropriate but feminine and true to my style. The fit is phenomenal, especially for petite body types.

I love this blazer because I wore it to a business formal work setting, a business casual work setting (wore with jeans), and to dinner with friends and the blazer worked great for all occasions. If I rented in the future I think I would get a 2 for a more tailored fit, but it wasn't available at the time. Definitely true to size. Doesn't wrinkle. Really loved!

This jacket, and the coordinating pants, are suit heaven! The colors are fantastic and the little pop of lilac/pink transition the suit into the spring. I wore it with my own burgundy Tory Burch sweater and added a cute bow belt. Love it so much and will definitely rent again...tempted to purchase!
This is a fun, plaid blazer. It's classic but also has a pop of pink which makes it fun. Great quality fabric, comfortable, and a good fit.

links_reviews_title: Sophisticated, On-trend, Well Made Suit Jacket
links_reviews_text: I received tons of compliments and felt confident wearing this jacket. This longer length suit jacket was perfect for work and church even though I generally wear petites. With a full bust and narrow waist I'm always a bit worried about being able to button suit jackets. This fit beautifully though slightly long (as usual for me) sleeves, which were a bit snug through the bicep. Glad I sized up for my large bust. Would love to but this but it's outside my budget. Rent this - you'll love it to.

Loved this blazer. Very comfortable and dressed up an outfit effortlessly. I'm not usually a blazer-wearing gal but this one felt a little more special. I'm typically a 4, and the 2 fit well for a tailored look.
Absolutely loved this suiting and got so many compliments on it. You can be really versatile with the undergarments - I also styled with a black turtleneck. Highly recommend.
The fit was on the higher size and is a boyfriend style blazer, that I appreciate. The variety of jewel tones in the check pattern are easy to add some fun pops of color. Great piece!
Loved this and paired the suit with the Kule Pretzel shirt!
The colors (burgundy and violet) pop nicely off the grey/black and white. The fit and fabric are spot on for a comfy blazer
Nice plaid blazer with good styling. The colors are gray, burgundy, black and a pale pink. So I found it was easy to pair with black, gray or burgundy pants.

Wore this to a formal conference where everyone wears suits. Felt very comfortable but I really liked that it was a little different from a black suit (like everyone else was wearing). Probably could go one size down but fit was good. This is a nice blazer made of nice fabric. Would recommend!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for fall. Received tons of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Paired with a mock turtleneck dress for the office. Sleeves are always a challenge for short girls but rolled them up and looked cute and structured. Would also wear with a tee and jeans for a more casual fall look.

links_reviews_title: Lilac really pops - cuter in person
links_reviews_text: I haven't been able to send this back yet. Great jacket for a work meeting or a birthday dinner with friends. Good fit, not too boxy. May be tight in the arms for some.
The fit was perfect- it was a great work piece and was a great addition to my wardrobe for a work trip! the colors were easy to match with a couple outfits and this was a great quality!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful pattern, cut and fabric but runs SMALL

links_reviews_text: I have an athletic build but I'm still pretty small up top so tailored jackets are a gamble for me. But this was super comfortable and very flattering. Paired perfectly with burgundy pants and a white cami.
Great fit, fabric and pattern. Only thing was that burgeon was chipped on the one I received. Would definitely rent again.
Tons pf compliments. A bit bulky and warm but very comfortable and looked great. Awesome print

Wore with a white t-shirt and jeans but the look still was elevated and appropriate for the office and happy hour after. The colors in the plaid are unconventional and bolder in person, so it's a great option if you want something conservative but still stylish!
I wore this (matching jacket and pants) to present at a conference and reception and this outfit made me feel I ruled the world. Perfect fit and perfect fabric. Will 100% rent again.
I felt so buttoned up and professional in this blazer! I wore it once with a black blouse and once with a black turtleneck body suit. Wish I'd rented the pants too!
Wore this with a turtleneck and jeans and got so many compliments. My only complaint is that it's pink. I wish it was more of a brown.
I rented the blazer and pants together. I wish the blazer had been a little slimmer cut, but overall thought the fit was nice and comfortable. The pairing made for a bold, modern suit.
Such a great cut and the colors are beautiful! Perfect to upgrade your work wardrobe.
Perfect fit, great quality, and love the lavender/pink stripe. Dress it up with black pants or down with denim...perfect either way!
So so cute. Great fit. Wanted to wear it every day.
I got a lot of use of this one. I used it for work, for everyday and for travel. It is easy to dress up with black slacks, or down with jeans. Got a lot of compliments.
Fit perfectly and was great quality. I got so many compliments. I wore it with a deep rd shirt under.
Wore it so much more than I expected. Became my go-to with a graphic tee for a polished work look

links_reviews_title: Trendy blazer goes great with jeans
links_reviews_text: Great blazer and fun to wear outside of the office with jeans and a white tee
Great blazer to dress up or down. Looks cute with Oxford or sneakers. Easy and versatile.
I did love this jacket but it runs a little small. Very good quality. Would rent again in a size up.

I received more compliments on this jacket than any other item I have ever rented. It is cute, professional and coordinates well. It does run small, but it was fine. Just know if you are between sizes to go up.
This was a fabulous topper for work. Leans black not brown, so went with everything in my closet!
Love it, would totally buy this one.
I was not able to wear this jacket. It runs small, especially in the arms and shoulders
Crisp, tailored and cool. This flattering suit is a must rent in warmer weather. Pants were a little snug in bottom, right undies a must or will see a line, and a belt would help for me for best fit.
Love this color. Love all the ruffles.

I love this shirt so much! I sized down so that it wouldn't fit so large and I'm happy I did. It is adorable, flattering, and a great color. Definitely gives off those fall vibes, even though I wore it in January. I will most definitely rent this shirt again. SUPER CUTE.

L O V E D. This is a great year round top- I can see it worn as is with a skirt, shorts or jeans and ballet flats for spring, with white jeans and sandals for summer, with dark jeans and booties for fall, and over a turtleneck for winter!!!! I wore this item to work with medium wash jeans and brown sandals and got tons of compliments for this polished look. The top is a loose fit and the proportions are great. I am usually a size 4-6 and wore the 1 (it's def true to size.) can't wait to rent again!

It "fit" I had a little space but it was more like a peplum top on me instead of the over sized like on the model. But it was super cute!! I got so many complements. It was a light shirt also... it will be in my closet rotation for sure!
Rented so I could have something fun and colorful for Zoom calls. This was perfect! Needed a little iron but overall, a great top for warmer spring days. Fit perfectly and I normally wear a 2-4.
Very cute color. The ruffle wrinkles. Make sure you have high waisted pants or a skirt for this - it's a little cropped.

links_reviews_title: I love, love, love this top. The color is amazing and the fit was perfect!
links_reviews_text: This top was awesome for any occasion. I could dress it up or down. I love the bohemian feel and the color made me super happy, even in quarantine! Great for Zoom calls, and a walk around the block.
Loved it so much I bought it. Great color, nice fit, beautiful detail. I am usually a size 4 or small/medium and wore "1". Recommend!
Beautiful shirt, I received lots of compliments and loved the pop of color.

I wasn't sure if I would like this when I rented it. It got good reviews, but I couldn't tell if it was too "bulky" based on the pictures, and would add too much volume. I'm glad I took a chance on it. I wore it to work, to church, out to lunch with my husband and out to dinner with friends. I could mix jeans with nice pants to make it appropriate for each of those. I received compliments every time I wore it, mostly for the color. A great fall shirt and worth renting if you can pull off the color. I did find it a little on the short side, but not too short to where it was inappropriate for work.

links_reviews_title: Cute and very much autumnal vibes. It's boxy but so comfy.
links_reviews_text: Great bold color, perfect for fall
Great casual shirt. The color and weight are perfect for early fall.

links_reviews_title: great top - dress it up or down!
links_reviews_text: great top - dress it up or down!
Not the most flattering.

links_reviews_title: Eye catching color and great fit!
links_reviews_text: Loved this top...lightweight enough for end of summer and the perfect autumn color. Will definitely rent again!
Lots of compliments on this shirt, it is a statement piece. It was not as bright orange as I hoped, but very comfortable and feminine to wear.
Such a cute versatile piece. Wore it to work and also out to dinner another night. Would for sure rent again!

This top is beautiful! Worn multiple times and receive compliments every time. I don't normally go for orange- but this color is slightly burnt and not too bright. The shape is adorable with the ruffles. I wore a normal bra underneath and you could not see it through the eyelets.
I was worried about the size given I normally wear a 6 but it fit perfect. Great top for daytime!
Too small
I liked the sparkle and mix of colors

links_reviews_title: Obsessed! Fun pop of color and sparkle
links_reviews_text: I did not want to return! Fit was a little big strangely in the sleeve, if I were to rent Again I'd try to size down. I was afraid the sparkle would be itchy so I wore a light tank under and it wasn't at all.

This top was definitely a little out of my comfort zone in terms of color, but boy it sure was cute! Nice stretchy material with some metallic threading! It's a little on the longer side, but looks good tucked in!

links_reviews_title: Pop of color to brighten a basic look
links_reviews_text: Loved this top - the colors are super vibrant and it's a great way to amp up your basic jeans-and-tee look. I didn't realize when I rented it that it's a sparkly material (I didn't mind, though!) I would also probably get a medium next time - it was a little baggy but the fit was easily adjusted by tucking it into my jeans. Great for spring!
A bit long and material isn't the most comfortable. Definitely got this for the LOOK and not for the comfort.

links_reviews_title: love the longer sleeve length and the fact that its easy to wear day to night
links_reviews_text: wish it was a bit more cropped, but overall like it!
So many compliments! It was bit boxy on my wider shoulders but I loved the colors and sparkles so much. I have sensitive skin and did find it a bit itchy.
Nice dress, just didn't feel very stylish in it. Hence 3 stars. I'm not sure I love the detail which makes it look different (the white strap thing in front)
The fit was a little bit awkward up top for me. I was worried the bottom would be a little tight, but I felt like the details made the bottom slimming.
Super flattering cut and silhouette. Lots of compliments and the dress was very comfortable.

the design is very unique. Dress is very cute and well made. The shoulder is on the narrow side, a bit too narrow for me. If you have wide shoulders, consider one size up. bottom fits better than the top. very elastic.

Cute dress but note that there is no zipper so make sure you do your makeup AFTER you put the dress on as you have to put your head through that small opening! It was really cute, a little tight but that's on me but great for a work presentation.

We love this dress and got a lot of complements. Worn to church on Sunday, then work and evening charity event. Dress is a little tight at neck abs too short for me bare legged, but worked well with tights and boots. Stripe is lavender not white. Still loved it and will rent again (for mild winters!)
Adorable detailing- I'm wearing this in the fall with boots but it would work in the spring with a nude heel or any number of combinations. Versatile, dressy and fun
It's a slightly unusual dress for me but I LOVED it.
Fits true to size, wonderful material. I packed this for a weekend trip to upstate New York and it was perfect for not worrying about having to iron or steam

links_reviews_title: Great fit. Bottom trim is a light purple not white. Might feel a little snug at neck / arms.

links_reviews_text: Felt a little like a well dressed sausage in this dress. Wa some of two recent shoshanna rentals that seemed to run surprising tight...especially for an XL. It worked and fit fine but was glad I didn't size down to a L. Neckline details and asymmetrical hem add some cute details and certainly make the dress stand out. As noted in other reviews, the bottom stripe is lilac, not white.
I rented this dress for a business convention I was attending. It was very comfortable, perfect fit even for my larger chest and I felt relaxed in it all day. Would rent again!

Perfect dress for work. Ordered a medium which fit great at first, but the material stretched a bit throughout the day in the bottom. Likely would rent a small next time. Appropriate length for office & lots of compliments!

When I opened the bag, I was extremely disappointed to see that the trim at the bottom was purple. I thought it would be white! I tried it on anyway, and I'm really glad I did. The fit was perfect! Skimmed my body without being too tight, and I really liked the cutouts. Great dress for work. Professional, but still summery, and I'm glad I got to rent it before Labor Day (though maybe since it's not white it would be okay for fall)
I love this fabric- it hugs you in all the right places. The cut of the skirt was fun and different and the cutouts were fantastic. Tons of compliments! Rent this!

links_reviews_title: I loved this so much! It fits great and looks wonderful on an hourglass shape!
links_reviews_text: I will definitely rent this again. It looks very polished and professional.

links_reviews_title: True to size, would use again!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress, slimming and a perfect fit. Would rent again!
Very comfortable simple dress, fits true to size, only downside is it has no zipper and high collar neck
Figure hugging and hemline statement was eye catching. When I wore it to work received compliments-would rent again
This is cute. The stripe is gray not white. Unfortunately I could not wear this as I didn't feel comfortable with how tight it was in the arms and chest area. I looked visibly stuffed into the dress
The lavender trim is unique - makes it a bit harder to pair with shoes tho!
The cut of this dress is very flattering, and the material is super comfortable. I would highly recommend it!

LOVE this dress. Typically I stay away from any dress past the knee because of my petite height, but this unique cut is SO flattering. The material is thick and dress is very well made. Beautiful for a nice event or just to wear to work.
Love the seaming on the dress. Arms and shoulders seemed small.
Flattering fit and beautiful
This dress fit me perfectly. I got several compliments. I wore it three times. The material was nicely stretchy, but I needed a size large at 129 lb.
Can be worn year round Really comfortable Good length
I loved this dress. It fit really nicely and was of good quality. The neck is a bit tight so maybe do your hair after you slip it over your head.

links_reviews_title: Let’s just say I didn’t want to take it off and tried to figure out how to buy it.
links_reviews_text: This was originally not the dress I ordered but when I tried it in I knew it would be the dress I would wear. It is not only flattering but comfortable. I received many complements and moved so well in it that I didn’t want to get off the dance floor.

I didn't wear the dress. The shape didn't look good on me (athletic body, I gain weight in my stomach and love handles). It was one of those heavier fabrics that smooth over lumps, but look better on hourglass figures. Oh well
Unique twist on a classic sweater-type dress. The material is on the warmer side and you could definitely wear with tights. I received tons of compliments at work on this dress. I loved it.

links_reviews_title: very comfortable and friends have compliments all around
links_reviews_text: True to size. Not a fan of knit dresses, however this changed my mind for the future. It was a bit too big, but that was my own fault for not reviewing it carefully.
This dress far exceeded expectations! The amount of compliments I got was amazing! And it was so comfortable and flattering

Neck detail & asymmetric skirt are add lovely design interest, while remaining polished and professional look. Looked great with just a pair of patent nude heels. Stretchy mid-heavier weight knit material was perfect for fall transition weather and provides structure without being skin tight. Fit TTS.

links_reviews_title: Perfect outfit for fall daytime wedding
links_reviews_text: Fit is snug but forgiving. Tried to upload photo but could not. Got a lot of compliments on dress.
I loved this dress. It was super flattering and fits true to size.

This fits so well and falls really well. It's snug in all the right places but makes my (wide) hips look slim. And I really don't think i have ever gotten so many compliments as on this dress....like strangers stopping me on the street kind of compliments. I thought I'd wear it 1-2 times and I've worn it a bunch.
I'm usually not into hems that aren't plain straight hems, this dress though is adorable!! It's so flattering on and the details at the bottom just make it even more adorable.
Great fit, very flattering cut

links_reviews_title: Pictures well but feels frumpy on.
links_reviews_text: This pictures well but felt big and slightly frumpy. It is not form fitting at all. 5'7 160 ordered a medium

This dress runs super large and can easily stretch- keep that in mind before you order. I loved the fit of this, but it also was not a midi on me. I am not too tall (5'7) so this surprised me! I liked the knee-length it had in me though- it was sassy but comfortable and sleek. The cutout is sexy, along with its form fit, but it is still modest and classy. A perfect combo! I may buy :)

links_reviews_title: Fun sweater dress for night out
links_reviews_text: This dress was fun for going out to a concert with some friends - the shoulder detail made it a little edgier and the material was thick so I remained warm - which was key in these winter months! I wore a medium and I fluctuate between small and medium but the M was fine - a little bulky in some places so small probably would have been better but the M worked just fine

I love this dress. Well made and appropriate for the office because the rest of the dress has a classic shape to it. Love the shoulder detail. Work it with ankle boots one day and pumps another. Lots of compliments!!
Fits true to size would have bought it except it rides up and gets al bunched when you walk

I love this dress! The fit was a little big but felt so comfortable For all day wear. The peek a boo shoulder slit was the best. The length was mid calf but I m petite at 4'11". I loved it, will def rent again but maybe try the smaller size
January date night in Chicago, it's hard to look sexy. This dress delivered. So comfy, warm, and just a hint of skin. I got so many compliments
This dress fit true to size and was very comfortable. It's very simple but I dressed it up for NYE with some fun accessories. The slit at the neck had a sexy element to it.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous winter work dress, appropriate and great fitting
links_reviews_text: Loved this sweater dress with shoulder cut out detail. Form fitting but not too tight. Thick sweater like material.

links_reviews_title: Great everyday look or date night!
links_reviews_text: Fab fit and so comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Perfect & classy sweater dress for a funeral...wore all day and it never stretched out!

links_reviews_text: Very form fitting. Dress it down with booties or up with heels

I wore this dress to a low-key NYE party. I expected the ribbed fabric to be more snug, but the dress was actually roomy and even a little loose at the bottom. I would've preferred it to hug the body throughout the length of the dress. Might need to size down if you prefer a more "body-con" look!

links_reviews_title: Wore to casual night at the LAPhil.
links_reviews_text: Overall great fit, however, could have been a bit more fitted up top.

links_reviews_title: It was fine. Good for the office.
links_reviews_text: I did not love the shoulder cut out. Seemed larger than the picture. But, it was very flattering.
It was a perfect fit. It did not stretch out of shape and was perfect for the Winter weather in Detroit!
Runs large. Normally a 10 in dresses an ordered a large. Lots of extra fabric that bunched up causing it to not look good. Will try a smaller size.

links_reviews_title: Loved the comfort and style of this dress
links_reviews_text: I wore it w tights and books. I would rent again
I actually wound up not being able to wear it because it was too big and they didn't have a small. Disappointed because it was a cute take on a simple black dress

links_reviews_title: super cute but I dont have a butt so it was a little large in the back
links_reviews_text: very comfy and warm. wish it was a bit tighter
I'm a size 10 and sized down to a medium and it was still huge on me and stretched as the day went on. But really cute!

I think this ran large. I would have liked an xs. It had nice, thick fabric, but it just didn't fit well enough to wear. Too bad because if the size were right, this would have been a total winner all around!

links_reviews_title: Amazing sweater dress with great weight to it!
links_reviews_text: Loved this rental. Super warm knit dress but the shape held form, which I appreciated. Not too tight, but the cutout was a nice design detail that elevated the look. Wore it with flat boots for daytime and out with high boots for night. Love!
Size down on this one. Super comfy dress.
Dress fit like a glove - the perfect dress for a casual winter party
The colors are great, and tie dye is obviously on trend now. It's lightweight and easy to wear over gym clothes or to lounge. I'll probably rent again.

I wore this to a concert and then again on vacation. I liked the fit and the bright colors. It was a great beach sweatshirt because it wasn't too heavy but it was nice for the chilly mornings and evenings.
I didn't need to size up in this. I was considering wearing it with bike shorts, and it's definitely long enough for that.

My FAVORITE sweatshirt ever!!!!! This is the 3rd time I've rented this baby and I love even more every tome. Would totally purchase, but I just can't justify spending more than $50 on a sweatshirt. Can be thrown on with sweats and dressed up a little with jeans and accessories. If you're wanting to try the tie dye trend, this is your PERFECT way in!
I've rented this sweatshirt twice and loved it both times. It's really soft and comfy and the tie dye is fun. I'm between and xs and s and the xs was perfect for more of cropped look.
true to size - nice color - good quality - enjoyed it!
Beautiful necklace. It was a bit heavy but, loved that it never rotated or moved out of place. Statement piece!

I have always been a fan of Lizzie Fortunato. I love her accessories, so when I saw this gold chain necklace on the website, I ordered it right away. The chain link - pearl pendant design goes well with every outfit. I could wear it with a plain black tee for a casual look or wear it with a dressy top for a more glam up look. Very chic.
I'm loving the chain look right now so rented this, but returned it because I thought it looked costume-y. It was very large and bright gold.
Loved the design but the gold color is a bit ... off? It was not was I expected --a bit darker, maybe a bit orangey? -- but I could see some people liking that. Just wasn't what I was looking for.
Very flattering dress! Feminine silhouette without being too revealing for work or family events. Super cute print. Not the usual basic leopard.
This dress was such a pleasure to wear. It's not lined but falls really well. The length, pattern, print were on point. I'd rent it again.

I really liked this dress (and probably got more compliments on it than I have on anything I've rented--it stands out!), but I didn't love the way it fit me. I think it would look better on someone with a bigger bust (which would be most people--ha!).
