The length was actually a perfect midi length on my short frame though--so it is good for smaller people as long as they're not flat like me!
Great material, very comfortable and flattering for curves. The print is super cute and gets lots of attention!
Fit is super flattering and the length is perfect. Am seriously considering buying it

It was so great! The way the bodice crossed over really enhanced the bust and the rest of the dress just seemed to flow down the body. It would easily work for many formal or more informal occasions. I loved the colors and got lots of compliments. I would definitely rent this again and would love to buy it.
This was actually pretty bodycon since it's so thin material so i wore a vest over it at first, but grew brave and just wore this.

54° in Baltimore so this animal print long sleeved dress was just perfect for a crisp fall day! 🍁🍂 Plus this baby came with tags on!!!!!🤗 There were no reviews at all so I took a gamble and I'm truly loving this dress!🐆🥰

I was scared of this dress because of the print and longer length. But I'm so glad I rented!! It's super comfortable, flattering, and the print wasn't overwhelming. The muted brown and touches of pink really helped keep this dress from being to loud in the office.

links_reviews_title: Flattering cut and on trend print make this a great look for in or out of the office
links_reviews_text: I rarely wear an RTR rental twice but this one was worthy of it. Wore to work and then again on Thanksgiving. Super comfy, slightly fitted but not inappropriately so. Length is a little bit longer than usual but not awkwardly so. Slight pop of color in the animal print gives this just the right amount of stand out pop.
Much longer on 5'4 frame than in the picture, but comfortable and good for winter @ work.

One of my favorite dresses Super comfortable light weight feels like pajamas I'd say it runs a little big and roomy throughout but I didn't mind Not too heavy no itch Very flattering No wrinkle Modest yet not frumpy
This dress is greasy for curves. Thick and fitted. Loved it.
Fit great! Received so many compliments. Length hit mid-calf
Really cute and flattering. A little long for short ladies, I just wore a healed boot to help.
Exactly as pictured. I love animal print & the style of this dress makes it easy to wear. My co-worker told me I looked like a "hot" teacher.
fit was great...style is flattering
Lots of compliments. The color is a rich caramel.

links_reviews_title: Easy to wear. Loved it so much, I brought it.
links_reviews_text: The print is fun, the cut is conservative yet flirty, and it's easy to care for, so I bought it!

This dress is beautiful and figure flattering. The only minor thing I would like better is the look of the print patter closeup when the dress is laying flat. The print looked a little flat and tacky to me. But once I put the dress on and looked at myself in the mirror that impression disappeared. I highly recommend this dress. Fun to wear and nice 3/4 length sleeves.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress, no wrinkle, great for travel and work!
links_reviews_text: Will definitely rent again!
I got so many compliments! I love the way this dress fit. The material is kind of clingy, so it's definitely a dress to wear Spanx with!

I usually wear a 4 but the dress gathers at the bust and material is stretchy; runs a little large in the waist- the 2 fit perfectly. Very pretty dress. I would have worn it multiple times, but material is thin and its December in Chicago. I would rent again.
It fit really well, I dont especially care for the neckline cut
This dress was very flattering. It highlights the waist, but is still conservatively cut-so work appropriate. It's very comfortable and easy to wear.
Fit, fabric and pattern all 5 stars! So easy to style and completely comfortable!
The material is thinner/ lighter than I had imagined. I enjoyed wearing this! I paired this with boots.
Wore to work and church, received a lot of compliments.
I loved the shape and flair of this baller dress. In fact, I think it needs to stay with me.
The fit was great, but the neck was too high for me. Didn't like the way it looked.
Perfect length, hugs in all of the right places without being too much.
I love how the peach in the brown brings the pattern a fresh pop. I will be purchasing this one!

links_reviews_title: Nice design but too long and runs large
links_reviews_text: I'm short so it overwhelmed my frame. It was also very large in the waist. Could have sized down to a 2. But I am in between and 2 and 4. I loved the pattern and design of the dress though.
Such a flattering dress, perfect for fall. The fabric is so soft, I could have slept in it. Almost bought!

links_reviews_title: Fun pattern, flattering cut made this a great dress
links_reviews_text: Loved this! Fit was true to size, although the fabric clung a little more than I'd really have liked--I'd wear shapewear next time.

This dress was super comfortable and flattering for work. I wore a slip underneath as the fabric is not super forgiving. I'm 5'2 and it hit me just below the knee. Received lots of compliments and I plan to buy it. FYI I'm fitting more into a 10 these days and this 8 fit perfectly. I'm 5'2 155
Beautiful detail, metallic thread, great fit
I didn't realize from the picture that the sweater had shiny, metallic colors. I liked the fit and modern look. Very different from my norm. Would wear again.

links_reviews_title: Great holiday print that stands out, but isn't obnoxious.
links_reviews_text: Great fit. Quality fabric. Works for large bust. Nice amount of stretch. Not itchy. Loved it.

The silver and red are metallic! Loved this sweater for a festive holiday look!! Wore the medium and it fit well, i usually go for more of an oversized top, but this fit great even with a blouse underneath. Super fun for the holidays!!
This was perfect for hosting Christmas brunch! Not itchy, very nice. Not too warm. Got many compliments
Very cute, loved this sweater! Fit very well, would rent again for the holidays.
Fun pattern and bright colors with sparkly yarn made this more exciting than the average sweater
had to roll up the sleeves but it was fun n flattering! I disagree w people who think it was Christmas-y, didn't feel that way to me

links_reviews_title: Bold pattern, great fit. I'm planning to rent it again!
links_reviews_text: I rented this for work and it's so great it can be styled up or down. I got compliments from my most fashionable work colleagues, so that was awesome. The metallic threads give this top a really fun pop, but could get a little irritating if you were moving around a lot. Not pictured, I also wore it on the weekend with jeans and a bright red bag for dinner with friends and loved that look too.

This sweater was adorable. I absolutely loved the pattern and the sparkly metallic red and green theads accenting the pattern. In some ways it seemed very holiday, but I wore in spring and my coworker said it reminded her of rosettes. Lots of compliments. Would def rent again
This sweater was surprisingly thick & warm. I am typically a XS-S and 32B bust, and this fitted fit was super flattering. Would rent again!

I love the pattern and cut of this sweater. It's not too bulky, but also not too thin and drapes well. It feels slightly plasticky, but is not itchy. The sleeves were a bit long for me, so I folded over the cuff. I would totally wear this again.

Great sweater with an interesting pattern. High quality. Everything fit great except being tall, it was short on me. It still worked well with a cami underneath or high waisted jeans. Would rent again.
Super cute, very versatile. The sleeves are nice and long for a tall girl. It is so cute in person! A little scratchy. Very classy.
Just like everything else I've rented from her, fit like a glove!!!

links_reviews_title: Would be a fabulous holiday or Christmas sweater
links_reviews_text: Very warm sweater. I didn't realize how festive it would be from the photos. It is red, green, and silver, with red and silver sparkle. I love sparkle, but with the colors, I felt that I was wearing it off season. Good quality and fit. Arms were long enough even for me!
Loved this top for a fun day look. Wore to brewery with friends. Really comfortable.
Rented this for a brunch with friends and liked it a lot. Runs slightly on the fitted side so rent a size up if you want it to fit a bit bigger. Print is great and has some metallic thread in it.

links_reviews_title: Great colors, but a little boxy/large
links_reviews_text: The colors were vibrant and there was some sparkle to the print in the body, but the fit was large on my petite frame. Would probably look more proportionate worn with skinny jeans. Still loved the colors and print!

links_reviews_title: Channeling Katie Lee on the Kitchen
links_reviews_text: I rented this thinking it would be fun. Especially the sparkly cuffs. It was fun. When I wasn't feeling silly. It's one of those shirts you wear that you know isn't cute but you think you are cute enough to wear it... like Katie Lee on the Kitchen would wear.

I was not expecting this sweater to have sparkles running through it like another DVF dress I rented. I wish it didn't have that because it's a little too festive but I also loved the pattern and fit so wore it. I liked it with a lighter, casual jean like the model picture had.

I knew this would be a busy knit sweater with lots of prints, but what I wasn't expecting is that the pattern detail would be glittery. I like the sort of menswear/tie pattern vibe the prints in this sweater are giving off, but the glittery-ness of it, I think, cheapens it a bit. It may be to someone else's taste to have it like that though, but it was too much for me between the print and the glitter. In addition the cut of the sweater is such that if your stomach isn't totally flat, the band of the sweater will sort of ride up and hang under your pooch and emphasize it. It doesn't help that the bottom band is this eye-searing glittery baby blue and red so it really draws your eye to that area. I wore it once and am promptly sending it back.
Love love love this sweater!!
Not sure it's totally clear from the picture, but this sweater has Lurex details, so glittery. Wore it out to dinner and a symphony concert - perfect. Fit is great.
I wore it with black pants for work and received many compliments. It fits well and has just a little something extra with the metallic thread to make it noticeable!
Comfy and eye-catching!

links_reviews_title: Great pop of color and patterns if you usually wear black.
links_reviews_text: Loved this sweater because I always wear black and I wanted something with a pattern. Thin enough to wear with a blazer and it got a lot of compliments! Would wear it again for sure. Light enough for Spring too. I would also wear it with a button up under.

links_reviews_title: So cozy and love the mix of prints and the old world classic fit
Unique and lovely, perfect for the holidays.
links_reviews_text: I loved this sweater so much I didn't want to send it back! It runs very warm so perfect for the winter break in Wyoming. It was very flattering and comfortable.
Nice and warm. Good quality material but for sure too much holiday sweater spark for me to wear comfortably more than once. Might be better at night? Nice size
perfect
It fit well, and was festive.
Festive with red, green and a bit of sparkle, but not over the top. I liked it so much I ended wearing 3 times to various holiday events.

Wore this a couple of times around the holidays, -- to a work meeting and also on Christmas Day! Loved the different patterns and the bit of sparkle in the knit. A high-quality sweater that was thin enough to tuck into pants (my preference). I would rent it again!

links_reviews_title: Very pretty, but I didn’t wear it because it was too tight across my bust.
links_reviews_text: Great length

links_reviews_title: Cute sweater - good for holidays or everyday
links_reviews_text: Cute dress with sparkly details. The arms are a bit long, I had to roll up the sleeves but it was still cute. The sweater fits a bit more like a medium than a small.
I didn't realize this sweater had sparkly material in it. Wanted it to be just a regular patterned sweater. Just wasn't what I thought t was going to be and ended up returning it right away.
I ended up not wearing this. Not completely the right fit for me.
Cute pattern and a comfy sweater overall--looks polished for work but still funky and cool. There are metallic accents on the sleeves and hem, so could be dressed up or down.
Sorry for odd contortion pic but I was trying to get all the cool details. Back is open , so not office friendly

links_reviews_title: hits you at the belly button
links_reviews_text: gorgeous print just a bit too cropped. Pairs well with high waisted jeans or skirt.

Many compliments and a pretty top but very ill fitting. Had to wear a cami tucked into my pants and it's open In The back. A medium was a bit snug. I wore it for Christmas Eve but would never rent it again

I decided not to wear this item out because I planned on eating, drinking, and breathing. It was pretty and I love the concept. But the top was too loose across the chest, especially for how snug it fit at the waist. Fit was off for me.

links_reviews_title: Waist very tight when zipped up consider sizing up. Otherwise very beautiful

links_reviews_text: Lots of 80s flashbacks in this one. I was planning to wear it on an upcoming trip to Vegas, but the zipper is impossible to get up and down and so I sent it back. Fits true to size, cute for a night out.

Such a beautiful red color. But I couldn't even zip this up. There was a button to secure the top behind the neck and a size zipper for the waist. But even then I couldn't zip it up. Maybe if I had sized up it would work but with the side zipper, neck button and free-hanging ribbon, it was too busy to wear. Meh.
Color and style is amazing! So flattering, and fun for a night out!

The blouse was not what I expected. It was vibrant red and too dressy for a casual date night. Would be perfect for the holidays. I did not wear, due to the fact the length was too short for my long midriff.

links_reviews_title: Fun shirt for a night out
links_reviews_text: This shirt is a really beautiful color and material. Looks very nice on. The open back makes it fun for a night out. It was shorter than I was expecting - it hit me above the belly button. For size, be aware that it's roomy, but the waistband has zero stretch. I wore it with high waisted pants and still felt like I had a gap between the bottom of the shirt and top of my pants. Also the back clasp is very hard to secure alone. Overall I thought it was beautiful and really enjoyed wearing it.
Great silk shirt. Wore it twice already. May even buy it.
It fit, but the buttons were a little loose and sagging. It was nothing spectacular, just a nice work blouse with a little more interesting color than usual. Recommend if you need a staple blouse.
Love the fit of this one and the pattern is super playful. Would buy!
Fits true to size, beautiful material, love this top!

links_reviews_title: Cute and soft but very long
links_reviews_text: I loved this top's super soft lush fabric and pattern and got a few compliments, but it was really longer than I expected. It looked more like a tunic on me, I'm 5' 5''. If rent it again though!
Beautiful shirt for work or causal! Runs true to size
Perhaps they sewed the tag on upside down? Says 10 but actual size is like 1. Could not get it on.

links_reviews_title: Warm and cozy hoodie sweater dress
links_reviews_text: Size down in order for this to look cute on! Typically am a M and got an XS - fit great paired with tights and combat boots!
Great fit, comfortable, wish there was more colors!
The comfort of the dress was great. I'm always looking for new casual items for my closet. The only downfall is that it only comes in one color.
I rented this more for an everyday look, but ended up wearing it to work. Super cute and comfy!

I bought this for a trip to Canada as a travel outfit, and it was perfect! Not as flattering in pictures as I would want it to be if I was planning on taking a ton of photos, but it was great for comfort and warmth. It ran a tad big, but overall I really liked it!
I thought this sweater dress would be soft, but it was pretty scratchy. It was fine, but nothing special. I normally wear a 4/6 and the XS fit fine.

Like I said, the picture does not do this amazing piece justice! I wish I could afford to buy it!!! I'm keeping my eyes on this when it goes on clearance! This dress is soooo warm and comfortable I didn't want to take it off. I got so many compliments. It does run a tad large so I'd size down. I'm usually a medium and I wore a small. Only thing missing is a front pocket!

links_reviews_title: Great cute casual look for everyday wear.
links_reviews_text: So comfy & cute!
Loved this. I got it med to make it oversized and I put belt with it. Looked so cute. Everyone loved it and it was so comfortable.

This dress was comfortable and very large. It fit like a long, oversized hoodie. I wore a tank under because it was a little scratchy. I had a super hard time styling the dress. I think next time I would do black tights and black booties, but I chose long dark brown boots and bare legs because it was nearly 50 the day I wore it, which is warm for Chicago in November. This was a new, with tags dress. It certainly wasn't the most flattering piece, but that is not the intention of this dress.

links_reviews_title: Boxy but very comfortable, don't pass it up just size down.
links_reviews_text: boxy, warm, below knee at 5'4"
Pros - none itchy ugly like a burlap bag. Do not rent this bag unless you like to hide your self in a brown bag
The dress fit true to size and was cute but I wanted to wear it for working from home and feeling cozy and it was just too itchy.

links_reviews_title: So comfy and cute, but on the longer side
links_reviews_text: This dress is so cute and a perfect comfy fabric, I wore this on the weekend as well as to work. The only thing I would say is that it was quite long on me and I am 5'10" so if you are shorter than that I would expect it to be at or past your knees.

links_reviews_title: Cute, but was itchy on my neck
links_reviews_text: Definitely cute and a flattering mocha-like color, but if you're not into turtlenecks or itchy fabrics on your neck this piece isn't for you.

I loved this outfit to mix up the usual pants+sweater monotonous look of winter. I would have preferred it to be a tad bit shorter, would be great on the taller ladies. Looked cute with a pair of platform sneakers!

Love this dress. It's super comfortable, soft, and fits perfectly. The best casual dress because I'm not usually a dressy dress person. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because anyone shorter than 5'4" it will cut you awkwardly. It hit me just above the knee, and if I were any shorter it would have made me look even shorter. Keep that in mind if you are curvy and short. I'm 5 months pregnant now and this was perfect to highlight but not squeeze my bump.
Loved this sweater dress. Very warm and comfortable with a relaxed fit. The length was great, could be worn with or without tights/leggings. Hit a few inches above my knee. Would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Got it just for a casual day to day look
links_reviews_text: I believe it runs true to size, and I should have just sized down. Ordered a S, but XS may have been better (5'3'', 125lbs, 34C). It hits about where my knees are and is a baggier fit. Not the most flattering piece ever so I'm not sure I'll even end up wearing it.
I wanted to love this item, but it was not comfortable at all.. maybe could work with a long sleeve underneath?
Did not wear as material was too heavy for the weather.

This is a very cozy oversized sweatshirt dress - it is cut quite large even for an oversized silhouette, so I wouldn't recommend it for petites. I'm small and it just dwarfed me as a shapeless brown bag down to my knees - if I had longer legs it would have been much cuter.
What you see is what you get; no surprises, just cozy comfort
Wore this with a denim jacket and sneakers. Was a cute, casual weekend look.

links_reviews_title: I liked the fabric and color
links_reviews_text: It was just not the right length for my body. It would look better on someone taller
Fit is great, very soft given that it's wool, surprisingly flattering. Just very, very warm!

links_reviews_title: Cute slouchy hoodie dress - I wore it over jeans with boots and it was a great casual look!
links_reviews_text: Fit was slouchy as intended, but not too baggy. It was definitely really warm. Loved it!
True to size and not too short for a tall girl!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress. Rented again in a smaller size and will probably buy it. Cozy, warm and comfy
links_reviews_text: Great dress
So cute and easy. Definitely oversized but I loved that

links_reviews_title: Comfy and cute w legging but no shape. Size down.
links_reviews_text: Comfy and cute for day but no shape. Size down.
Bulky, doesn't really offer any type of shape. I loved the hoodie though, I paired it with leggings and it kept me quite warm.

links_reviews_title: Feels extremely casual. Cozy, but boxy and hard to dress up.
links_reviews_text: Boxy and oversized but hood is too small to actually use. Not memorable. Ended up wearing it on plane which was perfect because its roomy and warm.
Good weekend wear and a nice winter alternative to athlesiure wear. Warm and cozy. The color didn't suit me but I wore it several times anyways.

links_reviews_title: Runs big but size right and it's super comfy
links_reviews_text: Comfy and trendy! Wore on the coldest day of winter in NY and kept me warm.

it's cold in nyc and this is the perfect sweater dress to live in for winter. i'm typically a 4/small, but caara runs large so went w the XS and it fit perfectly. not scratchy at all, hit above the knee. i cannot recommend this enough for a ski vacation/casual wknd/everyday wear.
I liked this sweater dress for weekend day and work. Very warm and cozy.

I'm in my 3rd trimester and this item was listed as maternity friendly. I was excited to receive it, but when I put it on, it wasn't flattering at all. I loved the color, but other than trying it on, I didn't wear it out. I returned it the next day.

I will definitely be renting this dress again. I love the slight oversized fit because it makes the weight of the fabric not feel so heavy. The neck is a little high for me but not enough to bother me. I love the hood as well as the length which hits right above my knee so I can still wear it with tights. The only thing it's missing is pockets
Fits loose and to about knees. Really cozy, material is not itchy.

I had a really amazing opportunity on my plate that I rented this power blazer for. Unfortunately, with the spreading pandemic, this opportunity has been shelved until the pandemic subsides. All of that aside, this jacket truly is magnificent and I feel like I’m walking around in art. That’s my favorite part of fashion. Maybe one day I can rent it again actually have somewhere to go to show off its artistry, kick butt professionally, and feel alive and okay again.
I have broad shoulders & full bust, and this blazer ran large for me, so size down. Otherwise it was great! Beautiful structure and festive fabric. It dressed up our jeans Friday at work.

This blazer actually looks like Christmas so I rented it to wear to work in the final days leading up to everyone's time off. It was a hit! I typically wear a 2 or 4 and this was roomy and comfy when buttoned

Loved this jacket! Could probably have sized down for a more fitted look. Received a ton of compliments on the material/print. Can dress up for a night out or wear casually with jeans and a blouse for the day. Will definitely try it again! Very well made design.

links_reviews_title: Everyone in my office loved the pattern of this blazer.
links_reviews_text: The fit was great! Ran true to size.

links_reviews_title: So cute and comfortable! tons of compliments
links_reviews_text: perfect fit and very sophisticated
I like this blazer but it could border of being a little much.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful blazer to feel a little glamorous at work
links_reviews_text: The cut was a little boxy, but it fit well over my large bust - I was able to button it comfortably.

I wore this jacket for a series of business conferences and events and it never ceased to draw to compliments. As with any Zadig and Voltaire the quality was incredible. I sized down two sizes and it fit perfectly. Boxy fit, highly recommend!

The navy-based blazer is a great pick to spice up a work look. I paired it with a light pink/tan tank under to pop and bring out some of the details on the coat, in addition to dark jeans. It fits generally true to size, although a tad small in the arm area. It doesn't look like it is too small - just feels a little tight. Glad I picked it to try it out!
Fit great, wonderful detail too. Wore with jeans and a white top
Oh so beautiful. It comes oversized so if you like more fitted size down. The brocade is stunning. In love.

After trying this on, I almost returned it without wearing it, but decided to wear it to work one day. I got lots of compliments on it, but I thought it fit strangely. It was very tight in the shoulders and very boxy in the body. Still, a fun bit of sparkle for the holiday season.
I got it for work but it was more of a special event blazer with all the sparkles. I felt like I looked like a magician in my dads jacket.

links_reviews_title: Pretty color but runs a bit large.
links_reviews_text: A bit baggy.

I'm considering adding this to my wardrobe since I don't own a lot of blazers. Maybe after Xmas shopping I'll buy something to treat myself. The fabric is thick and lining and stitching superior. Nice inside pocket. High quality and great designer I've never worn before. Looking forward to wearing more Voltaire.

links_reviews_title: Cute pattern but looked strange on me
links_reviews_text: Maybe it was just too large but I looked like a frumpy magician in this jacket. I thought it would be a fun tailored jacket for the office, so I'm going to try it in a size down.
Oversized fit. I wore with the sleeves rolled and tight pants so it looked polished instead of bulky.
Blazer with sparkly detailing that's perfect for the holiday season. It runs a little big in the midsection, so you could probably size down or layer over a sweater.

Fits perfectly- can even button the front button. Fabric is lightweight- good for warmish Fall days. A quality jacket that's quite dressy- sparkly silver and shiny green threads, against a shiny navy background- but works with dark jeans. Would be great for a creative office or night out with the girls.

links_reviews_title: Very chic I received lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: ran a little large

Wore this for a work conference and received so many compliments. The print is beautiful and has a little sparkle; perfect for day to night events. Can dress it up or down as well. The fit is a little more "oversized" but still felt true to size. Wish I could buy but will wait until the price goes down.
The fabric has incredible detail. I received so many compliments on this jacket!
Loved these so much I bought them!
Love these jeans and I think I might keep them. High-waisted, comfortable and the perfect crop for my 5'3" frame.

links_reviews_title: I loved it and wore it the whole month
links_reviews_text: loved it fit true to size.

links_reviews_title: Tight at first but stretch out to normal size quickly
links_reviews_text: When i first put these on I was nervous they weren't going to fit. I got one up from the size I wear in Madewell jeans if that helps! The first try on it really flattened my butt but after wearing them all day they were much more flattering. I've worn them a few times now and they work great with cute winter boots and would also work with sneakers. Love the frayed cuff at the bottom and the length is just right for being 5'8"

As a short girl I always worry about pants being too long- these were the perfect length and fit. Can be dressed up or down, I am totally in love with them. The only "issue" was that they grew on my throughout the night and I had to tug on them a bit. I'm a 24/25 so might go with the 24s next time!

These jeans are looser fitting, but still super flattering. The waist is slightly tapered so it hugs the booty area enough to give you a good shape. I usually go between a 26 and 27 in jeans and am glad I did a 27 in these. They do stretch out a bit by the end of the day, but they still stay flattering. The wash is really nice and works well with just about any top. I like how these jeans are high waisted, but not SUPER high waisted. I have a short torso and really liked these.
Loved these! I wore them at least 5 times before returning! They do stretch out so I would recommend sizing down at least one size- you would still get that oversized boyfriend denim feel.
As a 5'2 person, finding cropped jeans is not that easy for me. I had to roll them up to get that look. They fit like a glove when I first put them on, but got looser throughout the day.
These jeans could easily dressed up or down. They are so comfortable! I would rent these again.
Love these jeans. Perfect balance of good fit with the mom/boyfriend jean look. Comfy, too!

Love these jeans and this brand but this pair in particular ran smaller than others I have worn from AMO. They fit great in the legs but were a tad tight on the waist, would rent again but size up since I didn't get to wear them.
Wish I could buy these! Very comfy, great color, not too stiff. Love them!

links_reviews_title: A little big and stretchy but I still loved kthem.
links_reviews_text: These jeans have a cure slouchy look. Size down.
I sized up on these because they have no stretch. Ran a little large.
Love these jeans. They stretched a bit so I probably should've ordered my usual size 29. I sized up due to other reviews.
Great cute and comfy jeans, wore them multiple times!

links_reviews_title: Too small for any lady with a butt
links_reviews_text: Jeans were adorable, great color and shape. Unfortunately they lack any stretch and for any lady with thighs, hips, or a butt I would steer clear. I could get the pants on and button them but was unable to walk. Maybe size up? Or maybe just pick a different jean that can accommodate a pear shape. Also to note, they button all the way up, no zipper. And last but not least, the back pockets are strangely low. They made my butt look like a strange shape. High waisted should mean high pockets! For reference, I am a true 6 and ordered a 28R.

links_reviews_title: great color and cut, but poor construction that stretches out quickly
links_reviews_text: the jeans bagged out during the day and I found that I had about 4 inches of extra space in the waistline

links_reviews_title: Loved, but should have sized down!
links_reviews_text: Awesome boyfriend fit and boot cut but does run a bit bigger than I expected

links_reviews_title: This just wasn't flatering on me.
links_reviews_text: The jean material wasn't very soft. I think you need to be very slim and tall to pull this style off.

links_reviews_title: A little too high waisted for my taste.
links_reviews_text: I loved the flair at the bottom.
The 29 was definitely too large. I would say these are TTS.

I. Love. These. Jeans. I might even keep them. They do run a bit small (usually wear a 27/28, ordered a 30R and they fit well). They are cozy and slimming. They hit at my ankle and I'm 5'2". Hopefully they don't stretch out too much throughout the day. They're snug on my thighs and butt, but I have a big butt so I'm not surprised. Ever so slight gap in the waist above the butt, but again, that's fine bc I tuck shirts and sweaters in the front so it evens out.

links_reviews_title: Loved, loved loved these pants, wore them multiple times in a week!
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect, high waisted with just enough flare and crop to be cool.
Not too much stretch, but enough to make them comfortable. Great fabric.
I'm usually 28 so maybe these run a little small, but I liked the loose fit of the 29. Perfect length, really comfortable.
These were really comfy "mom jean" style jeans. I normally only wear skinny jeans and this was a nice change. The light blue almost acidic color was very cool.
Im very short, so these were SUPER high waisted. A little uncomfortable at the waist but i did love the rest of the fit.

links_reviews_title: I needed the 27. The 26 were a bit snug, so I am returning them before I ever wore them.
links_reviews_text: n/a

Love these pants! Am considering buying them even though they're pretty $$, just because I think I would wear them often. One note about the size is that they come super snug and really stretch out throughout the day. I'm 5'8" and around 140 lbs, and when I first tried these on I contemplated returning. About an hour in and they're a perfect fit! The only downside to these is that there are a good number of buttons which makes taking them on and off a bit of a task, but otherwise they're great!!

links_reviews_title: I love the way these jeans fit! They are high rise so it keeps it all tucked in.;)
links_reviews_text: Fit is perfect for my mom hips

I will say I just had a baby a few months ago but the fit of these jeans were odd. I could button them up but they were tighter in odd places. Ended up not wearing because I wanted to breathe throughout the day.

links_reviews_title: Was tight in the waist and very loose in the stomach, hips and legs. Odd fit.
links_reviews_text: Ended up returning it without wearing because I felt way too frumpy in mom jeans and not chic and stylish.
Great jeans, comfortable, cute with any shoe.

links_reviews_title: Comfy, high-waisted yet flattering, would definitely rent again!
links_reviews_text: These jeans were a little longer on me than on the model, so I mostly wore them with little heels instead of sneakers or boots. But that was my only complaint - I loved them!
So comfy and perfect balance between structure and give with the fabric. And they're actually much more flattering than they look on the model, for some reason.

I don't have the smallest waist or the biggest thighs. However, these were big in the waist and small on the thighs for me. Not unwearable, but not ideal. I got a 30 even though my normal size would be 29. I think the 29 world have been way too small in the thighs. Cute wash and cut is it fits you though!
Good basic sweater in a fun color- the XS fit perfect
Not my favorite sweater. I did love the color but it was kind of bulky and not flattering.

Sweater was ok but didn't wow me. The color is more muted than shown online and the arms ran long (had to cuff them). It also felt a bit short (though I do have a bit of a stomach) to the point it lifted up a bit when I raised my arms to stretch. Overall another dud of a RTR pick
I felt so good in this sweater. Even though I’m a bit busty, the proportions on the small size were perfect and I didn’t feel bulky. The color is vibrant and adds a much needed pop to my winter wear.
Fit really well and was very cute.

This sweater is right up my alley- I like the simplicity and the colors. It's well made and not too scratchy. I also have pretty long arms and a long torso but the Med was fine. Great for brunch on a fall Saturday.
This shirt is short and hugs the stomach. Based on the picture, I expected it to be looser. Would not recommend

links_reviews_title: If your office is SO over air-conditioned that you need a sweater in the summer, make it a nice one.
links_reviews_text: While this sweater wasn't quite as soft as I was hoping, it was a solid, no-nonsense, good-looking sweater. It's not super exciting, but it does the job and doesn't itch.
I didn't keep.
Loved this sweater! I rented for an everyday look. It was soo comfortable (material is heavy fyi) and I felt very stylish in it as well. Will definitely rent again.
+ muted color block + flattering cut + warm - slightly itchy
This sweater was extremely comfy and warm!
Love the cute, fruity print and the fit. A great top for spring/ summer!

I wore this to dinner while on vacation. I loved the lightweight material and the fit was great. I read a lot of reviews on similar style tops about them being too cropped. This one hit at the perfect length. Will definitely rent again!
Wore to work with a cami underneath and then on the weekend with just a bralette. Comfortable and cute, lots of compliments!

Super cute. It's short. If you don't want to show lots of tummy wear high waisted pants. It's sheer! Will be fine with a neutral bra but true story: I had on a yellow one that lit up under the black light at the indoor mini golf kids party I wore it to!

I only rented this for the Instagram photo because my dog's name is Peaches, but I ended up really loving it! The style is loose and the neckline comes down into a deep V so I wore a cute bralette in the case of any wardrobe malfunctions. It was the perfect top for 105 degree weather in NYC and so soft! Would definitely rent again.
Silky soft material drapes nicely. Great summer color! Paired it with a yellow hair scarf - received many compliments!
Super comfy, went well with both shorts and jeans. Button detail and pattern is very cute. Very good quality silky material. Wore this 3x. Loved and wanted to keep!
Loved this top! Got lots of compliments. Nice silky material
Such a cute and comfortable outfit. Tons of compliments
Cute casual top loved the print the details and especially loved the feel of this fabric
Love this adorable top. I wore it to a festival and received tons of compliments. Very comfortable with its looser fit. A bit sheer may need a cami depending on the setting you're wearing it in.

Rented this just for a nice new spring look and it came new with tags! I got the. XL as that was the size recommmedec for me, but if rent again, I'll get the Large as this is very blousy and flows. It's silk and just sexy enough that I probably wouldn't wear it to work. But great for a day out ! Really like!

So far Rails seems to be my new go to brand for more casual work days from home and running a few errands. I do find the items are loose and run big so Xs works well for me with plenty of room to spare. Material is so soft and breathable. I love the tie in the front to keep it a bit more polished.
This is a light sheet top in a flattering color, the tiny fruit print is adorable. I wore it with a pencil skirt and jeans while I had it. It's flattering and loose but I would size down.
This was cute! The colors were a little dull and I couldn't be sure if it was because of wear or how it was supposed to look. Very comfy and breezy though, got a compliment on it too!

links_reviews_title: Loved it. So cute. Easy to wear. Goes with everything.
links_reviews_text: N/A

Super cute! I got lots of compliments on it. I did wear it with a nude undershirt because the buttons on the front don't quite close all the way and the fabric is see through. It does show sweat easily which is unfortunate! But it was a super cute peach pattern.
Great fit cute and comfortable
I will probably buy this if I get it into my rotation again

links_reviews_title: Pretty but not quite as expected
links_reviews_text: This blouse is very pretty and the silk is lovely--it's more of a soft lilac. I did find that it happens between the buttons--not tight, it just fell that way. I wore it on vacation with a nude bra and it was ok but to wear any other way would have necessitated a tucked in camisole.

Really flattering silky top in a soft pink with slight dolman sleeves. I typically wear mediums in tops but I rented the small size and it was perfect. I wore it with high waisted faded black jeans, brown leather sandals and got a ton of compliments. I agree that it is see through so I wore a beige cami underneath.
I find Rails Tops fit to be inconsistent, sometimes I'm a Small sometimes an XS - in this case an XS would have fit better. wrinkles easily. Would rent again in a smaller size.
This was like a belly shirt on me, I didn't end up wearing. Also the buttons were kinda far apart so it showed a lot of skin. Wanted to love it but didn't even wear

links_reviews_title: I wore this while out and about in LA. It's adorable and comfortable.
links_reviews_text: It's thin, you'll need to wear something underneath - I wore a light-colored tank that worked will for coverage but didn't show much through the fabric.

Cute and comfortable, but definitely an oversized fit and I'd recommend sizing down. I'm usually a small/medium and got the medium and I was swimming in it and couldn't wear it. The sleeves have a dolman fit to them too which contributes to it feeling huge.

I loved wearing this top out for Sunday brunch. Received many complements! I usually wear a large top, but the suggested xl fit perfectly. The silk material makes the top a little warmer to wear than you would expect, but it is great. Paired perfectly with a light wash jean and white wedges.

Usually crop-like tops aren't flattering on me because of the cut, but this one hits right below the pant line creating a nice silhouette. The material is so lightweight and comfortable. I love the pattern (are they roses or peaches??). Might have to buy this one!

I wore this on vacation in Vegas and again to work with white jeans. It's a fun top overall, and obviously great for vacation especially. It is a tad short for my taste, though - with my white jeans I felt I had to keep pulling it down all day.

I loved this top and was sad to give it back. Super light weight, yet quality material. The little peaches print were so subtle and cute. Wore this to work and to a friend's birthday cookout and got so many compliments. Love this brand!
True to size, easy to style with shorts or jeans. I wore to work and one a weekend day. I'm only 5'3, I think you might be cutting it close for work if you're taller because it's on the shorter side.
the fabric was great, it felt very expensive. It's more pink than it looks in the photo.

links_reviews_title: Loved it. Subtle print and delicate. very feminine.
links_reviews_text: The peach print is perfect!

links_reviews_title: SO CUTE! Very comfortable and goes with everything. 100% reccomend
links_reviews_text: Love it when I tuck it in to the pants or skirts I am wearing, but does hang a little weird.

I wore this multiple times during the day and out at night and I got SO many compliments - even from random people I didn't know! This is one of my most favorite everyday pieces I've ever rented from RTR.

The cut is great, normally I can't wear shirts cut to be tied at the bottom, as they bunch weird. But this shirt did not do the weird stick out bunching at the bottom. The buttons added a nice delicate touch to the shirt. I wore it to my fairly casual office with black jeans. Note the material is a bit thin, had to wear and cami to make it work appropriate.
Tons of compliments. Very wearable and flattering. Contemplated buying but $170 for a top that I wouldn't consider a staple item seemed steep.
Great fit, wire with high waisted jeans and got tons of compliments. Slightly see through
Cutest summer top! Love it
Loved this! Would definitely rent again or buy. Cute top, slightly cropped so wear something high waisted if you don't like that.
This was a perfect top for brunch but I would never buy the print myself!

links_reviews_title: Way too cropped for tall girls
links_reviews_text: I wanted to wear this to work but it's way too cropped; usually cropped sweaters work with high-waisted pants but this was too short for that. Not super comfortable either. It's too bad, because i'd wanted to rent this for a long time.
It is definitely warm and cozy. A little itchy on the fabric but not bothersome at all. So many compliments and made me feel sexy in the winter

I love this, but I do wish it were about 2 inches longer. I wore a fitted black t-shirt underneath, which looked a little awkward but oh well. Could do the cropped thing for a date or something but when the weather is cold enough for this thick a sweater it's too cold for exposed belly. Still got lots of compliments!

I rented this for over the holiday season and people seriously LOVED it! I got so many compliments on this top. The neck is super cute and the sleeves are a little baggy which makes it super cute with tight jeans. The sweater is also warmer than you would think so it's great for winter time!
Was super warm and cozy, loved it! I did notice the lack of stretch when putting it on but wasnt a huge issue for me since it was a little big.
Really cute and warm although be warned it is quite cropped so I wore a black cami underneath and it was fine
I really wanted to like this sweater, but I couldn't get over the material. Was not comfortable, never ended up wearing it.

I was planning to wear this on a date but it was too cropped. I thought I could save it by wearing it over a fitted black dress, but I ended up trading it in before I got the chance to try that. Listen to the other reviewers... it's small and cropped and the fabric is stiff. I liked the idea and texture of this piece, just not the fabric/fit/comfort.

The fit of this is great! Looks really good over a sheath dress for fall. It's cropped and fitted to my natural waist while also having enough room for my shoulders, and the sleeves are long enough. The fabric is warm but pretty rough and scratchy so it's better with a long sleeved tee underneath.

links_reviews_title: I got many compliments on this sweater!
links_reviews_text: Real cute, different, definitely cropped, and interesting neckline. It was a little itchy.
The sweater is super itchy and has no give. It does not move with you and is just very very itchy.

I rented this for work, despite the bold pattern, so I paired it with black boots to try to neutralize it a bit more. I usually love dresses by this designer, but something was a little off with this one. I felt like I had to keep pulling it down and the ruching wasn't quite right in the waist/hips. For reference, I'm a 2 or 4 depending on the brand and consistently wear a 40 IT (4 US) in this designer.

links_reviews_title: Size up if you don't like skin tight
links_reviews_text: Wear a size 14 and the 50 was skintight, even with spanks. I ended up not wearing because I prefer a little less form fitting. Same great fabric that this designer is known for!!!
Cute print and style. However, this is pretty short. Also low cut and loose in the chest.

links_reviews_title: Cute but very short and low cut
links_reviews_text: Runs true to size. Cute, but if I shrugged my shoulders at all, it showed off my booty. Low cut in the front.

links_reviews_title: Would rent these again even if they were a little too big!
links_reviews_text: I received so many compliments with these pants. While I could have sized down, I was obsessed with these pants as is!

links_reviews_title: way too large but I went what was recommended so I think it was just wrong size for me
links_reviews_text: beautiful fabric just had to return because it was too big

Despite the material having a little heft, these pants are quite see through. I wore them out thinking they'd be OK but caught my reflection in a building window and saw that it did nothing for my lower body - material hangs in both the front and back in an unflattering way. For length, they're great! I'm 5'4" and wore sandals with these and they hit right above/at my ankle.

These pants are a great length even for someone 5'4" however they are completely see through. I am olive skin toned and have a tan so I'm sure that made it worse. When I put them on you could see the entire pocket outlines and every seam and even the contrast of my swimsuit tan on my rear! These need to be lined.
I ordered too big of a size so returned right away and so hoping available as great pant. Super versatile and great weight and cut!

This purse is cuter than the photo does it justice. Adorable! Love the arrow detail. Two sections inside and credit card holder spaces. Very decent size that can be used for anything and fit whatever you need but not overly large. Would buy if it wasn't so expensive.

This dress is a solid choice to quickly throw on and go. It has a different and novel pattern with the mixing of the colorful floral and white polka dots. This is definitely a dress to wear with heels to elevate it. I'm 5'7 and it felt a bit long on me, dipping below the middle of my knees. The fit is also on the loose side, making it feel a bit more boring on me. Overall (on me) this is a solid 3 stars.
I rented this as an everyday dress. I normally am between a 2 and a 4, but I sized up to a 4 for this dress.
This is a great dress. I wore it for thanksgiving + two other times (: I got tons of compliments too. It's great for a bunch of occasions because it's very cute but also pretty modest.

I really enjoyed wearing this dress. Perfect for work or just every day. It's so pretty and the material is very comfy. I'm a 32DD and did have to add a pin to the front so that it didn't gape (I was wearing it to work, otherwise I may not have bothered with the pin). I may try a 6 next time, although the 4 fit great everywhere else.

I am always a size zero and smallest size was 2 Fit was roomy so fit true to size Side zipper Button front Light weight good for transitional weather Not too super low but may need a cami depending on modesty No stretch but comfortable Fully lined not see through Cute with leggings Came above knee at 5'6

This dress was a wonderful choice for a November wedding. The patterns were cute and the fit was outstanding for someone with an apple-ish shape. I'm typically nervous about a dress with a side zipper, but the 16R gave me enough room to spare and I was able to dance/lift my arms freely with no tugging or discomfort. My only complaint is that there is a piece of fabric behind the buttons on the bodice that would not lay flat, so my bra could be seen. Needed tape to keep it laying flat!

I would rent again. PROS -The length was work appropriate. -Breezy, so I feel you can wear both cold and warm seasons. -Wrap dressed that worked well for my body type and comfort. I did need to wear an undershirt, but it did not take away from the dress. CONS -None-
Great flattering and comfortable dress. Tons of compliments

I loved this dress. It's fun and flirty. I paired it with black tights for work, since it is a little shorter (I'm 5'8") and it was great. It complimented my hourglass figure well, while being more flowy. I'm very tempted to buy.
I loved this dress! It was fun and flowy and feminine and perfectly professional. I wore a 6, but probably also could have gone down to a 4.

I wore this for a dinner out and again for Christmas Eve. The dress is high-quality, and the pattern and colors are beautiful. I wore it with cream tights and black riding boots, but you could change up the look in so many ways. I loved this dress so much, I would consider buying it. Go down a size for your backup - it’s big in the top.
Felt SO cute in this dress, that I bought it from Boden the day I returned the dress. Love, love, love.
Loved it, great pattern & fit was perfect. Nice length & long in arms- great for all day.
Buttons were difficult but loved besides

I wore this dress four times! It is soft and flows and is a great length for work. It's super cute with high black boots in the cooler weather. It was loose on me throughout but not in a noticeable way to others. Will rent again.
Perfect fit. Extremely flattering.

links_reviews_title: This dress is fantastic. A great cut, easy to wear and super fun.
links_reviews_text: Loved it
I didn't end up wearing this dress. In person it looked outdated to me, it wasn't my style. The fit was comfortable and worked.

Really loved these high quality, straight fit/boot cut, high waisted, acid wash jeans. Super on-trend and best paired with a cropped top to show off the unique button closure. I’m petite and can run in a 23/24 for designer jeans, and these were slightly large on me. The baggy look still worked, but could only wear once due to stretch.
Loved the length of these -- they fit JUST right so maybe size up if you are nervous!

All of my jeans (different brands) are 29. So glad I took the advice for size large because these fit very snug and there is no give/stretch in the fabric. Loved the look and got compliments at the office. Would rent these again. Need a short/crop top to show the details.
I sized up and it was great! I might still buy thee jeans - I'm obsessed.
It's impossible for me to find jeans of this shape/style that fit me. These were AMAZING and I'm dying to keep them. Never want to take them off
Im a 28 and got the large. There's no stretch so at first they were snug but then they fit well
Order 2 sizes up.
These jeans are fun to wear. They're a tad snug at the hips, but I wouldn't change the size. I wore them at a small get together and to brunch. I might hang on to them for a while.
I usually am a true 25 but these have no stretch at all. If you have a booty definitely size up

links_reviews_title: Probably better for petite girls, unless you size up quite a bit
links_reviews_text: I ordered medium (I'm usually small) but they are almost too tight to button all the way up, and very tight in the thighs.. but the absolute best (worst) part is that they are definitely more of a Capri pant on me. I'm 5'7".. I'm not wildly tall and I don't usually wear "long" pants so these are definitely not ankle length. More mid calf. Just not cute at all unfortunately. My first RTR miss :(
The jeans were of sturdy fabric and very cute, but ran very small. I got the large but still couldn't get them around my hips.

I fully realize preferred jean styles vary widely by body type. That said, I always choose a mid- to high-rise, and I loved that these were straight leg vs "skinny" which I don't like. But something about this fit didn't work on me. They were totally fine and looked cool... I just didn't love them. I probably should have got my real size versus sizing up, but I was afraid the lack of stretch would mean they wouldn't fit. Eh.
Definitely go a size up! Really trendy and comfy jeans. I'm short and these weren't too long at all!

links_reviews_title: Love the look but too tight on waist
Could be cute but ran small

links_reviews_text: These are fabulous jeans. The medium is size 27 so consider sizing up. Super stylish and a great fabric and cut.
Love these! I was surprised they fit as I usually wear anything between a 6 and 10 in jeans. They are stretchy and super comfy
Comfortable, flattering and just the right amount of high-rise
Nice stretch and a nice high waist.

links_reviews_title: Nice pair of jeans - medium/high-rise on the smaller side
links_reviews_text: This is a nice pair of jeans with a good amount of stretch. I do feel they are slightly on the smaller size, but it could have to do with where the "high" rise stops. I have a longer torso and for me they are more of a mid-rise, cutting into my "extra" in a not so flattering spot. If they were an inch higher, I don't think I would have that problem. I still wore them and will give them another shot today, but I think I have other jeans that fit me better, for sure.
Fit at the waist and was super comfy. However I'm short and these jeans were too long.

These didn't fit well. I'm curvy and thought the high waist would be nice. But the legs near the ankles awkwardly stop tapering. So they don't look like a skinny jean at the bottom. I'm sure if you had the perfect bootie they would work, but I didn't love them. The fabric was nice. The hips were fine. But just not my jeans.
Love the cut but they run small which was a bummer because I wasn't able to wear them for my event.

links_reviews_title: Cute, but too small at the waist for me
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a 10/12, 30/31 in pants. The 30 were too tight at the waist to be comfortable. Otherwise, I liked the color and look of the jeans. I would order again in a 31, if available.
Fit like a glove.
Buttons just above the hip bones. Keeping everything tight. Runs a little big so glad I sized down

These jeans sit really well on full hips and stay in place for the most part. There is a nice amount of stretch in the fabric that helps to keep the shape and fit of the jeans with multiple wears. I bought these and will take them to be hemmed as they are a little to long for my short legs, but that's standard for most brands.
Great fit. Nice color and length. Almost kept.

LOVE Agolde and this is an awesome pair. Slimming, stretchy, comfy, this pair has it all. I most often wear jeans with stretch in a size 27 and these fit true to size for me. Slightly cropped at the ankle but the right hight on me (5'6) so that they will be easy to tuck into boots, not too short to be considered summer jeans and not too long that they bunch at the ankles. The perfect fit I think. I wore them twice and didn't notice them stretching out or anything. Will be buying these!

links_reviews_title: Jeans are durable and the denim and color are holding up great.
links_reviews_text: They fit like a 27 which is unfortunate but good to know for next time!
Perfect pair of weekend jeans - very comfy!

I usually run between 27/28, so I sized up thinking these would be less stretchy. Turns out they're very stretchy, to the point where the leg looked more straight than skinny by the end of the night. The pocket placement and stretch on the jean made my butt look wider, but didn't accentuate my curves. But the material was nice, and the rise was the perfect "stay-above-my-belly button" height, so bravo on that. Glad I tried them, would be perfect for someone with less butt than me.

This is one of my favorite rentals ever! The dress is so silky and flattering. I wore this multiple times and always got so many compliments. I definitely had to wear it with tights as it's a bit flimsy and clingy. Wish I could afford to buy this!

Thin silky dress, with fun tie neck and flirty length and flow. It's not lined, so felt like a thin sheath of fabric and picked up a lot of winter static. I wore for a holiday party with tights and heels, but could easily be an all season dress.
Cute for every day office. Went up one size for 32-33 weeks pregnant and worked well. Might rent again!
I wore this dress 3 separate times for work meetings. I received lots of compliments! Will rent again for sure.

Mine arrived missing some buttons on the cuff of one sleeve. However, the dress was still wearable. I received so many compliments on this dress. It's so fun while being modest and appropriate for a variety of events.

I really loved wearing this dress. It's not going to be the most sexy thing you could wear but it's fun and comfortable. I felt like it was different and young without being inappropriate. Just watch out if you're out on a windy night! I got caught in a strong gust and the skirt went way up just as I was trying to get in the car.

links_reviews_title: Adorable but short for tall girls
links_reviews_text: This dress was cute but it was definitely short. I wore it with tights with made it better but then it got all static-ey throughout the day. Otherwise it fit comfy and loose.
Wore a few times to dinner and work with tights and boots
Great fit and perfect for any event

Rented this with my unlimited. Beautiful silk and pattern. Loved the animal print. Dress was very comfortable - loose and flowing. Liked how it buttoned up and tied so it wasn't too revealing. Puffy shoulders were almost too much but they are so in style this season that I've just decided to go with it. Great dress for work or brunch.
The silk, cut an print is gorgeous. It has some fluorescent yellow accents on the print. It is a little narrow on the chest and on the arms. I wasn't able to wear it comfortably.
If you want flattering this is not it, but it will be comfortable! As you can see it has no shape and wrinkles easy, but I wore it for a day of running errands and felt great.
LOVE this! It is crazy comfy and so easy to wear. Paired it with an oversized cardigan for the cool morning. Feels like wearing PJs but looks like I put in some effort to WFH!
lightweight and COMFY. will likely buy it cause i'm obsessed. rent rent rent!!!
Wore for a film festival, loved it!
Loved this sweater! Got several compliments on the pop of color and wore multiple times

This sweater was everything!! So cute and comfy. I wore it to the bar with chunky boots and to work with over-the-knee suede boots. Both times with leather leggings. I would suggest sizing up for even more of an oversized look but beware of the sleeves being too long then. Overall, would rent again for sure!!

links_reviews_title: Felt super 90s chic in this sweater!
links_reviews_text: Sweater isn't super heavy. Runs large. Super soft and comfortable. Fun to pair with black skinnies and sneakers!

links_reviews_title: Love this sweater so chic and warm !
links_reviews_text: This a great sweater you fee good bold and warm

Fun colorful 90s esque sweater. Some reviews said it fit big and could be work with leggings but I am curvier so that wasn't the case for me. Hit right at the waist, I really liked the fit. Super warm, great for a cold NY day
Cute, vibrant and over sized. This sweater fit just right, didn't cling at all which is difficult to find in a sweater this style. It was thick but not too thick and in great shape, highly recommend.

Loved this sweater so much and I received so many compliments. Even my husband asked if he could buy it (LOL!). It also is long enough to where it covers my behind in leggings. Add red lips and you'll be ready for Casual Friday!

Channeled the 80s/90s hard in this sweater. Bright as pictured. Wore with a turtleneck underneath because it was a little itchy. Wore a medium and had some room in the hips. If I'd wanted a fitted look I would size down to a small.
Very warm material - wool and cashmere. Got lots of compliments!

Ultimately I received several compliments, even someone wanting to know where I got it, but I think for me it just wasn't my style. It is oversized and has throwback colors and style for 90s, but I think I just felt really large in it because there was no shape. However, it was nice and warm on a cool fall night.
I loved this casual and soft sweater. It was definitely a statement piece, too. I would say that it runs a tad big, but I liked how it fit on me. I'll definitely rent this one again!

Love the colors of this sweater. So many people complimented me on it! It's supposed to be a little oversized; I'm usually between small and medium and I ordered the small. It's not supposed to be from fitting. I loved it! Very comfortable and the colors make it so versatile. Wore to work and then threw on some jeans to run errands. Didn't want to return!!
I absolutely LOVE everything about this sweater. It's so comfortable and soft. I got so many compliments in it! I would buy it in a heartbeat if it weren't almost $500.........

I typically wear a size 8 and the medium size of this sweater was large--oversized intentionally, but I even had the fold a sleeve cuff because the arms were also long. But it's a fun bright sweater. I wore it with a black wool mini-skirt.

links_reviews_title: Warm and cozy, vibrant color looks good when taking pictures!

links_reviews_text: It is an eighties sweater that looks great with jeans!

I don't think I've ever gotten so many compliments on a sweater before. I wore this so many times, even as my lounging sweater at home because it was so comfy and warm (it's made of wool and cashmere). It does run big, and I think it was more noticeable on my petite frame, but I paired it with tight black leggings to contrast with the larger fit. Ended up buying directly from the merchant since they were having a sale 😛

sweater arrived with a weird little bit of what seems to be dried glue on the left cuff, which I left alone because I didnt want to damage the soft, delicate fibers of the sweater - nobody else would probably notice, because it is so very colorful!
I wanted a pop of color & this sweater delivered. Sizing was perfect, and the sweater also proved to be warm. Very soft & comfy.
Fits great, super soft!

links_reviews_title: Wore around the house. The pattern was too bright for me.
links_reviews_text: Pattern was a little over the top for me but overall a cute comfy sweater.

links_reviews_title: Bright colors and 90's all the way!
links_reviews_text: Adorable with faux leather pants!
I loved wearing this sweater so much, comfy, light, not too warm for the office. I wish I didn't love it so much because sending it back was painful!

links_reviews_title: I was pleasantly surprised when I received compliments on this sweater!
links_reviews_text: Fit was good for a oversized comfy sweater. This sweater was definitely out of my comfort zone, but I'm glad I got it and experimented with it. So fun and bold.

links_reviews_title: Loving this brand. Wore this one a lot and got tons of compliments. I might rent it again!
Soft sweater, print just not my style
links_reviews_text: Comfortable oversized sweater, but pattern not for me. That's why I like RTR, sending back to try some else out.
Nice colors but huge! Definitely should have got two sizes down!
lots of compliments, super comfy and cozy. Perfect fall item.

links_reviews_title: Fun colors; lots of complements; great feel
links_reviews_text: Enjoyed wearing this great sweater. It's so much fun to wear it makes you happy. Great cashmere feel and goes with pretty much every solid bottom.

Got a ton of compliments wearing this! It is a larger fit, but very cozy and the material is nice and soft. I work for a pretty casually dressed office - I paired it with black jeans and black booties. Perfect sweater to ring in the fall season!

This sweater is so cozy and soft. It is not fitted, which I like because it ups the cozy factor. The colors are great and the blocky pattern is fun and gives it a vintage feel. I wore this for a fall day at the pumpkin patch and felt comfortable but still cute.

Love the pattern and the knit, but could not wear it. I went by Chinti & Parker's size-chart measurements and ordered the LL. It is huge. I am sure it is meant to be oversized, but this is just too big. I would need the L or even the M. Sending back.
I rented for a camping trip in 40 to 60 degree weather - they were perfect
Fab and comfy, but my normal size is Small and the Medium felt tight. Will rent again in a large - 122 lbs and 5'6
Paired with a rented BlankNYC Star sweater for a cozy winter outfit. Cute leggings, felt a little like i should be out figure skating!
BUYING BC THEY FIT SO WELL AND ARE BASICALLY MY UNIFORM BUT A UNIQUE VERSION ...

links_reviews_title: Should have had a small lol
links_reviews_text: They are cute and good for my height - if I was any taller they would be high waters They are fitted and not as stretchy as compression leggings but they are leggings - I wouldn't work out in them - they were cute for going out
I wore these post surgery. They were super cozy.

The wide waist band prevented any rolling or muffing topping. I am an hourglass figure so very tight things usually try to roll on me. These were tight. I had to get them over my ankle, pull the leg warmer part up my shins, and then shimmy-jump them all the way up. But this kept me looking pretty trim in them. The material was thick enough to wear them like pants (instead of tights that need to be covered). These are low key, and people think you're just wearing leg warmers.

Cute pattern - black with a beige and purple animal print. Arms, skirt, and chest are loose but the waist is more form-fitting. A tad on the long side - I'm 5' 3" and the dress hit me right above my knee. I probably could have gone a size smaller. The dress has buttons all the way down the front. The buttons frequently come undone, both in areas where the dress is loose and where it is tighter, so you definitely have to wear the dress with a camisole and tights or a slip.
standard long sleeve dress with a high-quality fabric twist. great movement and flirty hemline. good basic go-to look.
You have to pay attention the buttons sneak open once in awhile.

Fit is a bit large and long on my petite frame, but I still liked the dress. It paired well with black ankle boots and black tote. There is purple colouring in the center of the leopard print. Buttons tend to pop open frequently, so need a black slip. Didn't love the poufy sleeves.

Rented this for a meeting and ended up wearing it twice before returning. Great shape, light weight, rich looking pattern, and nice length for someone tall. The only negative thing about this dress is the buttons kept coming unbuttoned. My colleague rented it as well and the same thing kept happening to her at the office.

This was the first RTR order I seriously considered keeping. This dress was perfect for me. The fabric was a little more silky than I expected, but was still breathable. The waist is a little fitted with very little stretch - which could be problematic for some. I was able to dress this up or down, which I loved. Overall, my favorite RTR piece so far.

links_reviews_title: Lots of fun and subtle details
links_reviews_text: This dress is surprisingly flattering. The 8 was large on me but true to size. I wore a belt to help give it shape. The waist seam would have been perfect in a 6. The print has purple in it and a black shiny layer of print that you can see when the sun catches. The buttons were a little finicky and came undone twice

links_reviews_title: Great cut and style! Take a chance on this one!
links_reviews_text: I took a chance on this one and it was worth it. It's not my usually style but it's awesome and I'd consider buying. It has great cut that adds shape, a really pretty silky fabric. I paired it with black tights and booties. Got a lot of compliments. Super comfy too!
This dress fit perfectly. I wore with over the knee boots and another time with booties. So many compliments. Soft fabric but a little bit of static. Would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Love this leopard print silk dress
links_reviews_text: I'm usually a size 2 and this size 2 fit great. Very flattering. You may want to wear a black cami underneath because it gapes a bit at the chest buttons. Wore this to work and again with friends. Very comfie. Would rent again

I wore this with thigh high black boots (because it was extremely cold) to work on a casual Friday, it hits about the knee so no one could tell I had on thigh highs. It fits true to size, but overall is not a tight fitting dress. There are buttons down the front all the way, so it could be made less conservative if you wanted. Loved the pattern, it's super cute. It's a light fabric, so seemingly more suited for warmer weather. Overall, I would rent again, it's super comfy.

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress but the buttons open too easily while wearing!
links_reviews_text: I thought I would buy this when I first put it on. It's very cute. Flattering if you have a larger bust. Unfortunately the buttons keep coming open while I am at work. There are buttons all the way down the front of the dress. It has happened at multiple levels. Pretty dress but this will be a one time wear for me for that reason!

This is a gorgeous dress! Soft fabric, lovely print, fantastic fit. But the buttons come undone constantly throughout the day, and the fabric was very static-y. It was near impossible to wear it to work or to events, so I ended up returning after one wear. Bummer.

links_reviews_title: Loved look/fit but buttons came undone
links_reviews_text: I loved how this fit my body, it was very flattering. The material is soft and comfortable. I paired with tights and heeled booties for work and wore out for date night after. It worked for both very well. Only complaint was a couple of buttons (in the chest and waist area) that kept coming undone.
Feels great on, fits perfectly and is just made to be so flattering on. Love this dress and all the small details
Super cute, but I ordered the wrong size. It was very baggy on me. I think it runs true to size, I've just been on a new diet.

Ran large-ish (loose but not baggy), and hit above the knee. Was perfect for work! Buttons did pop open, so if you are sizing down just be aware that a large bust could make the buttons tough to manage. Buttons all the way up, and soft but refined material. Would rent again.
Fit was great. Not tight, however the buttons would still come undone so I had to keep checking myself while at work.

links_reviews_title: They dress was a perfect go to choice for work. Tons of compliments. Flattering fit.
links_reviews_text: They dress was a perfect go to choice for work. Tons of compliments. Flattering fit.
A comfortable, pretty dress.
Great dress! Would buy or rent again!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress so much, would have bought it if it wasn't this expensive.
links_reviews_text: The dress is really flattering. I really loved it, wore it for work.
Great dress for work

links_reviews_title: Wore this several times & w/a belt. Comfy & flows but the lining makes it safe for work too.
links_reviews_text: Fit was fine except I wanted more of a fitted waist line so I added a black belt. I loved that the sleeves were shear but the lining of the dress allowed me to wear it for fun and to work too.

links_reviews_title: Great dress to transition from work to after work event
links_reviews_text: Really cute dress!
another great day dress
I LOVED this dress. It has such an amazing, flattering fit. It was also incredibly comfortable. I would definitely rent again.
Fits true to size, lose but flattering
Too tight on my bust, buttons kept popping open!
Loved the fit, rented it for a work event and wore with suede high boots ;) would rent again
Wore to work and while on vacation. Cute print. Nice fabric. Can be worn with or without a belt.
Dress is tight around the waist but super baggy in the arms. It looked very bad on me, so I didn't wear it.

links_reviews_title: Fun print makes the dress worth renting
links_reviews_text: high quality material; true to size

I wore a size 10, but I'm normally an 8. It is a loose fitting dress which is nice, but the buttons up the front gape open a bit, particularly when sitting down. Recommend wearing a black cami underneath. I wore with black tights and booties with the dress.

I could have really liked this dress. But I had to wear my coat closed over it because the buttons just did not want to stay closed. Even safety pins didn't do the trick. The dress fit perfect and it was just the right length as well. I don't know if the holes for the buttons just were too loose..unfortunately, since I had to cover myself, I didn't get to appreciate the dress as I would have liked.

links_reviews_title: The perfect work to brunch dress!
links_reviews_text: I'm obsessed with this dress - the color and pattern are adorable, and perfect for a winter-y dress in a not-to-cold climate. I wore with knee high boots and tights, and a leather jacket to work and to brunch, and got compliments in both settings! This is nipped at waist so despite loose fit, it's still flattering. For those with a little extra weight in lower tummy I'd size up or wear with spanx. My husband loved it so much he told me to buy it (and that never happens, ha!).

links_reviews_title: I wore to the office and then to dinner party after work!
links_reviews_text: The fit is true to size, however, I could have gone down a size to a 4 so that it would be tighter in waist. It's not super sexy but has a the ability to be worn anywhere-dressed up or down. I love the soft and thin fabric- very comfy.
I loved this dress, it's really versatile - just long enough to wear to work with opaque black tights, perfect for transitioning to dinner.

links_reviews_title: Cute. Lightweight material though. Better for a NE fall or spring day.
links_reviews_text: Fits well

This dress does run large, I would say the XL could fit at least up to an 18, if not 20. I wore a crinoline under it and it was so much fun. Heavy fabric, great lines, and a flattering print. Go for it!

links_reviews_title: The fabric is heavy and good quality which was perfect for a 60°day.It flowed beautifully.Loved it
links_reviews_text: Great fit, the print is busy and the collar seems like it is a bit much, but it is comes together beautifully

Can not recommend enough. Obsessed with everything Stine Goya makes. The print seems like a lot but more conservative in person. Great flowy cut without being shapeless. Got loads of compliments and will rent again.

links_reviews_title: Many compliments, there is a lot of fabric but in a good way.
links_reviews_text: Fit well, I liked it better with tights for work. It was comfortable and great quality. The fabric was heavy in a good way.

This dress was a hit. Beyond the multiple compliments and unusual color choice which made the dress pop even more, it was comfortable! I chose this dress for a day long of fun in California from DTLA to the Wine Safari. From 8:30am - 10pm I loved my best life. I ate and drank without worrying about any body shaper or tights!

The material was a nice weight, colors & print were nice & modern. Dress just overwhelmed me and made me look larger than I'd like. Probably best for a taller frame. Would look great with tights and boots just wasn't for me

This dress was recommended to me and while it's not typically my style, I think it really worked. The material feels super high quality and I love the pattern! There are more stine Goya dresses on here that I can't wait to get my hands on. Find more stuff I liked on @thanksitsrtr

i'm between 14/16 and the xl fit me perfectly! not too tight in the arms or across the chest. the colors in this are great - 70s chic. i wouldn't wear this without tights because it's a bit short. also -- this dress is extremely heavy...nice because it didn't blow up and it was cold the day i wore it but something to note if you have shoulder/back issues, it's not a light dress by any means.

Love everything Stine Goya makes! This style has a clasp that can be closed for a more conservative neckline. It's a trapeze shape and has great movement! Only gripe- there could easily be pockets but there aren't. Paired perfectly with a Danse Lente bag (also rented)!

I got so many compliments on this dress! The print is "large and in charge" as a coworker says. It fits large but somehow still works. The material is kind of heavy making it a good transitional fall dress. I just loved the slightly billowy shape and bold colors. Fabulous all around!
Definitely runs big but it's such a fun and comfortable dress!! Wore it to multiple events and felt pretty but not over the top!
I loved wearing this dress. It's definitely not flattering, but it's a fashion-forward look. The dress is heavier than I thought it would be and very well made.

This dress was massive, the sleeves hung below my hands and the body swallowed me. It fit more like a L or XL. I gave 2 stars because the material and quality were great. The fit was just way too large.
