If you are uncomfortable with the girls getting loads of attention, do not rent. However, if like me, you actually like emphasizing your curves, then RENT THIS! It's super sexy but casual. I noticed some of the other reviews said the straps kept slipping and I actually found the solution. There's a snap situation inside that hooks to your bra strap to prevent this.

Loved this top! Pairs really well with white pants - I received a ton of compliments. I could have used a medium, but the large worked - the only issue was that the sleeves would fall down off my shoulders, it may have been a size thing.

Loved this top! I got so many compliments! As some other reviewers said, it is a bit more crop but worked perfectly with my high waisted jeans. The sleeves do not stay up on their own but I luckily had some fashion tape that held them in place for the day. It does hit right at the top of my bra so if you are a fuller chest you may be showing more cleavage than anticipated.

This was a cute top for a chill afternoon. Wore it to work on a relaxed Friday and found it was a bit low cut in the front and back for me as the boss, but it was stylish enough that it was fine for Friday. Would just wear to brunch next time! The fit was relaxed and mostly flattering but since it's a crop it did make me look a little short and round. I mean, I'm only 5'4'' so that's not uncommon. Appreciate that it has fasteners in the shoulders so I could hold it in place and hide the bra straps.
Insanely adorable but the sleeves do fall down all the time. A lot of adjusting to wear this shirt but still cute.

links_reviews_title: My very fashion forward brother and his partner loved my outfit and this top made it!
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous color and fabric. I got a larger and it was a little big on me. I think medium would have been perfect

links_reviews_title: So cute but really short, kind of like a crop. Sleeves fall down often.
links_reviews_text: Basically a crop top and the sleeves fall down often. Really cute but you'll be adjusting it all night.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful top - but fit is off.
links_reviews_text: I normally wear a Small or Medium and went with the M in this. The sleeves ended up being problematic and kept falling down. The body is runched and lined, so for that reason, I'd say go down a size if you're in between. The small likely would've fit the same in the torso, but the length would've helped the fit of the shoulders. The colors and print of this top were amazing, and I'll be trying this again in another size! Perfect for a fun party, date night or summer outing.

This shirt is adorable. I got it for a trip to Hawaii. Unfortunately, it just didn't work. One of the sleeves kept falling off my shoulder (seemed to be stretched on one side) and it just wasn't designed for women with larger busts. Almost came up to my belly button. With a high waisted short it was fine but the sleeve really bothered me in the 10 mins I had it on so it didn't make it to the luau. Had to improvise with something else. It could have been an off the shoulder look maybe...

links_reviews_title: There was no way to wear this. In order to have the sleeves not fall my boobs would fall out the top
links_reviews_text: Did not fit in any way. The length of the sleeves to stay on my shoulders made it so the top didn’t cover my top and it was also short.
Loved this top! I would give it 5 stars but the sleeve kept sliding down, I had to tuck them into my bra strap but overall super cute and fitting!

Similar to the other reviews, the sleeves were stretched out or just didn't fit me. It also looked like it had been worn quite a bit, not an issue with the top itself but definitely something I noticed. The colors are great and the body part of the top fit well, just not the sleeves.
Cute style and flattering fit. The middle section is tight without being constricting. The sleeves do fall down a bit, but that's kind of too be expected.

The print is super cute and the smocked waist is so flattering! I wasn't able to wear this because the sleeves are so big. I'm not sure if it's the design or if they're stretched out. They were constantly falling off my shoulders, showing my bra straps.
Great top- Very comfortable!
Really pretty shirt but could size down. The sleeves would fall down sometimes.

links_reviews_title: Cute, but shorter than the model picture would suggest.
links_reviews_text: Cute, on-trend peasant top. Fabric is light, flowy, but not transparent, and I really liked the print. Didn't end up wearing it because the shape just didn't work for me; I'm the type of lady that can't get away with wearing a polo shirt without somehow also looking like I'm the camp counselor you were looking for.
The sleeves have nothing to hold them up ..the sleeves are too loose to look good off the shoulder ..
Very bizarre fit of this blouse. Probably best to size up 2 sizes,. Thin material and will definitely need fashion tape to keep sleeves up. High maintenance.
I couldn't find a bra that didn't have half the top outside corners sticking out. The tube top portion of this top is quite low cut. And the ruched fabric is itchy.
Crop fit and flattering with beautiful pattern
Super cute top. Print is beautiful. Runs true to size. Can be worn with sleeves on shoulders, or with sleeves slightly dropped for an off the shoulder look.
Was too big, but I ordered a L

links_reviews_title: Everything you want in a summer top!
links_reviews_text: Fun, flirty and super flattering. I have zero boobs, so no bra was needed. It was perfect for work, and a summer weekend party!

links_reviews_title: Wonderful color - fit okay but not super comfortable
links_reviews_text: I love the print of this shirt - it wasn't my favorite on. It's short - I'm 5'3" & you have to really like how your pants fit on top - there's no hiding anything. There's no hold-in on the tummy so be prepared for that. I would recommend using the bra straps to hold your regular bra in place - otherwise, (with a strapless, the sleeves would fall down). It's low-cut, but not super low-cut. It's not a super low-maintenance top....but awesome colors/print & photographs well.

There were no straps or any elastic in the sleeves to hold them on my arms. They literally dropped down, as if someone had removed the elastic. I even tried twisting the fabric to make them stay on my shoulders. The fabric was pretty and I had hoped to wear it on vacation but had to send it back.

links_reviews_title: Wore this on Vacation in Greece and then a few times after that :)
links_reviews_text: Great fit, I could have sized down. Got SO many compliments on this and loved wearing it so much I was a repeat offender!
It's a cute pattern & top, but the sleeves fall down - I had to use fabric tape to keep them up
Cute but I didn't wear it because the fit was too awkward. it was slightly too short and the sleeves would not stay on the shoulders they kept slipping down my arms.

links_reviews_title: sleeves do not stay on shoulders
links_reviews_text: did not wear... too large.

Wore this with torn jeans to a concert. Got lots of compliments. Only complaint is that the sleeves kept falling. Friends thought the sleeves falling was cute but it was just a little annoying when you are the one wearing it!
This came in time to wear during our work from home quarantine ! Love it! Light weight and cute.
Perfect cardigan. Great structure and details on the hoodie. I rented again in the medium and it was perfect
I was tempted to keep this one. It functions as a hoodie sweatshirt, but with a heavy sweater material. If it had pockets, I would have kept it. Very soft, good easy fit.
I would consider buying this if marked at a bigger discount. It is a heavier knit. Super comfortable. Warm. Love the design. Got lots of compliments on it.

links_reviews_title: In the words of my 15yo daughter, "It's like something I would have worn from Justice when I was 8"
links_reviews_text: I returned without wearing. Quality of the knit was nice, but the fit was slouchy and the design ended up looking juvenile instead of cute.
This sweater is great quality and I got a lot of compliments on it. Personally, it wasn't fitted enough for my taste.
Too big
Ok. Gives a nice touch to any casual outfit. It's warm and thick. If it had pockets it would've been perfect!

Loved this unique hoodie- the detailing on the shoulder of the birds is what made it, in my opinion. It's warm and perfect for running errands. My ONLY complaint is I wish it had pockets. Even though I knew it didn't have them, my mind kept automatically trying to put my hands in pockets that weren't there. Overall, it's a great piece.
I loved this sweatshirt! It is a wool material and warm and cozy and pairs well with jeans and ankle boots. Color is navy blue (looks black in pics)!
This needs pockets for a perfect review....only reason I deducted a star is because it doesn't. Super cute and looks great with jeans or dresses up!
Super high quality and unique. Easy to throw on over a t-shirt and leggings.
Loved this sweater when I rented over thanksgiving. So I ordered it again for an upcoming trip to Vail. It is a great layer. Really cute, nice thick material.

links_reviews_title: While this is an adorable sweatshirt it felt a little too heavy and did add aton to my wardroble
links_reviews_text: felt heavy-was just ok

The fit is just right, sleeves not too tight, but not baggy; length is great. Rich blue with white peace sign, and a surprise - it works inside out as white sweater with blue peace sign! Two sweaters in one. I wore it a few times and knew I really wanted to keep it. So, I bought it, and continue to enjoy it frequently.

links_reviews_title: This so cute! Great details in the back and in the hood. Very warm.
links_reviews_text: I currently wear a size large in most things. This is a Medium and has plenty of room. I love it! It is quite thick and warm and cannot be worn unless it is chilly/cold outside. Great with jeans and boots and as a layering piece in super cold weather.

links_reviews_title: This was not for an event, just to wear during the day.
links_reviews_text: For an XS this is super big. I like the quality and design but it is very baggy and the sleeves are long.
I love wearing this!! It's so distinct and original; great quality and style... casual elegance.

links_reviews_title: very thick material, wore this on vacation to Miami from Chicago - really cute, very warm.
links_reviews_text: True to size, I got a large for easy oversize fit. Very warm, super cute hit's just below the hip. Love this.
I loved the weight and design of this sweater, but it seemed to collect a lot of lint, or show lint more obviously. Will try more of this brand for sure.
Such a cute casual sweater. I would have bought if it wasnt so expensive.
Loved these! I sized up so they would be more comfortable, and I'm happy I did because they're a bit short for long-legged or tall ladies.
So flattering and fun! I'd rent these again.
These were so fun. Possible a purchase.

These are not only super cute but also buttery soft! Perfect high waist that doesn't fall down during yoga. Loved them so much it was a no brainer to buy them. Never have I had so many compliments 6 at the gym, 2 at tj maxx, and 1 at petco all on the same day. If you love to workout and look stylish while doing it get these pants ASAP
These fun, leggings were Uber comfortable for a day of shopping paired with tennis shoes… Changing into Crimson boots for dinner.

links_reviews_title: Trailer Park Tragedy party- these were a hit!
links_reviews_text: I am a 6 and M was a perfect it

links_reviews_title: Sexy as hell and feel so nice!!!
links_reviews_text: These were awesome leggings that felt so smooth gliding on and were such a kick to wear. Got a lot of positive comments!

These came with the tags on and I might never take them off! Shiny, leopard, perfect fitting and not see through....I can squat, deadlift and run in them. They also photograph well for those motivational snapchats to your friends still in bed ;)

I bought these because I love them so much. The fit is as expected and I love the high waist. The only reason I'm not giving 5 stars is because they are not squat proof. The fabric does become somewhat sheer when stretched.
Cute comfy leggings, good for around the house or out and about.

I rented these to wear to a casual game night at a friend's house and LOVED them. I usually wear a M or L depending on the brand, but the XLR was the only size available, so I took a chance. They were definitely big on me, but not in a saggy or droopy way. They were soooo comfy. And the ultra wide waistband is thick and sort of padded (but not in a bulky way)...it kind of holds you in and smoothes things out. I also loved the bold colors of the pattern and the "realisitic fur" look of the print. I considered buying these, but I already own waaaay too many pairs of leggings so I resisted. I did, however, wear them again the next day to run errands. Definitely recommend and size up if you're unsure on sizing.
Love!! Wore these to a Peloton workout with a black top. Not uncomfortably tight like some other leggings.
They're very comfortable and cool. I wore them to stretch and flexibility class and to a family get together and was surprise at how comfortable they were. It's a must

I've always liked the idea of wearing overalls and have never gone through with the purchase but I'm considering buying these now! The shorts themselves fit perfectly. The overall straps are easily adjustable and stay put. The eyelets are a cute detail and I love the pocket in the front.

links_reviews_title: I like overalls a tad baggy, but not too short
links_reviews_text: These overalls are cute, but I didn't wear them more than once - just not flattering. I probably should have ordered a 29, but the length would have been shorter.
Cute as an unlimited pick and run true to size!

I wore this to walk around Miami while there for a bachelorette party. It fit true to size. It's not too heavy (it was unbelievably hot out the day I wore it). It's a little strange to feel chic in overalls, but I did!

I got so many compliments on it. The texture of it is what makes it pop, highly recommend. I'm typically a small, but I do like when things are a bit bigger. I wore the overalls a few times and definitely felt like they stretched with each wear and sagged a bit lower towards the third wear.
Love 'em will definitely rent again

Is there more functional fashion than a pair of overalls at the beach? Lean into this trend for comfort and ease of use. The white eyelets add an extra detail to set this pair apart from fellow bucklers.
Wore this so many times perfect for summer

links_reviews_title: Fun overalls for a gorgeous NYC day
links_reviews_text: These were super fun to rent. I felt like a cooler version of my childhood self. Straps are adjustable which means they even fit my short frame and pockets were super functional. Will rent again this summer!
Cute white overalls for summer with an eyelet pattern. Worked for me as a shorter girl when most overalls don't- fitted in the hips and butt but not overly tight.

At 5'10 I had to let the straps all the way out and it was still super short but I loved it. It was a great fit, wore it over a bikini top but there are so many options. Looking to buy something similar. Sorry I didn't get a photo.
These were great for summer wear! Wore to lunch one day and as beach cover up another. Loved!
lots of hole in it them that you can't see in pics but look good.

These are average overalls. I wore them one day to run around with the kids. The material is heavy and not that comfortable. I think sizing up would have helped with a looser fit to make them more comfortable around the leg area. I like a looser fit with my overall shorts in the leg area, but that is just my preference.
These overalls are super cute and make your backside look amazing. They aren't too short and are comfortable and versatile to wear. A great summer staple!
Difficult to adjust straps
comfy and cute
These are really cute overalls but overalls are a hard thing to get the right fit. For me the top was too loose and the shorts too tight to get the right look.

Had been looking to purchase overalls for a while but didn't want to spend a lot of $$ cause I know they're sort of a trendy piece. I ended up renting these for a month and wore them 3-4 times. Got so many compliments! Not really eyelet. More of a distressed look.
Perfect fit for Sunday at brunch and breweries! Lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Not my favorite piece. a little boxy and made me look huge.
links_reviews_text: would be better for someone with more hips.

i'm typically a 2/4 and have worn this in the 25 and 26, both were fine. sizing doesn't matter too much since you will need to wear something under. looks so cute w crop tops or even a sports bra. cannot recommend this enough!

links_reviews_title: Too tight on the bottom half
links_reviews_text: Didn't fit well in the torso or backside.
So big and boxy. The fabric has a texture and the legs are shredded very high up on my thighs. I just put it back in the bag and returned right away.

i'm a 25 in jeans so this fit true to size w a little wiggle room. much more distressed than it looks online, but i was into the look. pockets were great. super comfortable. work w bandeau, but tshirt and tanks wld work, too. highly highly recommend as a fun outfit
I loved these overalls. I will probably rent them again. They were so cute. I got lots of compliments. I wore them 3 times. I could see myself wearing them all summer long.
These overalls were so comfortable and yet so flattering too!

links_reviews_title: Adorable and perfect for a hot day. Different and cute!
links_reviews_text: Loved the eyelet detail!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a daytime casual look!
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect. I paired it with a black tube top (not cropped) and felt great in it!
I would probably never buy overalls myself so these were fun to rent and try. I would have liked them to be a tad larger but they are comfortable and a nice change from daytime staples.

Great outfit for a warm spring day. I wore with a black tank underneath but would also be cute just over a bandeau. The shorts have some distressing which I didn't realize from the pictures but it is super cute! True to size and the straps are adjustable.
This sweater is super stylish and I love the light material. Only complaint is the baggy sleeves and short on length. Great for high wasted jeans and a relaxed look.

This sweater is great! Second time renting, loved it just as much as the first. Everything I've rented from this brand I've absolutely loved. This sweater's quality is also very standout. Details are lovely! Highly recommend!
The material is very thick and soft. The detailing on the sleeves make it unique and luxe
This was so comfortable and looked very nice. I wore it with dress pants to work. Should have got a Medium. Was a little big but loved it

Loved this top! Received compliments all day! It's a very relaxed fit, I could live sized down to a small, but medium was still tolerable where it was still flattering. Would definitely suggest trying!
Great casual top that I would wear around grocery shopping and to the farmers market. Love the sleeves and how it fits.
I loved this sweater. Fit perfectly. Pattern and color was so fun.
Got so many compliments. Wore this to work and casual on the weekend
Runs big. Beautiful design. Size down.

links_reviews_title: High quality. Just not my cup of tea. Fit was perfect.
links_reviews_text: The fit was great as usual. It just didn't fit my taste. But I love this program so I can try it and then send it back if it doesn't work out.
I wore this sweater for the holiday break to hang out, nice fabric and nice color. I wore it a couple of time, I really like it.
Slightly oversized fit made this sporty top feel effortlessly cool. Looked great with jeans and tucked both in and out.
not too tight at the bottom, fun print for athleisure wear!

Friends and coworkers alike (especially the men, interestingly) loved this, as did I. Cute and comfortable. It got a little stretched out after a couple wears, and the zipper is almost more for decoration than regular use, but that's all good. Rent this to jazz up your weekend hangout wear!

A cozy, spunky, quality top that works for everyday or for a casual work environment. Very flattering. Wore it with the Colovos two-toned jeans and received so many compliments from my younger colleagues!

This dress is very close fitting. I wear a 6 or 8 and the medium was very very form fitting on me. My family felt it was like the fit of a cocktail dress and then looked like a polo shirt. The colors at the bottom are vibrant and beautiful. I wore it to work from home.

links_reviews_title: Runs a little small, but still stretched over my 18 week pregnant belly.
links_reviews_text: Very cute summer dress... preppy and fun. Mostly TTS. I'm 18 weeks pregnant and could still wear it, but not too stretchy.
I loved this dress. I just have nothing to wear it to because of coronavirus!
This ran huge. I wear Trina Turk weekly and ordered my normal size in this one....I was swimming in it. It was huge all over. Definitely size down, the color and cut are beautiful.
Way too big, should have sized down a few sizes, color is pretty but I wasnt in love.

links_reviews_title: Pockets are not flattering on petite frame I have a waist but could not wear bc made me look chubby

links_reviews_text: Gorgeous bead work. Perfect for a tropical vacation or formal affair. Fit my phone, lipstick, chapstick, small bronzer palette, without being squished. Would rent again.
I wore this dress to a wine tasting event and also to work, and I felt like it worked for both. It's very comfortable and I love the sparkle.
Just enough cleavage showing to still be work appropriate. Anything larger than my bust size might not be for work. This dress was fun and comfortable. I felt sexy and got a ton of compliments!

True to size. Glittery, so depending upon the work environment, might be too dressy for work. However, can be worn with a blazer to tone it down for work (although I paired with a black leather jacket for work). Mid calf length on me. Lower cut, but not too low for work.
Loved this dress so much. So pretty and comfortable

links_reviews_title: Added a nice sparkle to my work day. Comfortable with a little of jazz. Live the dress.
links_reviews_text: Snug in top, but I'm busty, sexy and comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Overall fit good but runs long!
links_reviews_text: Comfy and beautiful but is very long need to wear high heels for it to look good

links_reviews_title: Comfy but tricky waistline and heavy material.
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'5" and built like a square at the moment so this did not work for me. The waist hit me at a weird spot and the heavy skirt fabric pulled down so it couldn't have been less flattering. Large size fit fine, comfy fabric with a nice sparkle for an understated look, just didn't flatter me. Waist in photo is 31, hips 40, bust 38.

This dress is a 10- feels like pajamas Fits true to size maybe a tad roomy Wore a cami for modesty but wasn't too low Warm but not too thick - no itch. Sometimes metallic fabric can be bothersome and scratchy but this is soft Excellent quality sturdy dress with pleats Shimmer is perfect not too much
Adorable sweater dress material that is not revealing in the chest, and not itchy. Nice below the knee length with a pleated skirt. Really pretty for work, church, dinner/date.

FABULOUS dress! Such a great fit and fabric. Doesn't wrinkle, has a nice weight, and not at all it hot as some metallic fabrics can be. It's really soft and feminine. Received many compliments. Rent this dress, especially if you're tall!
This dress was super nice material and flattering. Would be very comfortable to wear all day, I never ended up wearing it because it was to long for me.

links_reviews_title: First perfect. Dresses up or down and so comfortable.

links_reviews_text: This is a great dress-the color is great, and the fabric is forgiving and easy to wear

Obviously you can't see this in pictures but the way this dress flows and moves it's DREAMY, the little sparkle is so subtle yet so unique, it's impossible not to look at it, even being such a basic design, it does wonders for a girl's curves. I can see myself renting this over and over

This is a good dress to either dress up or down. Can do with heels or flats. Light sparkle so could do for a party or holiday event, but I wore for work and didn't feel like it was too much. Really comfortable and flattering knit. True to size, which isn't always the case with knit. It is below the knee (I'm 5'6) which is a consideration depending on your height. Got a lot of compliments
Great fit, nice weight and sparkly fabric. I wore with flats to work, could dress up with heels for a night out. Would rent again.

I wore this for work and the length was very appropriate. I was actually surprised at how long it was (and I'm 5'9). Shorter girls beware if you don't like your dresses too long. It was super comfy, and I love the sparkle. I expected it to be too tight but it had just enough stretch to fit perfectly but not show off any curves you don't want to be seen. I'd rent again in the later fall or winter time and wear tights with it.

Such comfortable stretchy material! Length is mid calf so might not work on shorter people. Band at waist is small but stretchy. Very sparkly could totally be dressed up for night out. I wore with over knee black boots for work winter look.
Not bad, like the different length. There's a sparkle to the dress but not over the top. Warm yet thin sweater material. Wore these with leather knee high boots to work. Would rent again for work.
Beautiful dress. I wore it to work. But would be great for a winter wedding or cooler weather date. Super flattering.

I was concerned the small might be a bit big, but it fit perfectly. This dress feels and looks great, and the sparkles make it just fancy enough to transition to evening from work. It's very soft and warm as well.
Great fitting dress! Very flattering and comfy. Definitely sparkly so rent for after 5. Hard to capture in pix
This was a little fancy but I still wore it and got compliments. Fits true to size. Would rent it for a winter wedding or NYE for sure.

This dress lives up to Kate Spade's motto "she leaves a little sparkle wherever she goes." I paired this dressed with a charcoal blazer and wore this dress to work. The dress was great for my body type (tall and curvy). But it was a little snug in the bust area (I wouldn't recommend it for anyone larger than a 36C.

Really good basic sweater dress. Has a stretchy waistband, pleated skirt and the faux wrap upper part is seen shut throughout so no concerns with cleavage getting worse over the night. The fabric was starchy but soft. Wasn't the best sweater material but definitely not the worst either. Big bonus is despite the sparkly fabric, it was not itchy so yay! Great dress for holidays or when you want a little sparkle but still want to be really comfortable.

If you have an hourglass figure this would be perfect. I don't, but still loves the dress. The fabric is very sparkly, hard to tell in pictures, so perf for formal/casual affairs like Xmas eve, but not so much for work.
Fabulous dress. Very flattering and comfortable. Dress is more beautiful in person, love the sparkly material. Wore to a work holiday party and Christmas party. Will definitely rent again.

I wore this dress for Thanksgiving and it was absolutely perfect. Beautiful and pulled together but also...seriously the MOST comfortable dress I've ever worn. The fabric is buttery soft. I wore this with tall suede boots and loved the look. I want to own this one! Another note- doesn't wrinkle- great for travel!

I liked this dress. Comfortable and put together. Perfect for a conservative look at a wedding or work party. I originally rented this to wear to a work party but decided to go with a sparkly blazer instead for that event. I wore this dress to work with tights and a cropped leather jacket and it was perfect.

Beautiful fit and flow of fabric. The weight of the skirt is pleasant and warm while still twirly. I feel like a ballerina in my office. This could certainly be worn out to dinner or a special event....bit great to add something special to your Thursday.

links_reviews_title: I was planning to wear this to a conference during cocktail hour.
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress. Just too small.

links_reviews_title: Very flattering fit. Love the fabric.
links_reviews_text: Fits as expected. Love the style of the bodice. The sleeve length is a unique detail.
Great fit! Classy and fun to wear.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, comfy dress. Maybe not for work.
links_reviews_text: PRO: I loved this dress. It fit like a glove, was flattering for a curvy person, and the skirt was beautiful. CON: I rented this for work, but once I had it on I looked like I should be headed to a New Year's Eve party. I didn't feel comfortable wearing this to work. Since I didn't have any event to wear it to, I sent it back. May rent again once I have a fancy party to go to.
Loved the fit - it's very flattering while being super comfortable!

Great dress for work! Loved the fit, plenty of room in the shoulders, not too low cut, waist hit at a good spot for someone who is tall, pleated bottom had nice flow, hit mid-calf (I'm 5'11"). It's this beautiful, slightly metallic fabric that stands out but not in a bad way. Got lots of compliments. Would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Looked a bit more causal than I was hoping for, but nice comfortable dress.
links_reviews_text: Heavy material.

links_reviews_title: This dress is very pretty. Not true to size.
links_reviews_text: The dress is very pretty, however runs small.
Felt tight and not flattering.
The waistline makes for a weird bulge if you are a little pear-shaped.
It was a little roomie around the waist but a nice fit over my wide hips. I got lots of compliments but it definitely needed to be belted to stay in the right place.

links_reviews_title: Awesome fall skirt, easy to wear
links_reviews_text: A little big in the waist, size down. Wool weight is great for autumn / winter. Slit in leg gives interest while you walk.
loved the asymmetrical drape and plaid print. it ran a little large but was comfortable to tuck in a turtleneck. definitely looks its best when wearing a slight heel!

links_reviews_title: Perfect skirt for fall! Great for dressing up or down as well.
links_reviews_text: The only thing I didn't love about the skirt is that it was a little bit large in the waist and the waistline was not constructed super well. It was a bit flimsy and rolled over quite a bit. Otherwise, really loved the piece.

Definitely runs big. Got a size 0 based on reviews (normally wear a 0-4), and it was still loose. Belted it to make it work. Perfect Fall skirt though! Nice heavy wool feel, but has some swing. Well made. Got lots of compliments.
I thought this might be a cute retro skirt but it's so boxy it made me look dumpy. maybe curvier girls will have better luck. also, the underskirt rides up easily.
Great fit! Good winter or fall skirt.
This skirt was perfect for cold winter days paired with tights and a sweater! Runs a little bit, I would size down.
Unfortunately didn't get to wear this since it was way too big, but the fabric and cut was really nice!
This skirt is easy to wear and is the perfect length to pair with flats or booties. The fabric is also high-quality and rather wool-like, so it's definitely a winter skirt.
Cute print and conservative enough for work.
Generous fit. I'm usually a size 8 and wore a 6. It's very pretty for fall and winter with boots, tights and a sweater. I'll probably wear it to a Burns Night gathering.

links_reviews_title: Nice, but can't be worn with tights
links_reviews_text: Tried to wear with tights and no slip and the fabric stuck like velcro - super cute otherwise

I'm typically a size 4 but I find that Vince skirts run a size too large. Having rented about 3-4 skirts from this brand I always size down from 4 to a 2. Even a size 2 in this skirt is slightly large but not to the point of falling off. A size 0 may not fit in the hips. If you have a straight body type size down 2 sizes and if you are curvy size down 1. Overall it's very warm and perfect for the colder months.

links_reviews_title: Great skirt worn with tall boots and a sweater.
links_reviews_text: Loved the skirt but was at least two sizes too big- I could pull it on without unzipping it. Wore with a bulky sweater tucked in and a belt and fit ok, but would recommend sizing at least one down.

links_reviews_title: The skirt is so soft and I got some many compliments. I will most likely rent again!
links_reviews_text: Runs big. I am normally a 4 and could have used a smaller size.
I was hoping to wear this as a sort of high-waist skirt situation but it sat closer to my hips. Still a great piece, but wish i'd sized down.
A bit frumpy. Runs large.
Great skirt for fall, however ran very large and I had to pin the skirt in

I really love this skirt! I was surprised however at how large it is. I am normally a 6 and ordered a 6, then returned for the 4, and the 4 is still large! Going to return again for the 2 and it will be perfect.

Great skirt getting me excited for fall outfits. This runs big though, I am usually between a 6/8, trending more towards 8. I wore the 6 in this skirt and it's a little big in the waist. It also has some stretch. I wore it with a black ribbed tee and white boots
I usually wear a size 2 so I got a 2 but the waist it too loose. It's very cute for fall though! Maybe I should have gotten one size down.
fits larger than expected. thicker material than i expected, but still cute!
Rented this during the pandemic for mandatory outdoor trips for necessities or fresh air. Loved the colors and the comfort --- a great way to dress up a pair of sweatpants for quick errands!

This is a super fly puffy coat. Wore it to a party around a fire pit and people went nuts for it. The collar is particularly nice and well made. Stands up well. The coat is kinda short-hits right at the waste. For a not actually vintage coat, I was very impressed by the vintage look. Told someone it was made by Coach and they couldn't believe it. Real cool puffy.
I've never been so close to dropping $600 on a jacket! I absolutely love this beauty. Fun colors, easy fit, AND kept me warm all day?? How can you say no.
True to size, great retro look. Kept me warm in the Michigan snow.

This jacket is great - flattering fit, great color combo, and unique enough to make a statement while still being great for every day wear. Warm enough for cold NYC days (and you can still fit a sweater underneath). I've received compliments every time I've worn it - it's been my favorite rental by far!

This jacket fits but I wish it were a tad longer and had more room. RTR recommended me to get a 4, but I should have known better, a 6 would be better fit. The jacket feels like heaven on and is very well made.

links_reviews_title: I am OBSESSED with this coat. Feels like butter on your skin.
links_reviews_text: I am OBSESSED with this coat. Feels like butter on your skin. All the hardware on the coat is very high end. IN LOVEEEE.
Just like the photos. So comfy and beautiful. Very warm.

I loved wearing this jacket! The material is very soft and while it's light-weight, it's surprisingly warm. I'm glad I went with the size 2 over the 0 because this jacket definitely runs small in both length and width.
I loved this jacket. I kept it for about a month and wore it a ton. The fabric is super soft and there is not a ton of puffiness to the coat to make it bulky.

I wore this jacket a ton when I had it. It is flattering, warm and stylish. Always got a compliment on it when I was out. I would definitely buy it if the discount was a little bit better. Highly recommend trying

links_reviews_title: Perhaps the best casual coat I've put on my body. So cute, colors are neutral but stunning. LOVE!
links_reviews_text: No cons, every single pro! It is warm but you don't really sweat in it. It is casual but can be dressed up. Hits perfectly at the waist and I'm 5'4. Love!

links_reviews_title: I will be wearing this all fall and winter!
links_reviews_text: Wow- not a single con to this jacket. It fits like butter, is puffy but doesn't make you add an inch of "weight" to your look at all. The colors are fantastic, love the retro look, and the collar lies perfectly. 10/10. My fav thing I've rented from RTR so far with my unlimited subscription. I'll be keeping this for months!

This was a fun rental, definitely not a closet staple. Rented for date night. Classic cut blazer is loose fitting without being overly baggy. Ruched sleeves are a nice touch. Rent this blazer if you want to stand out in a crowd!

I wore this with a leather skirt, tights, and booties for a bachelorette party to a drag show. I felt super confident but had to get past the fact that this blazer slightly made me feel like a businesswoman! it fit well, kept me warm but not hot, and was overall super comfortable. I wish I had more events to wear this to!
I wore this to a work event and on the weekend. Fun to spice up your outfit in a fun yet classy way
Very nice fabric with modern cut. Bunched sleeves were cute. Will probably rent again.

Super comfortable jacket with a ruched sleeve to make it look pushed up and casual. Works with jeans , leggings, whatever--- a perfect grab and go and feel you're dressed 'just right' for any occasion-- looking good !

links_reviews_title: great and easy to wear. Wore it over black jeans and a black top.
links_reviews_text: fit well - was comfortable and lightweight.

links_reviews_title: Runs a little large but not too much. comfy Fit The ruched sleeves are brilliant. Will rent again.
links_reviews_text: Ruched sleeves are the best.

links_reviews_title: This was a great suit jacket
links_reviews_text: I love this and he sleeve runching was great. I wish it hung a little closer together.
This jacket for well and is very nice quality. It was comfortable to wear for work and then dressed up a bit more for Friendsgiving. Fun piece!
Excellent fit - i got lots of complements!
I loved the ease of this dress and considered buying it. I paired it with boots to dress it up, but could also flats to make it more casual.

I had fun wearing this dress- wore it to work a couple times and got quite a few compliments. It is short so I wore tights and the elastic waist also can ride up. Because of the cut of the dress, the breast area looks a little weird but still cute.

links_reviews_title: Stretchy waist and neck & fun florals!
links_reviews_text: I want to keep this dress I love it. The neck and waist are elastic so it's very forgiving. The pattern is feminine and fun. Really love this dress, highly recommend renting it.

links_reviews_title: It made me so happy to wear this, and that is such a key factor in the clothes that I wear.
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved everything about this dress! The fit is great, and its very feminine. It is a dress that you could dress up or down, a great quality to have. I considered buying this one, so I know anyone who rents this will love it as well.

You can dress this dress up or down! I ended up wearing it with tights and booties because it was very cold the day I wore it. The reason I gave 4 stars is because the fabric is very thin/sheer. If you are wearing it on a sunny day, I would highly suggest wearing a slip or something under it. The fit is great and I felt comfortable in it all day- I wore it to a baby shower brunch and an afternoon baptism.
Cute but nothing special. Flattering cut and great length for a taller girl, wore to work and out to dinner.
Wore this to a bridal shower to be more "casually dressed up". Very comfortable and I love the colors.

I ordered up per recommendations, but there was so much bunchy extra fabric above the waist. The fabric is also a bit of a dull print in person. I thought that the neck was cute, though. It looked better with a black blazer on top, but still just sending back.
I wore this for Christmas Eve and loved it. It's such a cute fit- especially for us girls with larger chests. I sized up and I'd recommend if you're taller!
I wore this for a trip to Napa and loved it. The XL was the only size available, it was a little baggy but that worked with the style for the day. I could have wore the M or the L.
This is a fun and easy-to-wear dress. Reviews said it ran small but I found it ran TTS, if I rent it again I'll get the S.
I felt so cute and girly in it, even though the colors are darker. Was a good length, very comfy and all around an amazing dress I'll rent again!
The top was a bit too baggy for me. The dress itself was comfortable. The length was short and showed off my legs.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments, cute and conservative, perfect for work
links_reviews_text: This was really cute I was tempted to buy it, but I'll rent again! Pretty frill detail at the neck, pretty flower pattern.
The perfect long sleeve work dress for winter. Stretchy neck and waist!
Dress is cute but didn't really do anything for my body type. The print is super cute, and it was a great dress to transition from work to dinner - it just wasn't the most flattering for me.
Simple but cute. Wore to Bonefish for happy hour. Thin fabric do best for fall or spring. Will rent again.

This is a great work dress and I also wore it to a shower. Very comfortable, cute, easy to wear. It's not a standout but a really nice workhorse of a dress. I wore it with a leather jacket and boots, with leggings and booties and with heels--all worked great. Not too short either.
The dress was super cute but totally see through! Not necessarily good for work because of this. Otherwise very cute and could wear for a date night.

links_reviews_title: cute dress to wear to work.
links_reviews_text: fits perfect
Ordered XL but it was too big. Usually size 8/10
Good for a little change. I wore it with tights and brown tall riding boots. A little cool for New England in the late fall, so I only wore once.
Loved this dress for work during cooler weather. I got lots of compliment and wore twice before I sent back! I might rent again! Fits true to size and is very comfortable and easy to wear.
I wore this to a birthday party and to work! Really versatile, can be dressed up or down. Great fit and comfortable too!
Really comfortable dress for work - a bit on the shorter side but okay with tights.
Easy to wear, flattering, cute dress. Worn it to a brunch with friends. Many compliments! Would rent again.

I wore this dress to work and it was comfortable throughout the entire day. The length was fine on me but may be too short for taller women. It fits larger busts well without being baggy in other areas. I thought the shape and style were very flattering but I wasn't the biggest fan of the pattern. A+ for fit and style and a B- for pattern.

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit, lots of compliments, loved it.
Great blouse- versatile and pairs well with matching pants
links_reviews_text: Loved this Jackie-O style top. I only wore once with the matching pants (worm to work) but considered keeping a while longer as I know I'd find other things to pair with it. Nice thick but not hot fabric. Length hit at hip bone on my long torso.
I loved this and ordered a new on after I returned it. It is simple and classic. I am normally a 10 but rented the large because a medium was not available it is was fine.
It fit perfectly and the material is perfect for fall weather and chilly offices. I loved the collar and sleeves and overall simple but sophisticated cut.
This shirt was super comfortable. I had to wear a strapless bra and also high waisted pants since this was a tiny bit short.

links_reviews_title: Reminded me of Jacky Kennedy, loved this!!!
links_reviews_text: Appropriately loose fitting. The neck line was ver complimentary to my broad shoulders. Every loved this. This felt very high end and still work appropriate and professional.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to work and felt like Jackie O!
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly! I love this top so much.

Great fabric that holds the shape and gorgeous neckline - the color is very dark so can go with lots. It fit a little snug on me, I probably should have sized up. Was perfect for a zoom meeting where I looked wonderfully put together :)
Lots of compliments! Wore with skinny jeans and kick ass boots. Very classy
Classy love this top!!
Fit but the fabric is thick and warm, so too hot for Houston!

links_reviews_title: Love love love this top. Very classic and received so many comments on it.
links_reviews_text: Is a bit short in the waist so be sure to wear a cami underneath or at least I do especially for work

This was a great top - I received quite a few compliments and it fit just perfectly. It's unique, and it's definitely a cold weather item, and since I'm losing weight, I didn't buy it - I won't be able to wear it next year. Beautifully made.
I really liked this top. The boatneck looks very classy. I'm usually a size 4 on top, rented the small, it fit great. It's a little short, so I wore a black tank top under it.

links_reviews_title: I was on television for an interview and this top was perfect! I might purchase it.
links_reviews_text: Fit nicely, very comfortable.

Fit true to size. Not a lot of give to get in and out of and it will show your midriff if you lift your arms for any reason. Best paired with mid or high waist. The collar and neckline are quite flattering.
Very cute on...neckline is fun to wear and different.,
This top was great. Really debated purchasing.
The standup round collar reminded me of Jackie O's style. It was very comfortable. Good for work or casual weekend wear.
Tempted to buy it. Beautiful color, great fit, classic shape.
Quality fabric, not flimsy. Wished I could have rented the matching pants at the same time, but work with black cropped dress pants and leopard heels. Received tons of compliments.
Very comfortable, flattering neckline

links_reviews_title: This top is beautiful. Very classic.
links_reviews_text: Perfect. Might have an issue if you are small chested because of the tailoring.

Super cute. Great color, great fabric. It's a bit boxy and a bit shorter than I (with a bit of a gut) would prefer, but I really liked it nonetheless. Wore with cream pants on one occasion and with jeans on another.

links_reviews_title: Easy instant outfit, comfortable and stylish
links_reviews_text: True to size and comfortable. Nice material. Flattering cut

Classic look and very easy to pair with pencil skirt, cropped pants or long pants. I'm a normal size 8 but rented L @ the SF store, because this is the only size available. Still looks great not too loose. Will keep this for a while.
The top fit well, although I feel that it was a little boxy on me since I have a pretty petite torso.
Love this top! Classic, with a modern vibe. It can easily go from casual to dressy. It runs true to size (I am 5'6" , 135lbs and I wore a small).
Loved the tailored look of this.

links_reviews_title: Nice blouse with interest for WFH
links_reviews_text: This was a nice blouse with some pizzazz for work at home where only the top shows. It is a little frilly with the shoulder flair, so as long as you like that, it's good!
Super short -- I can't recommend it for tall ladies. But it was so fun!! Light and perfect for spring. The interior pocket details are gorgeous, as are the illustrations.
This style is very Monse, definitely turns heads on the streets! (I'm imagining, no one on the streets these days!)

First time trying a jumpsuit and I went way outside my comfort zone with this! Highly recommend this unique, incredibly well made piece. Mechanic's coveralls kind of vibe. Substantial cotton. Comfortable. Very roomy around my midsection/rib cage, but I'm narrow there. Should work well on many body types (I'm pear shaped). Not the most flattering thing I've ever worn, but it still works it's magic. Runs a smidge big. Wish I would have rented some big statement earrings to wear with it!

LOVED this jumper! Fit perfectly chasing after my 4 year old, no adjusting needed. Noticed lots of wrinkles, could have been due to all the sitting and Zooming though. SO comfortable. Will definitely rent again!
Wore for a regular day at work and got tones of compliments! Might rent again because it's a great way to spice up casual wear!

links_reviews_title: This is a great top for any kind of situation and it's so comfortable.
links_reviews_text: It's pretty straightforward - it's just a silk t-shirt with open, comfortable, un-restricting short sleeves. I loved it.
Pretty every-day top, nice length shoulder to waist and in the sleeves. Nice floral for a dreary day.
Added this to my shipment last minute and so glad I did. Was lovely with white skinny jeans but would also be great tucked into a skirt for work. Beautiful colors and material.
I was hesitant on this top, because it's a little boxy, but was able to nicely tuck it in to give it some shape.
I wore this for a casual dinner with my husband and absolutely loved it! It's simple, flattering, and all round a perfect top.
I wore this for a work event as well as with shorts. I love it. Very classic. I wish I could own it!

I wore this top to work. The fabric was really nice and the flutter sleeve added some interest to an otherwise straightforward silhouette. I unexpectedly got many compliments at work which was fun. Highly recommend!
Pretty and floaty, this top was perfect for a casual Friday. The fabric is lightweight but not see through, making it great for summer. Not special enough to keep, but fun to wear.
Perfectly nice top for a day. Fit was great and the fabric was high quality.
Loved this top. Pretty cream color with the pattern accents. Loose fit
Nice lightweight material and hangs nicely.
It fits great and is stylish but it was HOT
Rented for everyday maternity wear....and ended up wearing every. day. So comfortable - flows perfectly - covers maternity jeans toppers - can be dressy or casual!
Loved this shirt for work. It fits true to size.
Rented this for work/everyday and it's a cute top. Didn't love it didn't hate it.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful top, fits nicely. Got compliments!
links_reviews_text: Size down, great shirt for everyday or dress it up!

links_reviews_title: Great shirt - works well with jeans or work pants.
links_reviews_text: Loved this shirt tucked in the front to a pair of navy slim ankle pants.
wore it several times and received compliments

links_reviews_title: Great top - beautiful print and great shape
links_reviews_text: Received a ton of compliments on it. The blouse drapes well over a fuller bust and could be dressed up and down easily
A looser fit top, but very pretty and lightweight!
It's a nice top with some good flow and a complimentary fit. It didn't stand out, but was still a nice top.

I really liked this shirt. Wore it with jeans to work. Very flattering. Loved the flutter sleeve. Loose enough fit to tuck in or just do front tuck if preferred. Love the blush pink with floral print.

This is a great top and I got lots of compliments. I work in a setting where sleeveless tops are not acceptable, so finding a summer blouse can be a challenge. I wore this with high waisted navy slacks and it looked great.

links_reviews_title: Lovely top - perfect for regular wear
links_reviews_text: I wore this to the office a couple of times and got so many compliments. The color and fabric are beautiful and it can truly be dressed up or down. I wore it once with jeans for a polished casual look and another time with suit pants for a more professional look. It was great both times. The top is a little boxy, as others have mentioned. But, the fabric moves nicely, so I didn't feel like my body was done any disservice by the straight shape. My only complaint is that the single button closure on the back (fabric covered button with loop) is a little difficult to work with and I needed help to button up in the morning the first time I wore it. The second time I was home alone so I kind of struggled, but managed. Oddly, getting it unbuttoned did not pose the same challenge.
Nice cut. Very feminine.

The material feels luxurious, the floral pattern is perfect for spring or summer, and the button detail in the back is pretty. It fit well. I wore it with jeans or jean shorts both times, but you could easily wear this to work. It's a versatile top.

links_reviews_title: Super cute for a fun day at work!
links_reviews_text: Cute and comfy shirt
I wore this to work with white pants. Very comfortable and the print is nice.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to an afternoon at an art museum.
links_reviews_text: The top is meant to be oversized, but I still could have sized down and it would have looked better on my body type. It is a very square cut, and has a lot of fabric in the width of the top. I did love the color and the print on it was beautiful.
Loved this top pairs with dark jeans and nude heels! Will definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Nice sleeves. Fits very nice, looks expensive.
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable. Good length. Can tuck in or leave out.

I wore this to work with heels, tucked in with tan belt and navy pants. I wore it tucked out with black cropped pants and black flats. I also wore with Jeans and Gold sandals in a vineyard on a Saturday. Love this top. I would buy it if it weren't so $$$$.

links_reviews_title: Not as nice as it looks
links_reviews_text: Fabric is heavy for summer. Pretty print, but runs very large.

I loved the print on this top. It would be a perfect summer blouse. It fit perfectly at my busy and waist and then snugly at my hips. I'd have been tugging at it all day long or, if tucked, it would have been riding up. If I owned it, it would be a quick fix at the tailor to open up the bottom slits a bit. But, it's too expensive a top to buy for something so one-seasonal in my view. if it fits you, rent it!

This runs large, but I'm not sure if a smaller size would be big enough if you're hippy. The fabric was comfortable and the print was pretty. I wore it once with white pants and once with jeans and it looked great both times. The fit was very loose and boxy. Despite all its good qualities, I just didn't love it and wouldn't go out of my way to rent it again, but wouldn't avoid it either.

links_reviews_title: Perfect jeans to be both dressed up for night but still great for everyday wear.
links_reviews_text: These jeans are extremely comfortable. They have a nice stretch to them. I love them!
Loved this. The flare leg is soooo flattering but I ded couldn't been fine ordering the 6
Fit a little big, but I tend to run between sizes. Super flattering, the perfect stretch for a comfy wear all day
I loved these so much I bought them. There is a decent amount of stretch, so if you are between sizes, go down. However, unlike most stretchy jeans I've tried, these are super flattering.

links_reviews_title: RTR suggested a size up- NOT necessary.
links_reviews_text: 14 is my back up size and it's not unusual to need a size up on jeans but this was SO big I'm not convinced my size 12 wouldn't have been too big. Other than sizing issue, jeans were thick material and very black which I like.
Very stretchy dark black jeans. Cut is good, but I prefer my denim rigid and with little to no stretch. If you like soft, stretchy jeans then you might like these.
Loved these so much. I'm 5'1" and wore these with 5 inch platforms and they were great. Definitely ran big... I'm a true 6, but need a 4 in these. I'll return the 6 and buy the 4!
I’m usually an 8 in jeans but I sized up in these just because the 8 wasn’t available and they actually fit great. They are so comfy and flattering.
I'm so in love with these jeans I want them in every color possible! No belt needed, does not stretch out through the day and very comfortable
These fit like a glove. They were true to size and had a nice stretch to them if you're in between sizes should be perfect. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Cute dress for work. A little on the short side

links_reviews_text: Sadly couldn't wear this one. The top was a lot smaller than the bottom, and I'm pretty small chested.

links_reviews_title: So cute but not great for a bigger chest
links_reviews_text: I really liked this dress and did end up wearing it on my date. But it is a little short so I wore dark tights and it is tight across my chest so I had to wear a cami with it. Still very cute and I would rent again
This dress was very comfortable & easy to move in all night. It was a bit on the shorter side for my uncle's 50th birthday but the black tights did the trick to make it winter-y & appropriate

links_reviews_title: Conservative enough, yet modern and cute!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to my Christmas at my boyfriends house. I wanted something that was cute but not too revealing. It worked great and I got lots of compliments! The only suggestion I have is to wear a tank top underneath. I have a small bust but there would sometimes be a gap between the buttons if I moved a certain way
Wore this to a bday dinner with my husband. Long sleeves were perfect for the chilly weather and short-ish length (I'm 5'8) provided the right amount of sass!
I rented this dress for my 30th birthday and it was perfect. I received compliments all night. The dress is a little short but not too short.

Loved this dress! The fabric is really nice and the fit is very flattering. It was a little short for my liking and I had to safety pin the gap between the second and third button. I would go up a size if I was to rent again.

links_reviews_title: Buttons don't fall at all like they show in the model picture
links_reviews_text: The buttons on this dress make zero sense. I have a small bust and there was a huge gap. It's almost like there is a button missing when there isn't. It's a design flaw. Be warned this dress is unwearable

This dress, like other reviews said, was strangely small. The length was super cute and flirty, but the waist was slightly tight even with elastic. The chest was the real problem. I'm fairly small, but the buttons pulled apart when they were buttoned, and leaving them undone made me a little uncomfortable. I kept having to pull the dress up on my shoulders and down in the front, so it wouldn't pull so badly. All in all, just a poor fit.
Loved the dress but the buttons were gaping in the front and I do not have a big chest. I had to wear a tank underneath the dress to make it look better
I'm still contemplating if I should just purchase this dress because I love it sooooo much! Great for every day or a night out!
Great with leather jacket and booties, cute sleeve detail, long enough that you don't have to wear tights, wore to birthday party and it worked perfectly

Flattering for all sizes as it sinches in at the waist. The ruffles & flounciness made me want to size down. Definitely better if worn with dark tights as the front can be a touch short. Overall, adorable dress!

Great burgundy/red color. Wore with black tights on Christmas Eve. Good petite length. Got lots of compliments. I did dislike that their are three buttons and the fabric gasped open a bit on the top one, which was odd bc the top was otherwise looser fitting. It was fine with a black tank top underneath.

links_reviews_title: Wore it for a work holiday party. Flirty and festive. Very cute.
links_reviews_text: Great length for a petite frame. Be sure to wear a bustier underneath, as the buttons want to spread apart and show skin where you don't want it to (which had nothing to do with size/fit...it was not tight).

The small fit great. There are a lot of fun details like the gold accents, the drawstring waist and the airy sleeves. The front had buttons that can expose skin so I wore a nude tank underneath. Would rent again, got lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: What's that breeze? Oh - my dress is open-air...
links_reviews_text: Have a safety pin (or Bobby pin in my case) on hand... because this dress needs at least two more buttons for the wearer to avoid embarrassing exposure. Other than this, it's a cute romantic dress that is comfortable and could fit many different body types. Good for fall/winter holiday parties.
This dress was cute, comfy and flattering! I got the extra small and could've worn the small as well. It has a drawstring which makes it flexible. I would rent it again!
Medium was way too small. Wouldn't close over my bust and was way too short.

I got this dress for work. The size was fine and I would say true to size but 2 issues: 1. The buttons on the wrist are so tight it took me ages to get them over my hands! 2. There are 3 buttons in the top which are very far apart and so naturally gape so you have to wear a top underneath it. It was fine to wear with a top under but I didn't love it and won't rent again
Classy dress, sort of short but got many compliments on it overall.

links_reviews_title: so cute but not for big busted ladies
links_reviews_text: arrived with tags on and fits TTS everywhere except for the chest. I am a DD and the buttons gaped and looked terrible, even with a camisole underneath. Unfortunately, I had to return without wearing.

This arrived fresh with the tags on and I loved the fresh, vibrant lemon print too! Perfect pop of color for video calls! There is lots of volume in the sleeves but I don’t love the way the shoulder detail sticks out. Otherwise fun!

links_reviews_title: This jacket is cozy and stylish. I love it!
links_reviews_text: I love everything about this jacket.
Defiantly not what I expected. It is much more formal than I anticipated but it was great! Fit well. Will for sure rent again!

Love this classic elegant dress. Received many compliments. It was a bit large on my so I had to adjust the tie which fell slightly higher than it should in my opinion, but great dress never the less. Very comfortable and has pockets!

links_reviews_title: Dress is very lightweight, but lovely for all occasions
links_reviews_text: This is a lovely dress for so many uses. I didn't realize it from the photos, but the dress is a crisp brushed cotton. Not great in the cold, but still workable with tights and an under layer. The dress is a fantastic cut with POCKETS! If I owned this I would find lots of reasons to wear it.
It was beautiful and comfortable. Everything I could have wanted for a nice evening out w the boyfriend...and then he popped the question! This dress is good luck!
High quality. Runs big could have sized down easily but the waist tie is adjustable

links_reviews_title: I thought I was going to hate it. Wrong.
links_reviews_text: This is a great lightweight NWT dress. I wore it in December but I'm in CA so I didn't need more. The dress is cut well with nice detailing. I rarely rent black dresses from RTR but this one was a favorite. Comfortable and luxurious.
Very cute, flattering, can't go wrong with black. Only down sides is the bow gets loose throughout the day and has to be retied, and the fabric is kind of loud when you move. Not biggies tho.
I got this new with tags and it was very professional runs about 1 size large. I will be sizing down if I rent again. I thought it was a nice option for a work day.

links_reviews_title: Looked very professional for a work event.
links_reviews_text: it is a linen type fabric, wrinkles easily. Looks like a suit/shirt dress. Hides bulges, but not very figure flattering as it was large for its size. Length is great. I wore a tank under it for work since the V neck is a little low.
Did not look professional & didn't fit well

links_reviews_title: Perfect black dress for work to evening event.
links_reviews_text: Very flattering for us curvy girls.
A dress with pockets, and flattering lines was almost perfect. The bow is a little wider and because the fabric doesn't drape, it is more decorative than the event called for.

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable for a full work day.
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable, arrived wrinkled but they were gone after 1 hour. Loved that it had pockets.
Very flattering and the pockets are super fun!
This dress was incredibly comfortable and easy to wear. It would also be a great thing to pack for a vacation and you can dress it up or dress it down!
Stylish and comfortable. Dress has pockets nice weight and goes easily from work to after work dinner. Work to a work party. I am between a 6 and 8. Ordered the 6 which fit well
Classic Dress. Runs large. The 16R fit like a 16W.

I don't think I would have rented this if I just saw it online because the photo is tricky to see. I picked it off the rack from the RTR store and it is the perfect dress for work events. The fabric has stretch in it and I would recommend going down one size. Very flattering and has a faux wrap around the waist so you can tighten to your liking. Hits a little below the knees and has a the proper amount of fabric on the bottom half to be able to have it lay well and give it a full look.
Liked this dress, it ran a little big though. It probably would have looked better if I had more chest to fill it out - the top was especially loose. Loved that it had pockets.
Nice fabric, but not enough shape to flatter my body. Did not wear.
Wore this with jean shorts running around Disney world and it was great! Its pretty thick fabric though, and it runs wide and short.

This top was really cute and nice for running errands and weekend brunch. The fabric is a really thick, structured knit so it held it's shape and was flattering on my 5 mo postpartum belly. Not super special, but it was a little bold, so still fun to wear.
Loved this look, esp both pieces together. They are a heavier knit, but kind of stretchy and bouncy at the same time. Traveled well, with almost no wrinkles after being packed in a suitcase all day.

IN LOVE with this outfit - highly recommend. Thick fabric, as others have noted, so it is perfect for a chilly office in the summer but recommend to avoid if you'll be out in the summer heat. Cannot wait to rent again!
Super comfortable

links_reviews_title: Nice crop but not too short!
links_reviews_text: It is a heavier material than expected, but makes it fall nicely and keep shape. There are side hem slits that go up about 4 inches. Wore with high waisted jeans.
Great casual slay for work.
Literally fell in love with this outfit
Heavy material
I wanted to like this one, but I really didn't like the material. I should have looked more closely at the description, but the fabric is really thick and not very comfortable.
Elevated version of the t shirt. Loved it.

I got so many compliments on this. The cut is a bit unusual (and I was definitely pushing it wearing it to work with the high slits, particularly because the density of the fabric makes it hard to tuck in) but it was a fun twist on stripes. The funky pattern and cut was a head turner. The texture is a thick technical fabric that was quite breezy on a hot New York day. Will definitely rent again.
Great with the skirt. Compliments all day

I absolutely love this shirt and would rent again. I wore it with high waisted jeans, black leather jacket and white sneakers. The material was thick and felt great. This shirt has slits on the side that show a perfect peep of skin, but I still felt comfortable wearing it to my casual work environment.
The material is really nice and I love the design of the shirt- it was just way too short to wear with regular pants. It would probably be great with high waisted anything.

This shirt was really fun and different from what I'd normally rent. The slits on the side are very high so you will need to wear high waisted jeans with it. Not super flattering, but really fun so I think it works. Pretty short in the front so if you're lifting your arms a lot you will show skin.
Shirt fit nice. The shape keeps due to the thick fabric but still very comfortable
The material and fit were comfy . Wasn't expecting the front to be higher hadn't noticed, but it is not necessarily cropped either. Cute style received compliments
Very large, but I think that's part of the overall look. Great quality, and very TB.
Such an interesting shirt in a nice solid fabric
This shirt is super cute with the matching skirt. Comfy and unique for a casual day at the office.
Looks great with high waisted shorts. Super comfy and great colors!

links_reviews_title: Cute "crop" top but not too cropped
links_reviews_text: The length of this was perfect. It was tasteful but stylish. I wore it with black high waisted skinny jeans. Had a bit of a Parisian vibe which was perfect because I wore it to a cheese pairing event. The fabric is well structured and I got several compliments. Definitely don't size up though, has potential to look boxy if not fitted properly.
True to size, worked well on a tall frame, stretchy material, generally flattering!
Really think fabric, runs big. More shape than a classic tee. Really cute colors and style!
Fun and different outfit for work! Great conversation starter!

links_reviews_title: Boxy cut makes you look bigger than you are!
links_reviews_text: The shirt is super boxy, I wouldn't recommend if you have hips (it ends just short of hips so it doesn't accentuate your waist and it makes you look super big) or if you are short. It's also got a weird backdrop. I think it's super cute, but the cut is off and makes you look bigger than you are.

I really loved this shirt. I'm a size 10 and it's an over-sized style. I'm about 25 weeks pregnant and my stomach was out the bottom. It's shorter in the front and longer in the back. It has cool slits on the sides. I tried to make it work, but I didn't have any thing high-waisted that matched.
Super cute, great quality - definately is meant to be oversized but I would recommend going a size down. Super snuggly!

links_reviews_title: I didn't feel like a clown at the golf tournament I wore it to.
links_reviews_text: While boxy, this top looks good with skinny jeans. It is a nice, thick fabric.
Stretchy, comfy fabric. Runs large, but is a little cropped for my tall self. There are also surprise slits fairly high up on the sides.
Fits loose but still fitted enough to give you a shape. I love the sporty material!
The blouse has a lovely bold pattern but the fit was not too great. Since the front was shorter than the back it was wide but lifted up quite a bit in front
Cute! But baggier and more cropped than I expected.

This is a great business casual sweater that you can wear with jeans or slacks. I wore it a few times to the office and out & about and received compliments every time! Super comfy and also surprisingly warm. Will definitely rent again!
Good for winter, it's very heavy. Fits well, just as advertised, and it's flattering. Win win!
I had to roll the sleeves bc they were a little awkward at length, but I will liked this cardigan. May not rent again but it was still cute with leggings or pants for work.
Flattering shape, heavy (in a good way). Eager to wear.
This manages to look put together despite the oversized style. Material is beautiful and it's perfectly warm for fall/winter
Heavy sweater that's great for a cold day. Wish it was a touch longer, but loved the warmth.
nice casual piece, easy to throw on over any outfit.
The fabric is thick and comfortable. I paired it with a long sleeved black tshirt. I had many complements.

links_reviews_title: Nice sweater, great shape, Nice sweater
links_reviews_text: XL was too large, it has actual shoulder seams

This sweater is great for work. I paired it with a pair of navy slacks and really loved the look. The sleeves were a bit long on me so I cuffed them which worked great and looked fine. I'll definitely rent again in the future!

links_reviews_title: Really cute, but material was a bit rough
links_reviews_text: Really cute sweater to wear with jeans and a tank top. The only issues were the sleeves were a bit short and material was a little rough.
Heavy cotton quality sweater. Wore it over a dress, with jeans and black pants for work. Goes with everything.
Great - dress up or down. Very thick material. loved it and true to size

links_reviews_title: This is a very high quality wrap sweater.
links_reviews_text: The material is substantial and high quality without being bulky. I wore it to work on a Friday with jeans and with a black lightweight sweater underneath. Looks casual and elegant at the same time.

This was very cute and super comfortable! Heavy, good quality sweater, that was warm and cozy! I ordered a Medium, but I'm 5'2" and don't have terribly wide shoulders. The Medium fit, but was a little big in the shoulders and definitely a little long in the sleeves (maybe 1/2" too long for me). For just sitting at my desk in the office, I didn't mind and it was easy to push the sleeves back a bit when I needed to. Because this is a draped fit that doesn't need to close in the front, I probably could have gotten away with a Small in this one.
I expected something more flows and this was stiff wool. Even so, it was warm and a good fit, just not the most comfortable option.
The sweater was thicker than I had imagined. I would pair it with a tank top if you are going to be in a temperature controlled environment. Nicely made.
Heavy - well crafted and very nice.

This cardigan is beautiful and stylish but definitely for cooler weather. I wore it to a holiday party and being inside I was sweating. The material is very thick and heavy and by the end of the evening it was starting to bother me and couldn't wait to take it off. I got lots of compliments on it and would rent again for a winter outdoor event.
A bit itchy if you just wear a tank underneath. Would only recommend for fairly cold weather.
This sweater was really pretty and chic. The material is thicker and stiffer than I thought it would be.

links_reviews_title: It was a great look, fit and it was very warm. Due note the material is heavy.
links_reviews_text: True to size. It looked nice with jeans and work/dress slacks.
I like the weight of the knit. The colors are very mixable.
Wore for outdoor events and keep me warm.

links_reviews_title: thick cozy sweater, perfect for colder temps
links_reviews_text: Cute sweater. Very tick and a little heavy but super cute.

I love this sweater! I wore it with black pants for work and with dark jeans for another professional event. Very fun sweater, comfy and cozy. I received more compliments on this than on anything else I've rented. I will definitely rent again.

This drapes well, is heavy enough for a cool day but not as heavy as wool or cashmere, and the stripes are actually quite flattering in the way they fall. Love the color combination. I've worn it a few times already and want to fit in one more before I send it back.
Great quality and super cute. Very warm. Size down. I'm a size 4/S and the XS was perfect

links_reviews_title: Wore it for a casual pre-wedding ceremony and as a jacket for work events.
links_reviews_text: So versatile! I wore this multiple times for many different occasions. It is a heavy material, which I think lends to the transitional fall season.
This is fun, cozy and fashionable. It feels like wearing a blanket but makes an outfit. Also, I'm a bit short and often wraps are overwhelming on my frame, but this one was very flattering.
This runs really large. The heavy knit will keep you warm in a chilly office, but I found that the striping did not flatter me and it was overall very bulky.
Not a great fit- very very heavy
A little big for an XS. My rental was in good shape but near bottom of sleeves was starting to pill. Nice quality.
Size down! Was swimming in a medium. Fabric is very thick.

This is a nice heavy sweater, I got a lot of compliments I wore to work with jeans. I think it runs big, I did not feel comfortable in it, it felt like it was falling off all day. I think I will reorder in a medium and see if it fits better bc it is a very nice looking sweater.

This is perfect for colder days. It is heavy making it very warm. Was very comfortable and great with jeans. I wore a large because I was 2 weeks postpartum. It fit perfectly but aty regular size and weight I would need medium.
Nice color, heavy. Kept me warm walking around London. V nice casual sweater. Would rent again
Loved the look of this sweater. Matches pretty much everything. Looks expensive. I wore it during travel. Packs nicely. Only con is that it's a little itchy. Otherwise I would purchase.
Beautiful sweater, heavy weighted, wore a camisole underneath, definitely keeps you warm!
Wore this with jeans to my (casual) offices, and over a dress for a weekend day. Definitely a more boxy, work appropriate fit rather than trendy, but nice. Would rent again.
I won't rent this again. It's a very loose fit and not very flattering. Would look better with jeans and white tee.

This blazer was great for my friends daytime birthday party - it was a warmer February day (55 degrees) and with this over my sweater I didn't need a coat! It's a nice wool material and I longer than many of my other blazers - which I find nice as a taller girl but might be a little too large on women with a smaller frame. Overall it was a great option and I'd definitely rent again for work or other daytime events!

links_reviews_title: Fitted Blazer, Perfect for Tall Girls
links_reviews_text: Good fit in shoulders and great length. Not too tight even with a thin sweater underneath.

I wanted to give the blazer trend a try. This blazer fit great but the sleeves were a bit short and for that it's a 1 and done for me. If I had gotten a size S maybe I wouldn't have had that problem but that wasn't available. High quality lined materials.

I originally bought this piece to wear as a trendy going out outfit over a band T-shirt… It is definitely more workwear than able to be trendy! Still super nice piece with great material and great for the office.
I loved this blazer! I got so many compliments and it's so trendy right now

links_reviews_title: Collar is much smaller than in the picture
links_reviews_text: this jacket fit well but the collar looked tiny on me, I'm more athletically built and have strong shoulders, not sure if that contributed but it didn't look right.

links_reviews_title: Loved this! Cute and trendy. Almost bought it but excited to try out more new styles.
links_reviews_text: Loved this! Cute and trendy. Almost bought it but excited to try out more new styles.
Was a big hit… Easy to wear dressed up or down, classic print, great fit and got many uses out of it. Love!
Great fit, a great choice for "boyfriend blazer" that is flattering and stylish at the same time. Can dress up to work or dress down for a night out. Worth buying!

These were large but comfy so that's fine, but they were really short on me and I'm only 5'6. The ankles were either super stretched cuz they hit at people's calves or they're just really big. It was fine for a kids b-ball game which is where I wore them, probably not nice enough for anything else.

These are definitely loose as others mentioned, but easy to style and wear. The zipper cuffs make them flexible to your height, which as a short girl,I like. Wore for a day flight and sightseeing -- perfect upgrade from jeans.
