I love these pants but they definitely run large! I typically wear a 27 in Joe's Jeans but the 25 fit me just right. You just have to understand that these are meant to be slightly baggie. They are still flattering, though. The length was good and looked great with a pair of ankle boots. I felt like a smaller size may have been better (RTR doesn't have these in a smaller size) but then the length may have been too short (I'm 5'6" tall and they hit right at my ankle). I actually had someone stop me on the street and tell me they loved my pants! Dress these up or down. You can make a statement either way!
I've got a pair of 27 in Joes and they don't fit like this!! Ridiculously huge. These are 25s, and fit more like 30s! Cute, but awful big. Be warned!!!!
Loooove these pants so much I bought them lol
Too big, super comfy

links_reviews_title: Huge! You should size down by 2-3 sizes!
links_reviews_text: I'm a size 4 and typically wear size 27 in Joes jeans these were so big thst I think a 22-23 would be loose? They looked like they could be super cute but I'd need to try multiple sizes to figure this out
These run very big. I followed other's advise and sized down significantly. I normally wear a 27 and ordered a 25. They fit great!!! Might even keep them... very cute pants!
As other wearers describe, definitely runs large. I usually wear a 29 or 30 in pants and easily fit into a 28.
The waist runs large so not flattering In my opinion they'd be much cuter & more wearable with out the red stripe.
Very late morning she and baggy in the thighs and rear so order down two sizes

links_reviews_title: I like these pants. They are comfortable and true to size
links_reviews_text: very happy with these pants

links_reviews_title: Super cute and comfy, run REALLY big!
links_reviews_text: Loved these, but even though I sized down 2 sizes based on the reviews they were still huge! Styled with a white t-shirt and red sneakers to pop the red tuxedo stripe. They were perfect for casual days playing with dogs and babies over the holidays.
Was a whole size to big. Love the look and quality

A bit longer rise than expected; and baggy. The elastic ankle was not as fitted - perhaps because they have been stretched out a bit? Otherwise great pants, would probably rent one size down in future.
Definitely size up - I have wide hips and a small waist, the 25R fit well (usually a US 27).

links_reviews_title: Very large but oh so fun!!
links_reviews_text: My regular size 28 and it was really large but they are so much fun I am just throwing on a belt and a large sweater and going with it. They just look cool and baggy.

I took the recommendation to size down and the waist fit fine but the pants were super short. I am tall but I didn't expect them to hit so high up. There was no way I could make them work with booties or any cute shoes.

links_reviews_title: Unique twist on a Camo pant
links_reviews_text: I thought these fit pretty well from a waist perspective but if you're really tall or have long legs you should definitely check the measurements for length. All in a good rental - wore these to work for a casual Friday and kid's bday party on the weekend. You can never go wrong with camouflage.

links_reviews_title: Usually a 25 in jeans, sometimes a 24, but these fit like a 27/28, very cute if they had fit!
links_reviews_text: Just very large
I loved these pants and have now rented them in two sizes.--First pair was too big but I wore them anyway. They are a thick cotton canvas and the stripe is fun.
These run VERY large all over. I'm a true 28 and they couldn't even stay up they were so big around the waist. Would recommend sizing down by a size or two.

links_reviews_title: I rented these to wear to work.
links_reviews_text: Fun, casual pants but they do run big/baggy so I ordered a size down. Also, the fabric is rather thick and heavy.
I have worn a lot of camo and it can be very cute. These were not. I felt like I was wearing military provided pants. They were stiff and not flattering. Returned without wearing.
These fit great, a little loose but that's the style. Can't remember what I wore them with but I do remember that I truly enjoyed them and felt like a badass all day.
comfy
Diaper butt & color too light. Would've been cute if it were more faded. Disappointed to say the least- returning right away
I didn't wear as they fit very large and had a long zipper.
I would rent again and size down.
What do you do when your RTR dress is SOOO small you can't button it? Wear over your bathing suit tote the beach! Loved the look of this dress but it ran WAY small. May re-rent a size up...

links_reviews_title: It's not as small as I thought
links_reviews_text: I sized up because of other reviews. I really should have just gotten my normal size 10. The 12 was a little bit and stretched to be even bigger throughout the day. It was very very cute I just wish it fit me a little better. Will rent next time in my normal size 10!

This dress was so cute and flattering! I've had issues with this designer running small in the past (especially in the bust) so I sized up one and was glad I did - the fit was perfect. The length was great on me at 5'4" but for tall gals this one might be a little too short for work. Loved the print and the cut!

links_reviews_title: Love it easy fit on a muggy day
links_reviews_text: Can't wait til the price drops on this one. I need. Such a great easy classic summer shritdress.

Love this shirt dress! The material is sorcery - perfectly light and airy for a HOT sticky summer day, but also has enough weight to stay down in a strong wind, and wasn't sheer. Good for short girls - hit my knee at an appropriate length for work.

links_reviews_title: Super cute dress! Great for a casual day time event or night at the house.
links_reviews_text: Runs smaller than normal, so order a size up! I wore it as a maternity dress (27 weeks) and am normally a size 2-4, I ordered a size 8 and wish I had gotten a 10!

I thought this was a cute dress and planned to wear it, especially as 90% of the things I rent from here do not fit properly and I send most back without even wearing. This dress has flimsy snaps that literally go down the entire length of the dress. It is also very lightweight so I was going to wear, but decided not to because of the thin material and the odd snaps going down the front. I sent it back without wearing. Material is very thin and almost sheer
I loved the cut and fabric of this dress - but it was in my first shipment from RTR Unlimited, and I was deluding myself about my true size. I had to send it back!
fits great
This is a cute and lightweight dress but the waist is small.

links_reviews_title: so CUTE but cut very small in the waist
links_reviews_text: This dress is ADORABLE, but on me, the middle button kept popping open. the bust and skirt portion fit beautifully and the cut/fabric around the waist makes it a very flattering dress. I just would suggest that unless you have a tiny waist you should size up so that you can be confident about the waist fitting- I don't think it would have effected the look of the overall fit.

I really like this in all the photos, but it's just not the right fir for me. The dress itself fit ok, but there is no give at the waist. So, it fit fine in the morning when I'd get dressed, but throughout the day with sitting and moving around my office the snaps in the middle tended to pop open. If I sized up the top would be too big. It is a great looking dress, but didn't work for my shape.

links_reviews_title: Rented for a long weekend in FL. Recieved many compliments.
links_reviews_text: I sized up so I could wear my suit under. Able to hit the shops & resturants by the beach and look nice. comfortable and cute!
Runs small

This is a good, cute summer dress - just not good for me at all. The arm openings were ridiculously large so it was unwearable. Otherwise the fit was fine and it was fairly flattering. In general, even if the arms hadn't been an issue I would say it is more appropriate for a younger person. Almost looked like a "juniors" style though well made and nice fabric.
Good everyday dress for work
Like this dress! I wore it with tennis shoes and it was a great way to be casual but with a little bit of interest and style.
I am a 12/14, and even the 14 was too small for me! The material was great and it would've been cute had it fit.

links_reviews_title: Cute design, fit just not for me.
links_reviews_text: I loved the print and design on this, so I wore it despite a few fit issues. I wore a 6, which I worn in other things by this designer, but the cut was hard for me. The top was a too roomy (I am small up top), and the waist was snug. This would not have been a problem, but the snaps up the front are VERY easily opened, so if you laugh a little too hard they could pop right now. Likewise, if you were large chested, I could see the chest buttons popping open with little movement. Would have sized up, but then top would have been ENORMOUS. Anyway, it is a cute dress and I got compliments, just not the easiest to wear.
This dress runs very small - I am usually a 6 in Derek Lam and this size 8 fit snugly. Very unflattering on me. Did not wear

links_reviews_title: Could not wear. WAY too small
links_reviews_text: I was so excited to receive this dress but although I am normally a size 6 or 8, I would have needed at least a 10. There was a 4" gap between buttons. Such a cute dress but there was no trying to make this one fit.
Perfect summer dress that can go from work to happy hour. Super flattering, but go one size up!
easy cute summer dress. i was worried the button wld pop but they actually stayed on very well. there's no stretch at the waist, but my reg size 2 worked well. cute casual dress, not lined
Cute but I couldn't even button it.

I love this Derek Lam style of dress and have rented others in different fabrics. This one is more casual, definitely short but you can pair it with a flat or conservative shoe and wear it to the office. Pairing it with a heel makes it super sexy. It's very flattering and versatile.
Just not made for me! I'm tall with a fairly large chest. I was hoping to wear to work but this was way too short, even for non-work activities. Found it to run small in the chest, snaps gaped.

links_reviews_title: Cute details! Crisp cotton summer dress with a flattering cut.
links_reviews_text: The waist is fitted and does not stretch but it makes for a casual hourglass cut and the rest of the dress (sleeves, bust, and skirt) is quite forgiving. I'm a 38D and the 16 fit my bust well, but I added a safety pin for a small gap between the snaps in the center of the top. (A common problem I have with button-downs.) The skirt portion of the dress is a-line, so forgiving and flattering for me. Length came above my knee, with the waist of the dress on my true waist. For someone taller, it may run a bit short.
Thought this would be great for wfh and beyond! So cute to pair with denim/white denim. If you are busty size up with the back zipper.

Utility style jumpsuits definitely aren't the most figure flattering, but I like going for the oversized look every once and a while and making it feminine. This pastel pink is right on trend for spring and felt super comfortable to lounge in and wear out.

First, it's tough for me to say whether this runs small/large/true because of Sundry's goofball sizing system. So I went with 2R- I'm usually a small or medium, depending on maker- and it was pretty large. I like baggy, but this was a lot. On the plus size, pink is a very fun color. This jumpsuit has no stretch, and I think that makes it a little tougher to wear- when a single garment is supposed to handle the entire body, it really helps to have a little give.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and easy to get in and out of
links_reviews_text: I wore this twice! Once to work with nude heals and an oversized blazer and then again to a vineyard (pictured above). It was so comfortable all day at work and again over the weekend! This really can be dressed up or down and the linen like material makes it breathable but it's not at all see through!

This jumper was absolutely adorable and super comfortable. I got tons of compliments and felt very great in it all day touring. It's especially great chasing a young baby without worrying about anything falling out etc. highly recommend!

I wasn't sure this was going to fit and it was perfect and flattering on my curvy frame. I'd love to purchase. Not too difficult to take on and off with the button on the shoulder. The tie on the back just covered my bra. I felt amazing in this. It would be perfect for sailing.
Received lots of compliments on this jumpsuit. It was very comfortable but the back tie was a bit stretched out so it made figuring out undergarments tricky.

links_reviews_title: I rented this for my sister birthday brunch. This fit very nice
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size even with heels on

Loved this! I felt beautiful and comfortable. There is however a very awkward tie in the back. It looks bulky and is uncomfortable to lean against when sitting. Not a great choice for long car trips or ceremonies. Avoid sitting for long periods of time. Other than that, it's fantastic. And, it has pockets!!
Didn't wear.

links_reviews_title: Buttons on the sleeve for using the bathroom!
links_reviews_text: I may end up owning this one some day! Wore it to an outdoor party and just for everyday. Styled with cute blue flip flops for casual look, but could be dressed up some with sandal heels. Pros: So comfy! Light and cool fabric. Length (torso and legs) was great for this tall girl. Accentuated waist without being tight (very comfy elastic). And best of all- buttons on one shoulder for ease of using the restroom! No untying or strange wiggling require to pull it down and back up! Cons: Requires someone to tie it, if you want the tie in a certain place. The back/tie fell below my bra line so I had to pin the fabric above to cover the bra fully. (Hooray for the sleeve buttons)
While this fit, it laid oddly and was not flattering. It was a little boxy and the crotch was too long.
Nice weight, but did not flatter with too much fabric for a small person.

links_reviews_title: Cute, but bow in the back impractical for sitting
links_reviews_text: Cute and breezy, but be aware there is a bow in the back that isn't particularly comfortable to lean on.

I love the material; it looks kind of like linen, but it was thick and provided a structured outline of my shape. The colors are really pretty and light too. I paired it with some sandals and a long necklace. It was really cute!

links_reviews_title: Wore for several all day events and loved it!
links_reviews_text: This romper was so chic and also comfortable. I got so many compliments while wearing it. It is a bit labor intensive to take off/on for restroom breaks, but easy enough, and worth it. Also, wearing a bra is a challenge, I didn't wear one and felt fine. I loved the open back!
Elegant and modest. Shows a little skin in the back. The length for my 5'3 frame just fine. Loved the pockets and would rent again.
Comfortable and a good fit. Not the most flattering romper but it looked good. Easy outfit to throw on for lots of occasions!
Fit was good, but it lay over the body with little to no shape. Rather frumpy looking.
not flattering on me

This fit better than I thought a jumpsuit could! It's perfect for the short, rounder women among us. It's linen so it does wrinkle easily, but the material is also thick enough that you don't have to worry about what color underwear you wear with it. Loved this one so much for a cute, casual summer brunch outfit.
Would have given it a 5 if I could have leaned back against a chair withodght the knot jabbing into my back

I really wanted to wear a jumpsuit. This one was quite comfy. I agree with the others that it does wrinkle easily. The buttons on the shoulder are nice, however difficult to re-button. I work a tank under to hide my brad strap across the back and ended up just slipping the whole thing off to go to the bathroom.
This fit very well.

Not the most figure flattering (I agree with others who felt the heavy fabric made hips look wider), but I got so Many compliments on this outfit and it's crazy comfortable. Easy to get in and out of too.
It's a shame, but this was so stiff, the hips looked like 5 inches wider than my actual hips. No drape. Returned without wearing

The thick fabric of the pockets and the way they lay added really unflattering width to my hips. That plus the boxy frame of the top just made it unwearable. It's a shame, because the fabric is super soft and comfy.
Pretty true to size (maybe a little short), great print that got lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Super fun sleeves and beautiful, flattering print
links_reviews_text: Loved this blouse. It's very comfortable and the blousy sleeves are very fun. It is big, so I did a French tuck to give some shape and then just wore with jeans for a cute WFH look. The print is really beautiful, I was worried it would wash me out, but It was actually really flattering with the rich greens and I think it would look great on any skin tone.

Love the sleeves on this beautiful blouse. Got lots of compliments. I'm normally a 4-6 but rented a size 8 because of availability. I liked the bigger fit as it went well with the sleeves. Would rent again.
Fits large, but super cute. I would buy this!

links_reviews_title: Great colors/pattern in this top. Very different neckline. Loved how fashionable and comfy it was.
links_reviews_text: Great top! Puffy sleeves-amazing pattern/colors Definitely loved this piece and will rent again!

Fits perfectly! I ended up tucking it into high waisted blue jeans with some white sneakers for a more casual look. You can dress this up or dress it down. It's not silky at all FYI! Would rent again but not worth buying. Doesn't bunch up or look too puffy, very flattering !
I'm usually a 4 but a 2 in this is perfect. It runs big it is somewhat cropped so plan to wear high waisted jeans. Paired with a rtr bag to make it more fun. Felt very casual Beyoncé

I wore this to a family holiday party, but would also be perfect for work or more casual evening events. The sleeves were short on me, but I liked not having too much excess fabric in the top. That said, if I were to rent again I would likely size up to a 6 in hopes that the sleeves and top in general would be slightly longer.
A bit papery and stiff but a a fun single-wear blouse. Beautiful print and balloon sleeves
It's cottony not silky, which I didn't expect. But it's fun and bold. Wearing to work with over knee boots and navy cords.
Got SO MANY compliments on this top. Sleeves are everything. Beautiful colors.
I received a lot of compliments on this shirt but it definitely wasn't my favorite rental. The material was heavier than expected and it wrinkled easily. But the print and sleeves were fun!
Sweet pattern and easy top; full sleeves aren't for me though.
loved the color and sleeves

Really loved this blouse. The material was a little stiffer than I was expecting and the length was a tad short on me (even for tucking into high waisted jeans) but overall really loved how it was a casual top, elevated.

links_reviews_title: Bold sleeves and a muted pattern. Very unique.
links_reviews_text: Not silky, so it doesn't conform to your shape quite as well as you might hope.
A great piece that I kept for weeks
Cute to wear for a day but not in love with it
I love this print and the fabric has a night weight to it. Would rent again!
Great top! Very comfortable and flattering! I wore it tied at the bottom, but it looked good u done and tucked in! Will definitely rent again.
Fit TTS, loose fitted in the body but gaped open at the buttons in the chest. Quality just ok- typical of Rails shirting.
It was a great plaid shirt. The fabric made it very versatile!
It was lightweight and comfortable. I actually wore it to work as a more casual outfit.
Not bulky - lays nicely.
Fit perfectly
Wore to work with black pants and was comfy yet "dressy". Love rails.
Comfy

Overall the print is cute and the color is nice. It is a very light and loose shirt. It felt like it got looser the longer I wore it, so it's a solid shirt, just a little casual. Got compliments on it though!
comfy and fits well. i'd buy if it wasn't so expensive.
This was a more feminine flannel with the fit being a little bit tighter and form fitting. Could have sized up to have a little more movement in the arms. Lighter material
Nice material, but runs large.
Perfect button down for weekend day outing! The fit was true to size. I'm 5'4" 125 and wore a small.
I ordered a large because it said to order a size up I probably could have gone with the medium.
Super soft flannel. No complaints.
Cute and comfy
Just what I was hoping for. Cute, comfortable everyday sweater. The sleeve detail gives it a little extra pop. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Really cute and fun for everyday.
links_reviews_text: Cute sweater great for everyday wear. Got several compliments! Would be rated higher except the sweater has some pills and could be in better condition.
I love the craftsmanship of this sweater. Made so well. Works well with high waisted jeans. Thinking about buying it because I like it so much.
This sweater is amazing. It's a heavier material, so I think it would be better for cooler temps in the fall. I did find the fit to be a bit short, so I think I will go with the Medium next time!
LOVE this star sweater. Feels very dressed up even when dressed down! It's a little cropped, but the bottom 'waistband' on the sweater keeps it in place and flatters. May even buy it!!
I decided to order up after reading reviews and because I prefer a baggier fit but I loved this top. The design and sleeve details were really fun!
Loved the softness and subtle sparkliness of this sweater. Definitely was cropped on me so I wore a tee underneath (also the sparkly thread was a little itchy). Will rent again!

links_reviews_title: Crop top with puffy sleeves and soft
links_reviews_text: Such a soft top really cute and comfortable and repair as well with high waisted jeans I absolutely love this gift also the colors are amazing and the stars have a little bit of shimmer
I was a little hesitant ordering this sweater, wasn't sure if it would be a good look for me. Surprisingly enough, i love it! Such a fun top, so comfy, fits great, def wearing again before i return!

links_reviews_title: Dressed up with a gold skirt or down with ripped jeans and sneakers
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly.

links_reviews_title: Cute and fun sweater, had fun wearing it
links_reviews_text: Definitely short, but I loved wearing it with a tank underneath. It was fun to wear because different from most things I wear.

This sweater was a great fit! Definitely fits more on the cropped side than baggy but I wore it almost all the time. I usually wear a small or extra small but saw reviews said it fit like a cropped sweater, so I ordered a medium just because of preference. It does have noticeable cap sleeves which makes it flirty. Easily able to dress up or down!
Comfy and cute. Perfect to pair with high waist denim.
Cute 4th of July sweater!! Goes with everything and is super cozy. Love how the stars have some sparkle
Loved this sweater! Material was really comfy. Theres a bit of sparkly thread in the stars. Sleeves are kind of poofy but I thought it was cool in a funky way
Really cute. Soft and cozy. True to size. It's a little short on the front. I wore high rise jeans and it worked out perfectly. Recommend renting.

I wore this to work on a Friday and again to a museum exhibit. The material was soft. The sweater was casual but the stars and puffy sleeves gave it some extra flair. As others have mentioned, the body is short. I sized up to medium and it fit well, still short though.

Cutest crop sweater! Stars have a little shimmer in them and the sleeves have a fun detail to the shoulders. I'm normally between an XS and a S and I wore a S and it fit great. So size up if you're in between sizes. Great color, great comfort. Must rent!!

Super cute and cozy sweater. Perfect for a rainy spring day. I loved the shoulder details and the sleeves were slightly long and laid gorgeously. Slight imperfection - it was a tab too short, i wore a tank underneath and kept pulling it down. With high waisted pants it would probably look better
This sweater is adorable and eye catching, but super casual. Loved wearing even if it had a minor stain at the bottom of it. Highly recommend and wasn't super heavy material either.

links_reviews_title: Fun and comfy! Great for petites
links_reviews_text: Loved everything about this. The sweatshirt is fitted and a bit short, but I like that look, especially with black leggings.
Lightweight, does run short but paired with highwaisted jeans and wore a cami underneath so if it ran up, I wouldnt be showing my stomach. Good everyday easy sweater.

links_reviews_title: Luxuriously soft casual top forcd temps.
links_reviews_text: Soft and warm. Not bulky. Perfect for errands/weekend during cold days. Wore it a few times with skinny jeans, leggings. I would add some small sparkly earrings and small crossbody bag.
Good quality, warm, and cute. Would prefer it to be an inch or so longer though...cropped/rides-up above waist of jeans. Minimal metalic thread in stars...not very sparkly.
Just short, but loved it.

links_reviews_title: The style is adorable but I'm with the other reviewers- it's too short. It is a cropped pullover.
links_reviews_text: I love the fit except for the cropped style.
The sweater is so cute and fun but was way too short for me to wear without a tank top underneath. It didnt look nearly as good with the tank top. Size up!

links_reviews_title: great every day sweater that pairs well with jeans
links_reviews_text: fit well for either high waisted or mid rise jeans.
Was not expecting it to be this short. Also, sleeves are very puffy. Otherwise, nice print and good quality material

I wore four times before I sent it back. Loved so much. True to size, a bit baggy but that's the style. I would go true to size. Loved the sleeves. Wore with jeans and boots and with black pants to work.
Very comfortable, stylish, and SO SOFT. It goes great with high-wasted jeans and I could wear it out to get a drink or with leggings to run errands.

links_reviews_title: Did not look good with a large chest
links_reviews_text: I have a large chest and the puffy sleeves added too much volume to my top area. I think that it would be really cute on someone with a smaller chest.

This sweater is warm and comfortable and super cute. The only caveat is that it is a bit short so if you are tall with a long torso then it might not work very well for you (or wear some high rise bottoms with it).
LOVED how darling this sweater was, but unfortunately, is horribly short! If you are tall or long torso'd and don't want to wear a crop top sweater, this one isn't for you.
So comfy! I highly recommend!!!

This sweater is great with jeans. It was a bit itchy around the neck. This, plus the fact that I’m not always comfortable with the cropped look, necessitated me wearing a slim fitting white tee underneath. I think this sweater is fun but might need modifications.
Wore this out on a chilly day of my vacation. It's super cute and goes with basically anything!
Really enjoyed the added sparkle throughout the star pattern, and the slightly cropped fit.
Very comfortable and soft. My only negative is that the sleeves have the feminine puff look, which I didn't expect and isn't usually my thing. But I got a lot of compliments and was happy with it.

links_reviews_title: it is so cute! perfect sweater for the summer
links_reviews_text: fits perfectly!
Perfect fit & incredible quality! I've held onto it for two months & I'm pretty sure I'll end up purchasing. It looks great with everything and the leather is so soft.
The jacket is comfortable but a but heavy with the hardware. Looks great day or night!
If you have a bigger chest plan not to zip this closed. Otherwise, this is a beautiful and functional jacket. I got many compliments on it each time I wore it. Also very versatile!
Really really nice quality and amazing style. Rented to wear on chillier days and kept me warm most of the time

Loved it. It was a little too small for me but I wore it anyway. Considering switching sizes to a larger jacket and buying it - i've never worn a leather jacket that is cut so well, lays so nicely on the body and stays this warm. It's a magical piece. I'm in LOVE with it!
Loved this jacket. Super chic. Leather smells divine, quality amazing and the color is so perfect. Adore it
Trendy, perfect fit, absolutely loved this jacket! Good for everyday or to dress up a going out outfit. Got tons of compliments. Wore this throughout the fall!

links_reviews_title: A Bit Too Biker for Me
links_reviews_text: Great looking jacket...for someone else. The many zipper details were too overwhelming for me. The jacket also runs small and I needed to size up to a 6. The jacket is extremely well made, high quality leather. If you like a little edge to your outfit this jacket is for you.
fit is a little small but the leather is soooo soft and nice

Like all the reviews, I'm going to say this shirt is big!! I should've sized down one or 2 sizes but I just tried to make the most of it! I like this shirt because I could wear it with leggings or with jeans or over a dress or something! It's very versatile. I chose to wear this with high waisted madewell jeans and half tucked in to show the jeans and my actual waist lol. Also; this shirt wrinkles easy but I just ironed it and was good most of the day!
Nothing else to say - this shirt is just great.

I wore this button up with black jeans. I sized down and it was still very oversized. It resembled a men's shirt with a bit more detail. Not the most flattering but stylist and fun. Looks better in person than in the photo!
It's definitely an oversized look so beware! I liked the size I got but I think next time I would size down just because the arms were really long
a different take on a menswear shirt
I was so excited about this piece but when it arrived it was enormous. I even double checked the size. It fit like a tent.
Loved fabric and construction, but too sloppy for my 65 year old taste. I wore it for a day at home and that was it.
Rented these in-store and were too big for my preference but otherwise loved the jean, even with the (very) relaxed fit. I'll probably rent a size or two down next time.

links_reviews_title: Not as small as everyone said...
links_reviews_text: Absolutely love this look with the (also rented) green crop top and booties!! The reviews said that you should order up two sizes...maybe only if you have a thicker waist or hip area. These were WAY too big on me but I wore them anyways ha! I am going to re-rent in a smaller size because they are awesome. Thousands of compliments :)

links_reviews_title: Love the mix of high-waist and acid wash
links_reviews_text: These are amazing jeans. I loved the buttons, high waist and hint of stretch. I wouldn't buy acid wash jeans, but it was fun to rent the trend.

links_reviews_title: Wore these to a work offsite and picked them up in store... never would have guessed I'd need a 6
links_reviews_text: I tried these on in store and ended up wearing a 6, which made these jeans super comfy and easy to wear. I usually wear a 25 waist so I probably wouldn't have been able to wear these if I ordered online- size up! Really fashionable tho!

I'm not sure how these worked for everyone but me. It fit but weirdly because these are fitted through the hips but have no stretch making a button fly difficult to work with. I should have gone up a size but I don't think this would have helped. They were also unflattering on me. Didn't wear.
These were so cute, but tight in the waist. I sized up and felt uncomfortable when I would sit down. Something to keep in mind if you rent, but still worth it!

Ulla Johnson's acid wash this season (pre-fall 2019) is the ultimate in my opinion. The richness of the visual texture and the hearty weight of the denim itself are a striking combo. This particular style (tight, cropped, flared), is just not for me, but I enjoyed trying them!

These are really fun to wear and look great. They're super comfortable. The fit near the pockets is a little awkward as they flare out a bit, and all the buttons take a while to do, but I think overall worth renting. Might keep for a few weeks!
Fantastic and flattering jean. Size up if your hips are curvy
Not quite slimming jeans. Also, not great for long legs.

I'm a size 2 or 4 in Ulla Johnson, always. Her jeans tend to run big in my experience. For some reason, this style runs TINY....I got it in a size 4 and I can't even button them (not even close)! Be aware, probably best to order at least a size up from your normal! Aside from the sizing issue they seem really cute.

links_reviews_title: Non stretch denim but SO cute
links_reviews_text: So obsessed with these jeans. They're a bit tight and do not stretch, but they're very slimming and are so cute. I have an athletic build and regularly wear 26/27 and size 4 fit a little tight but very very cute and flattering. Size 6 was too big (tried on in store)
Way too small. I am regularly an 8 in everything Ulla Johnson and I would have needed to size up twice. The 10 did not even fit.
Literally so flattering and different. Elevate your jean game. Size up tho!! One size up and it fit me like a glove

links_reviews_title: Fun jeans to mix it up!
links_reviews_text: These are super cute fun jeans! They are a little uncomfortable when sitting with all the buttons and the pockets kind of stick out. I still really liked them and would rent again!

links_reviews_title: I could pair them with almost everything. I loved them. So comfy
links_reviews_text: Amazing everyday jeans!

links_reviews_title: Runs very small and no stretch
links_reviews_text: Couldn't pull them over my butt. Look really cute though! I'd probably need two sizes up.
Runs super small with NO stretch. Definitely size up. I couldn't even close the 8 and I am usually a 6 or 8.
Runs very small, cute otherwise
Loved the wash and style but I couldn't get these past my hips and butt. The jeans are shaped very straight not suitable for curves. Def size up
I grabbed an 8r and should've grabbed a 10. They felt like a great jean material but there's no give. Not the pants fault--shopper error
These do run a little small in the waist so you may want to size up. They have an acid wash finish which looks different than pictured. I loved the unique look paired with a peasant top.
The jeans were too tight in the waist and too baggy in the knees.

I am usually always a size 4 in designer clothing, especially jeans, but after reading reviews and knowing the brand I went up a size on these jeans. Wow! I couldn't even get them past my mid thighs ( and I don't have thick legs). The look and feel of these jeans are awesome but if you have any curves you may need to go up 2 sizes for these. So disappointed.

links_reviews_title: These are so cute, but didn't get to wear them. They run pretty small
links_reviews_text: Runs very small I would recommend sizing up 2

links_reviews_title: Loved, but no stretch and not for curves
links_reviews_text: Loved these jeans but they have no give/stretch and have a smaller waist to hip ratio so for my curves it was a bit snug and a little uncomfortable to sit for long periods of time. If I owned them, I would buy a size up and take the waist in because the style is super flattering and a great wash
Cute jeans. Fit a little snug for me.
True to size

As others have mentioned, these have no stretch which makes the button fly very difficult to close. Once closed, they had a lovely fit overall but do run very small in the waist (a solid 1 or 2 inches smaller than other jean brands). Did not wear because they were so difficult to get on/off.
I'm typically a 2 or 4. I do have a butt, but i was surprised that the 6 was tight on me. these definitely run small.

My friends thought these jeans were tailored to me! They have a great fit (a little bit on the smaller side) and are funky, stand out jeans. I wore them to work and out to a party and got compliments left and right!

links_reviews_title: Couldn't get them past my butt lol. Beautiful fabric and details, going to rent a size up.
links_reviews_text: Meow
Was looking forward to wearing but they fit very small
This is a dark grey, not black. It's reversible, which is a fun feature.
Great sweater. Flattering fit and not too tight but has a nice shape, not boxy. The zipper detail makes it more special. Love it!

As other reviewers have noted, the RTR model seems to have this sweater on backwards. I took a picture with the zip in the front to highlight this, though I actually preferred the look of the zip in the back. For such an expensive sweater, I didn't find the material that nice. Would have preferred cashmere :) I also think it was a bit short, but overall okay.

Love this comfy sweater! I'm a fan of tops with nice long sleeves because I have long arms. I also like the hole for your thumb. The back is also cool. It zips in the back, making it look like the ti]op is on backwards.

links_reviews_title: Some cool details, but just a plain turtleneck
links_reviews_text: This was a high-quality garment with some chic details, but it wasn't really the right fit for my style. I wore it on the weekend with high-waist blue jeans and it was warm and comfortable and made for a very polished casual look. But I wasn't really able to style it in a way I loved especially with dressier clothes for work - I had hoped it might fit more like a shirt and be able to be tucked into pants/skirts and it was too loose and a bit too bulky for that. But it also wasn't an oversized fit so I just felt a little preppy and suburban, despite the edgy sleeve and back details.

links_reviews_title: The zip on the back is so cute
links_reviews_text: This sweater is so comfy and thick! It's well made and the zipper on the back adds so much detail! Sometimes it got bunchy on the back so I took a picture like that so you can see what I mean. The neck is ultra high which is nice in a turtleneck for warmth, of course, but by the end of my work day I wanted out of it!

You can wear this as a turtleneck, like the RTR model wears, or the imtended way, with the label in back as a zip up. Either way it is fabulous. Well made, charcoal knit with fabric near zipper. I have worn it both ways amd get compliments each time.

Highly recommend! Feels amazing, and is very flattering. I folded the neck down a bit, because when it's up all the way it was a bit too much. I know some people are wearing it with the zipper in the front but I think it really should be worn with the zipper in the back. I didn't have issues with my hair getting stuck in the zipper in the back - overall really loved this and would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Nice dressier than normal casual sweater
links_reviews_text: Really liked the sweater. Wore it to a weekend work appointment (a little dressier) and then again to a family party the next day. It was appropriate for both occasions The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars was the zipper is a little clumsy. Minor issue though
I only wore this once... actually, I don't think I even wore it fore the whole day.... it was itchy, and the sleeves were super long. But, definitely a high quality piece.
This turtleneck is very thick and warm, tight, but cozy. Probably best on skinny people only because it definitely adds bulk everywhere
Comfortable fit

links_reviews_title: Great sweater --very versatile and zipper in back makes it fun.
links_reviews_text: Snug across chest and very warm but lots of fun to wear. Paired it with jeans for a college basketball game and then again for an at-home game night with friends. Paired it with a leather skirt and boots for a New Year's Eve party. Got lots of compliments on it both ways.
The sweater , while nice quality, was more grey than black. It's Beery thick and does not fit like the photo

This zip up sweater wasn't just extremely warm and comfortable, it fit like a glove and everyone noticed'! Rented just for daily wear, I picked up each of my three kids to the tune of "You look so warm," "You look amazing today!" and (at my oldest's school) "That jacket is hot." It fit perfectly in every way and I was able to wear it over a ribbed turtleneck. Sleeve length was perfect and because of the thumb holes, no gloves needed! Terrific piece, perfect fit and apparently "hot!"

links_reviews_title: Didn't work for me - back zipper is super uncomfortable
links_reviews_text: This sweater didn't work for me. I thought it was a bit big and putting it on was definitely a two person job. While driving or sitting, the zipper constantly dug into my spine.
Fun sweater - back zipper detail was different.

Comfy sweater, the zipper on the back was great added detail to make it look more sophisticated. Fit perfectly in every way, except for the arms being a bit long. However, I'm quite petite so that was to be expected.

I loved the way this sweater looked with the zipper in the back. I ended up wearing it with the zipper in the front as the weather was a bit warm. This worked well with a short sleeve shirt underneath and allowed for versatility.

links_reviews_title: Cool sweater. Comfy and warm. Easy ti wear.
links_reviews_text: It fit well. Wouldn't be very comfortable to sit in all day since it has the zipper in the back, but I got lots of compliments.
Runs a little large but otherwise perfect!

I've only tried it on briefly so far, but I love it and can't wait to wear it on an upcoming trip to Munich in April. It's versatile. You can wear it as a lone sweater with the zipper in the back, or as an open sweater with the zipper in the front. Super cool functionality. The only downside is that it's definitely been laundered a lot. The fabric has that feeling of well worn.

links_reviews_title: Gorg sweater, can wear with zipper in front or back.
links_reviews_text: Way to short for someone e5'10, long-waisted. More of a casual look.

Love this sweater! The zipper in the back adds a fun detail making it stand out from other black sweaters. I wore it with zipper in front as well for a classic look. Wish I would have rented earlier in the winter season so u could get more wear out of it. Too expensive to buy, but worth renting for a while.

links_reviews_title: I was unable to wear this in a M
links_reviews_text: Sweater runs small through the arms and is shorter than I had hoped. I also rented the L and I am pleased with the fit. Beautiful sweater
Very thick material so great for the coldest of days. Color was more charcoal vs. black. Was def good quality but the retail price for this brand seems absurdly high and makes no sense.

links_reviews_title: Thick fabric and seems to have lost its shape and color.
links_reviews_text: boxy fit - thick fabric
Great sweater. Fun zipper on the back was a great detail.

Super warm, very soft and the long sleeves with thumb holes are perfect for cold winter weather! You can zip the back of the neck up as high as you want, so if you're like me and hate turtlenecks that strangle you, just leave it a little looser. Might not give this one back until it warms up :)

links_reviews_title: Definitely not into this - tried it on and sent it right back.
links_reviews_text: Bleh - not a fan - the collar/neck lays in a super weird way and it is much shorter in the torso than I would have expected... not for me.
Wore with the zipper in the back. Cute thumb holes. Sort of weird fabric on back which I didn't notice prior to renting. Very warm so got hot wearing to work.
This sweater is fairly nice and fits true to size. I didn't end up wearing it because I didn't like the way the zipper felt on my back, but looked good.
Super cool sweater, was a bit uncomfortable.

links_reviews_title: Was amazing, but I'm long waisted and it was too short for me.
links_reviews_text: Was amazing, but I'm long waisted and it was too short for me.

links_reviews_title: This is such a chic look, and easy. I paired it with a leather jacket and i looked and felt amazing!
links_reviews_text: It does run a little small but not bad. Not tight just shorter than expected,
The zipper on the back is pretty unique. The sweater is quite warm but does run small
Very cool with the zipper in the back.
It's gorgeous! I loved it. You've got to try it!!
Pro: nice quality Warm Can wear backwards and forwards Con: is beginning to show wear; especially the zipper and the sleeves

links_reviews_title: Do I always have to do a review
links_reviews_text: I thought I already did this
Loved the Color but it was tighter through the chest
Loved the color. Wearing it made me excited to go to work!
Gorgeous color! Fit like a glove and loved the cap sleeves. Very professional and work appropriate. The fabric did wrinkle easily but nothing a quick steam couldn't fix.
This dress was so comfortable and flattering. The feel is high quality.
Pretty dress with quality fabric and tailoring. Chest area was a bit loose for me (32B) but filled it out with a push-up bra. Nice fit and easy for work with black tights and cardigan

I loved this dress and got lots of compliments. The color is great, and the length is appropriate even on someone tall like me. The only warning I have is that it's a bit unforgiving in the waist--it fit fine when I was standing up, but was a little tight/unflattering when I sat down.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous color, true fit, snug at chest
links_reviews_text: LOVED this dress, wore for day to nightlife, paired it with opaque tights and closed toe Mary Jane heels. Very flattering around the waist but there is no Stretch in the chest, so if you are big breasted I'd go up a size and cinch you waist with a belt.

links_reviews_title: High quality, gorgeous and vibrant green - great work dress
links_reviews_text: This dress is so pretty! The green is really vibrant and beautiful. The skirt isn't what I usually go for at work, but it is fun and certainly very pretty. I particularly like the neckline, though - it's unique and interesting. I paired this with a belt and black hose, and it worked well on a cold late fall day at the office. MM Lafleur always has high quality pieces, this one included. The fabric is beautiful and the fit is lovely. Looks so pretty in person.
So many compliments on this dress! It is beautifully cut and the color is gorgeous. Perfect for work and could easily be dressed up for going out.

Loved the simple elegance of this dress - wore to work and got many compliment. Fabric is high quality and structured but the liner is silky, making it's easy to put on and wear all day. The neckline is stunning, and has a slight lifted collar shape. Extremely comfortable.

I ordered this for work and an event and loved the color! I received multiple compliments on it. It is very fitted up top (a little tighter than expected) and flares out at the bottom. It was comfortable and I do recommend for work or work events.
This dress fits well and looks great for work. It fits true to size.

This dress has a beautiful color, but it isn't meant for busty gals. It was so tight across the chest that it was unwearable for me - 34DDD. Not too low cut, just tight. Too bad because otherwise it has a nice swingy skirt.
Great fit! Surprisingly amazing!
Great color, great fit, great length....just great!! I got lots of compliments and thought the color was a perfect green. Wonderful for petite ladies.

I wear anything from a 8-12 in MMLF. I am a MMFL shopper and proud MMLF owner. This dress does not do them credit. First off, it was so tight in the tummy that I felt bad about myself. Second, the flare of the dress just seems awkward when paired with the very conservative neckline. Third, it looked and felt cheap, which is not what I know about most MMLF clothes. Sending back unworn, never to rent again.

This dress was awkward. The 8 was small overall, but there is another odd detail. The arm holes are cut in a way where it feels like they are too large--it felt like my side boob wanted to pop out in a way that really wasn't flattering. This was a miss for me

This was a fabulous dress. The only con was that the fabric was a little meh. Pros are fantastic fit, super comfortable, fun neckline, beautiful color and work-appropriate length. I paired with nude heels - easy, easy.

links_reviews_title: Great dress, easy to wear and beautiful color
links_reviews_text: Great fit and fit my body really nicely.
Very flattering fit, slimming waist
Loved this classy and elegant dress, I wore to Christmas Eve service at church. Everything about this dress is perfect, cinches at the waist and flares out. If only it had pockets - - -

Wore this for Thanksgiving and several holiday parties. Absolutely loved it. It was juuust barely long enough for me (5'10"), and the sleeves seemed to make my arms look a bit chunkier than normal, but still a lovely dress.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color and fabric, just a little too fitted
links_reviews_text: Great silhouette, but ran a little too small in the hip/midsection area.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress- runs true to size
links_reviews_text: Rented this for a company holiday party and it was the perfect choice! Flattering cut that you can wear a normal bra with! Fit like a glove, will definitely consider renting this again
This dress is such a beautiful color and so flattering!

links_reviews_title: Felt like a million bucks and a top exec
links_reviews_text: This dress is gorgeous. The color is so vibrant and the cut is perfect - flattering but appropriate for work (although a great straight to dinner dress as well). The fabric isn't soft, per se, but I imagine it would hold up well.

links_reviews_title: The color of this dress was perfection.
links_reviews_text: Fit was great, perfect for the event I hosted.
Great length and cut for work. Got so many compliments. Great material and very comfy.

links_reviews_title: Very cute- runs small. Sent back for next size.
links_reviews_text: Could wear this for anything. Great color/cub, but slightly small. I sent back and am excited to try the next size.

I have purchased from MM many dresses in the past and foudn them to be very high quality with impeccable fit. This dress missed the mark all around. While tall at 5'11", that's never been an issue before. This dress came mid-thigh on me (unlike what's pictured on the model) and the narrowness of the chest left too much "arm cleavage". The fabric around the neck never laid flat - a result of poor construction as I tried ironing several times. I almost wondered if this dress was mis-sized and possibly a 10 petite...
This awesome dress was a bit too small to wear out :(

links_reviews_title: Absolutely love this dress. Vibrant green color and cut is flattering--a line.
links_reviews_text: It was gorgeous and flattering on my pear shape. Would consider buying it.

links_reviews_title: Loved it! Wore to work (I work at a school).
links_reviews_text: Beautiful color and very comfortable.

I got this specifically for a work dinner, and I absolutely love it. The material is well shaped and I love the cut which is both modern as well as professional with a touch of sexy. The color is perfect for people with my coloring, actually it would probably go great with most coloring
True to size, great length. Fun silhouette and neckline make an otherwise simple dress fun and interesting.
This dress fit perfectly which is unusual for me being petite.
Loved the unique color & cut of this sweater! It definitely stands out! I wore it with black jeans & heels. It's very cropped & is great with high waisted pants. I recommend!
Loved the color, fit and texture of this sweatshirt! I wanted to keep it!

Loved the mint color and material of this comfy sweatshirt! It is a little cropped, but I am 5'3 and it wasn't an issue when worn with high waisted jeans. Would look awesome with white jeans! Definitely recommend.
This sweater was cute, but had two stains on it. The fabric was very hard and inflexible, like a canvas-type texture, but I oddly enough liked it. I wore this around town running errands
It was a cute top, but it kinda looked better on photographs (and a little short). Still loved it though!
Such a great sweatshirt! Easily dressed up or down. Cropped in the length, but pairs perfectly with high waisted pants. Loved so much I wore multiple times!
Great pop of color. This Tibi fit is quite boxy so size down if you don't want super wide shoulders. I wore an xs when I typically would go for small.

links_reviews_title: Bright mint pull-over, a cute crop for cooler weather
links_reviews_text: True crop top, light-weight sweatshirt material. Fit is boxy, but stylish.

I left a review earlier tonight about this top. It is more sweatshirt than sweater and that bothered me. I don't really like sweatshirts. So I was packing it up to return first thing tomorrow. But for some reason I tried it on with the very high waisted black jeans. Can't remember the brand but I got them here. Anyway, the top is much cuter once on!! So do try on everything before returning!! Needless to say , I won't be sending it back tomorrow

links_reviews_title: Fun piece in a great color
links_reviews_text: The fit was a bit too short (cropped) and boxy

links_reviews_title: Bright color, comfy and fun to wear! Will rent again!
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit including arm length!

links_reviews_title: Way more versatile that I thought
links_reviews_text: I borrowed this to wear for a casual friday with some dressy joggers... but ended up throwing it on with my boyfriend jeans before settling in to watch a movie with my husband and with leggings on a day spent with my kids and errands. I actually think it would look awesome with a pencil skirt and heels too. I love the color - very springy!
I love a good crop top, especially in a bright color like this, but it was way too short! Could not wear.
great sweater. Would rent again.
Cute top, perfect for any type of event
Boxy but a cute fit and great color

I rented this for a trip to LA and it was so cute! I wasn't sure about the color from the photos but it's really nice pop in person and also flattering. The V is a nice length, not too deep. It's definitely cropped, but looks good with high waisted jeans. Perfect for a windy day in LA.
Needed a medium but there's wasn't one available. Ordered a size up and was definitely too large. However, great color and quality. Would recommend.
This cropped Tibi sweatshirt is lightweight. For women with larger chests, it will sit very cropped. Overall, solid basic rental.
Very comfortable, great color, love the v neck, and the loose fit on the the torso.

This was a color I would never have chosen for myself but I really liked it. It's a boxy cropped fit and it was super cute with high-waisted pants. I wore it with jeans on the weekend and with black trousers to work. It worked in both venues.

Pros- Color-I really wanted to add some color to my winter wardrobe, and this certainly did it Quality- this was brand new when I received it, the quailty was excellent Fun-it's a "fun" sweater, it's cropped so it's a little edgy Cons- Warmth- it's not too warm, so you will need to add an extra layer if you rent it in winter months
True to size and cute for a winter work outfit

I like to wear skirts high waisted so the fit was fine but a little snug in the tummy area. It was still flattering and I got many compliments. If you want to wear this lower on the hips it would be much too small.
Super cute skirt. First tweed item I've ever worn. Button fell off mid day. Would wear again.
There were no reviews when I rented this skirt but I'm really digging this Slate & Willow skirt! P.S. My husband says I look like a school girl! 🤣🤦‍♀️

links_reviews_title: Nice fit and not too short. Could wear lots of colors with it.
links_reviews_text: Fit was true to size. I wear things really high on my waist and it was still long enough for work. I think I wore it a couple times but with different tights and tops. I would buy this to have in my wardrobe. Cute.

Fit was great, not too short, not too long, only problem is the zipper bunches a little at the bottom and the slip can be seen in the front. But so cute paired with tights for the winter and the buttons are super flattering
I loved this skirt! Felt true to size. Looked cute and casual with over the knee boots but also worked well for work with tights and booties. Might have to keep this one!
Get your regular size. So comfy and cute

links_reviews_title: Love how comfortable and cute this outfit looks

links_reviews_text: This skirt was great for work (even in the cold NYC weather)! I received tons of compliments and would recommend anyone to rent!
Thought this Would be more appropriate for a night out… But turned out being more work appropriate with the length and fit! No complaints. Perfect for fall!
I got it with the matching jacket and honestly, I think it looks better on its own. The skirt is cute but too big for me.
Cute skirt and good for petites. High wasted.

I was in-between a size 10 & 12 so I got the 12. It was slightly large on me but I wore the skirt with tights and a turtleneck so you couldn't tell. I received so many compliments - very cute and comfy skirt.
This was so short and so tight it was comical. Couldn't even get the skirt zipped but it didn't matter because it came up to before my mid thighs.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to work with tights. Super cute.
links_reviews_text: Great quality. Fits well. I really liked it.
Work with a thin black turtleneck and sheets tights!
I loved the way the skirt accentuated my curves and it was comfortable all day long. I went from work to drinks in this and still felt great!

links_reviews_title: Solid skirt for work or play.
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size and had a little room to tuck a blouse into it which looked really cute.
Great for work. The button section bulges a little so it was a little unflattering in that area. Otherwise fit well

links_reviews_title: Polished, tweed skirt perfect for work
links_reviews_text: Loved this skirt. Material is thick, and while the skirt is a little short, when it is worn with leggings it felt perfectly appropriate for work. Received TONS of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Such a fun, Fall skirt! Super cute button detailing!
links_reviews_text: Loved loved loved this skirt and will definitely be renting it again! For sizing, I would recommend sizing down one size because I found it to be a bit loose at the waist. The skirt has really cute black button details in the front which I loved. Super easy to pair this skirt with a solid color top!
This dress was adorable and fit great with a bump (20 weeks). Loved the scalloped edges and length was great. Only thing I didn't love was the fabric is a tiny bit itchy but not terrible!

links_reviews_title: Easy kind of warm winter sweater dress
links_reviews_text: Not as thick as the others but cute. The stripes aren't too much. And I like the cut on the neck and wrists.
Great for work or dinner, elegant detailing on the sleeve, its 50% wool but not itchy

links_reviews_title: Very cute dress, got lots of compliments. The colors are gorgeous. Beware of itchy fabric though!
links_reviews_text: Great fit for a maternity style. Wore this at 24 weeks and the bump looked very nice! However the fabric was SO ITCHY. I could not stop scratching myself all day, looked forward to getting home and taking it off.
Perfect for spring. High quality details and fabric. Really enjoyed wearing this dress and got compliments on it.

I gave this dress three stars because of the scratchy wool. Otherwise it's colorful, cute and fits well. It looks incredibly tiny before you put it on but it fits like a glove and stretches out a bit during the day.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress works for winter or spring
links_reviews_text: Very cute and comfortable Could have gone smaller--was loose by end of day
Great dress. The shade of blue really pops. There's some nice subtle details on the neck and wrist that make this dress special. Stretchy and forgiving.
Oversized fit with bright beautiful colors and unexpected details like an uneven hem and the pattern. Love.

Loved this sweater, so warm and thick. The cut is so unique and I love how it is a little longer in the back to give you a little more coverage, especially when paired with shorts. Got a lot of compliments and felt cozy and cute!
Loved this cozy piece. It's a bit oversized so was a bit breezy in the back but still loved it. Not itchy and fun color block patterns make a nice pop of color in the all-black nyc winter wardrobe.

Great color blocking! I LOVED the colors. Everything else was just ok for me... But I'm also not into the oversized look at all so that's where the thrill may've gotten lost at. I intentionally ordered an XS although I typically where M/L because I wanted a more fitted look. It wasn't terrible it's just that with such an expensive price tag, I was underwhelmed. The bottom of the sweater is clearly meant to hang longer. It's made really well and layered up nicely with a matching turtleneck.
I wore this to work with a black skirt and boots, and to a Broadway show with jeans, and it worked well for both. Got lots of compliments.
I got so many compliments on it! Obviously it's oversized but it's so cute paired with leggings and boots

links_reviews_title: Very comfy and chic. The dark color is navy, not black.
links_reviews_text: Very comfy and chic. The dark color is navy, not black.
Hesitant to order. Hesitant to even try on once I saw it on the hanger but it was much cuter on than anticipated and I got a lot of compliments on it.

links_reviews_title: Size down! Even you curvy ladies sizeeee down! :)
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous sweater, heavy weight, long in the arms but def oversized even for "oversized" body style. Size down no matter what and you'll love it.

links_reviews_title: Didn’t wear need smaller size, nice colors
links_reviews_text: Runs very large - will return without wearing
Fun sweater, lots of compliments. Comfortable and warm. I would probably only wear when temperature is below 60 degrees.
Love love loved this jacket! Longer than I usually wear, but it fit well and the fabric was gorgeous. I wish I could've kept this one!
Fit is true to size. This blazer is very versatile and looks expensive. Could be dressed up or down. I wore it with work pants one day, and jeans another day.
Loved this blazer for it's comfort and coziness, I run cold, so this has a little warmth to it. Great for chilly spring days. Wore it with jeans and a cami. Feminine, but polished looking
This is pretty but felt a little frumpy. I paired with a pencil skirt to sexy it up a bit!
A nice take on a blazer. Nice print, quality fabric. It does fit a bit boxy, so consider sizing down for a more fitted look.
Was all over too big.

This jacket is super fun! It's also very soft! I was surprised by how comfortable it is. It's a soft corduroy which made it great for a full day of work. It fit really well and was definitely a fun way to add in some color.
Beautiful fabric. More boxy than I expected but was ok for work.
Absolutely perfect! Love the color combo of a deep wine + parchment. The floral part provides a soft touch. Fit was perfect. Arms a bit tight but with a tank top underneath, no problems.

Wore over a 3 day Thanksgiving trip, and it was a nice alternative to a light jacket. It is nicely tailored and fit me perfectly. I'm glad the sleeves weren't too long for me. That being said, even though I love florals this blazer was a little too prairieish for me. The velvet is great quality.

links_reviews_title: Nice fit, great way to spruce up jeans or black pants.
links_reviews_text: Fits very nicely, not boxy like a lot of blazers. But it's very thick bc of the velvet. So it's great to wear as a jacket in itself, but gets bulky under coats. The velvet kind of sticks to the coat and the back of the coat ends up mushing up against your neck, looking really weird. So I'd recco it more for the fall (or if you live in a place where it's in the 60s) when you can wear it without a coat over it.

This blazer is super comfortable and has long enough sleeves, which is hard for me to find! It is a little bit longer than I think is flattering on me, though. The colors are gorgeous, and the print really fits into 2019's whole "florals for fall" trend.
This is a nice jacket, the print looks a little flatter in person, but I liked it. The M fit perfectly and I typically wear a 4 in most brands including Rebecca Taylor.

Fit great, tts, I even have longer arms and this was ok enough :) which is great. Lightly velvety which is what I was hoping. I called this the flower power jacket because my son said I looked like a serious business person and my husband said the back just "has a lot of flowers"

I sized up to a 6 (normally a 2/4) and I think I would have been fine in a 4. It runs short but that's the style, and the body part was big on me. Pattern and colors are cute, feminine cut, versatile (work, date, dinner, etc.) and luxe material!! Zipper is on the side!
Love this top! I would have preferred to get a size up but this size I got was the only available. It fit good enough to wear twice, but was on the tighter size.
super cropped, so pair with ultra-high rise pants or skirt. statement sleeves for the win. high quality silky/satin fabric.
I liked this top but it is short and runs small.

links_reviews_title: This top is GORGEOUS!! I would TOTALLY rent again!!
links_reviews_text: Loved this top!! I ordered the 12 because the 10 was not available at the time in needed. So happy I did!! The 12 fit perfect! It has a side zipper on the left which was necessary because the shirt does not stretch! It's also a little short but paired with high waisted jeans and because I had the bigger size it ended up working out wonderfully!
Easy shirt to wear to work. I don't have a big chest so it was gaping a little.

links_reviews_title: The peplum and cut was beautiful but...
links_reviews_text: The blouse is just stunning but if you are wide in your midsection it fits too snug and is cut shorter/cropped more than appears in the model picture. The fabric is lovely and I love the print. The cut is beautiful but I would try sizing up 2 sizes next time to see if the narrow/cropped bottom cut corrects the issue . Maybe this would be more comfortable.

Fits a little snug in the ribs when you're zipping it up but overall really comfy. There's a slight shoulder pad that helps achieve the poof shoulder which was really flattering. Would def rent again.

This definitely runs on the smaller side. If you are tall I imagine it would be quite cropped. And the waist part before it peplums out is fitted without stretch. It was comfortable though and not too tight on me. The material is nice and soft. I loved the sleeves. They are dramatic but because they cinch at the bottom you can modify the length and they aren't too long.
This was a great top for work, super flattering and I loved the sleeve detail. The v-neck was not too low cut and definitely office appropriate. Would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful cut but not the most comfortable
links_reviews_text: The fabric is incredible. It's poly but feels like silk. The cut is very flattering and the elastic on the sleeves weren't as uncomfortable as I feared. However the ribcage area was VERY tight–would be better if you had a 30-32" bra size. Also it's on the shorter side, not great with my longer torso, felt a little too exposed at work. Oh and there's a tag on the right side that's AWFUL so itchy. But lots of compliments.

I wore this shirt for New Year's Eve and I loved it. It felt special and sexy without trying too hard. The print is gorgeous and the material is luxe. I'm usually a 0 or 2 and rented a 4 based on reviews. It fit comfortably so I would definitely size up. I was afraid of the V being too low from the way it looks off the hanger, but it draped very nicely when on and I didn't need to pin it.

links_reviews_title: It didn't fit - too small in the ribcage and too short even if I could zip it.
links_reviews_text: short waist.... runs small
Order 1-2 sizes smaller than normal
Very short -- almost a mid-drift top. To small for me; does not zip up. Not flattering for my body. It would be really cute if it fit and was longer.

links_reviews_title: Great fit on the top, too small at the waist.
links_reviews_text: From the chest up, I loved this blouse. But I'm a pear shaped figure and the torso on this blouse was so short! Even with high waisted jeans, I struggled to prevent my skin from showing in my midriff and sides. If you have a short torso or perhaps smaller bottom half, this might work great for you!
Smooth, beautiful fabric. Zipper on the side allows you to pull over your head. Runs small -- beware if you do not have a small torso. One of my favs.
Cute print, nice silky material, fun sleeves. Only complaint is that it was a little too cropped for my taste. Wore it with high waisted jeans for a date and put a blazer over it for work.
cute, fun pattern, and perfect for date nights
The fit of this top was perfect for me!! Very becoming!! Yes, short but not too too...

Loved this top. Would have purchased it but it's still a bit expensive for me. It runs a bit small and is very fitted in the waist, so be aware when you order. I am usually a size 6 and the 8 fit me perfectly. Size up one size in general, or two sizes if you'd like a roomier fit at the waist.
If you have a wide rib cage the top does run small.

I sized up in this top and it was still veryyy right around the waist (with no give). It's also MUCH more cropped than the picture shows so you'd need a good skirt or very high waisted jeans. Otherwise, the pattern and colors were super cute and I really wanted to make it work. Might just need to wear it on a day I'm feeling skinnier than usual :)
Got a compliment from the woman who interviewed me! The only con is that it is a little cropped so you need to wear high waisted pants or a skirt.
This is beautiful shirt! It's more cropped than I expected and the peplum hits the waist perfectly. Fits beautifully and very flattering!!

These jeans did what they were supposed to. I needed a high waisted pair and they were great. I could've gone down a size, but they fit true to size. They don't steal the show or anything, just a good solid pair of jeans.

links_reviews_title: I absolutely LOVED these jeans so much! I'm running out to buy this exact style and wash.
links_reviews_text: It does run small, but hey that's motivation to fit in them better! The wash is very flattering and timeless. I like the spacing of the back pockets.
not a ton of stretch but more than some levi's i've owned, perfectly high waisted.
I thought they ran small, but I sized up and they were fairly comfortable. They were a bit unflattering around the midsection, but accentuated my curves (in a good way) everywhere else.
Great everyday jeans. Comfortable, stretch to fit, flattering on the booty. Considering buying.
size down a size-- I own 27 (my usual size) but 26 fit perfectly
They were a little short on me but were a nice thicker Jean material. Not very stretchy so you might want to size up
These jeans are so comfy and flattering for my hourglass frame! They are so worth it and if I wasn't still in the process of losing weight, I would have bought them!

links_reviews_title: Couldn't get it past my thighs
links_reviews_text: The shape of these jeans just didn't work with my body. Even though I'm a size 6 these just couldn't make it past my thighs and butt, but it was clear the waist would have been fine- basically if GOOD AMERICAN jeans are perfect for your body then these one's probably won't be. The quality seemed good though and the wash was really nice.
For some reason I expected these to be a little more denim and less stretch .
Good fit
The style and denim fit was great and really comfy. I wish they were just a tad lower waisted
Fit great, would have bought it if it came new with tag.
Love the fit nice length. Waist was too tight
A little scratchy
Not much stretch, but they fit great to start, so no complaints. Wore these two days in a row to work.

links_reviews_title: Levi’s - modern yet classic for work
links_reviews_text: Loved the look and feel of these! Trendy yet classic enough to wear to work!
They're fine
Stretch out A LOT during wear

links_reviews_title: This cut is not made for women with curves
links_reviews_text: I rented these Bc everyone gives levis great reviews which say they make your butt look great. The thing is, that they are made for women who don't already have curves and gives them some. Th Hahahahaha y were super stiff, actually flattened my butt and I had the big gap in the back of the jeans, didn't wear them!
Very comfortable
The jeans are high waited and come to the ankle. Instead of a zipper they have a button close. Very comfortable.
Runs very small in hips, didn't wear them.

These Jean's are very flattering and classic. They do tend to loosen up throughout the day, so order the smallest size that you can fit in. I'm on the border of 27 and 28 and next time I get them I'll get 27.

links_reviews_title: I love wearing jeans and wanted to try these on.
links_reviews_text: When they arrive they fit super tight and perfect. After a couple of wears they get very lose around the hips so I will definitely wear a size smaller next time as they really stretch. I love the color and the way they fit.
I only tried them on. I liked them but they seemed to run a little big and were baggy in the crotch area and around my waste
Fit well
These were just alright. The waist gaped a little and they had no stretch. Not my favorite jeans, but wearable!
Purchasing! Love these

It's been a long time since I've worn a traditional pair of 501 Levi's. But almost as soon as I put these on I knew they were going back. I just don't like high-rise jeans and these just about reached my navel which I find both unflattering and uncomfortable even in the correct size. Sent 'em back after a single trip to the grocery store. Nope.
These pants runs VERY small, but if you are looking for jeans that will keep there shape throughout the day after multiple wears... these are those jeans.

These jeans were small in the waist (like wouldn't close) and large in the legs, which is a problem I never have as my waist is 1-2 sizes smaller than my hips. I put true to size because I wasn't sure what to choose. I rented the Mile High Super Skinny Levis in the same size and they are the best pair of jeans I've ever put on my body. Try those!

links_reviews_title: The high waist was great, but when I sat down I had to unbutton top button.
links_reviews_text: Jeans have buttons, no zip. Cute jeans but not overly impressed. Would not rent again.

links_reviews_title: Ran large, will rent one size down
links_reviews_text: Runs large

links_reviews_title: If you're tall, these are petal pushers
links_reviews_text: These were so comfy and I love the high waist, but they were cropped on me (not long like the photo).
N/A
These were ok. They stretched out a bit in spots when I was wearing them. I wore them a couple times and didn't love or hate them.
These are average jeans and nothing special. I did enjoy that they were high wasted and stretch material.
I'm 5"11 and these were super cropped. Might work as regular length for someone under 5'5". Cute otherwise.
They run pretty big and looked very mom-like on me.

I rented this for a Sevens Rugby tournament thinking it was green. It's actually more of a blue, but I still loved it. It's super warm, comfortable, and stylish. I'm considering buying it. Definitely recommend.

Great fleece for travel or comfort. I had a long car ride for a wedding in Pennsylvania and wanted something different than my normal plain Jane sweatshirts. Have rented at least 3 times since it was posted.
Oversized and comfy and my favorite thing I rented.
I sized up to try and wear this oversized, but underestimated how thick and fuzzy the pullover would be. Chic piece!

I'm not going to call myself a connoisseur of sweatshirts but ... I literally own dozens. This one is weirdly unflattering in the middle? The faux shearling goes into the front pockets. Idk I'll wear this to run errands on a Sunday but that's about it. Maybe sizing up would actually help? Lean into it?
I legit wore this every day. It was so comfy and cute. I usually wear an XS in clothes but got a M because I like my sweatshirts oversized. Perfect!

This piece has lots of volume! It's got a thick teddy outer and a silky lining inside. Great for strolling through downtown in early winter. Looks great and kept me toasty warm. I usually wear a medium, and ordered this in a small - still had a lot of room on there.
Fun. Super warm. Not as soft on the inside as I'd like. And definitely a more structured build than cozy. Prob won't rent again. Fits large but looks good that way.
I'm all about an oversized fit, but I actually think this is unisex. I looked like a linebacker in the small. It's comfy, but size way down.

links_reviews_title: A little loose but still super cute for a casual work dress.
links_reviews_text: Not as structured as some other sweater dresses have been but still sweet.
Loved this little dress! So cute. Super easy to accessorize. Loved this rent!

I rented this dress for Christmas mass and loved it! It was thick enough that I didn't need a coat for the 50 degree weather but it wasn't constricting in the top or arms. I ordered XS and S and went with the small because the XS was a bit tight in the stomach and chest. Considering I was going to mass I didn't want something form fitting. I wish I could afford this dress because I loved the Draper James style and fit. If you're looking for a holiday dress, look no further! Love this!
Cute, comfy. TTS, fun dress for work.

links_reviews_title: When I walked down the stairs my hubbies eyes just popped and said I looked beautiful!
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit! Everyone loved it! Beautiful, classical sweater dress!

Rented for a business meeting of regional teams! It was a good length, comfortable and modest, but still so cute and flattering. Wearing normal undergarments is always appreciated, too. I got so many compliments!
Wore this to my brother's rehearsal dinner. Perfect for a work event or "dressy casual" event. The bow is a cute accent and wish I owned it to wear to work sometimes!

links_reviews_title: Be careful on the size recommendations!
links_reviews_text: I'm a size 4 normally and had my filters set for size 4. When I selected this, my "recommended size" from RTR was a 2x. I thought maybe it was weird European sizing system and went with it. Nope, this is a true 2x plus size, and I'm swimming in it. Double check the size that RTR recommends for this one. Normally the size recommendations are accurate so I'm not sure what happened here...
Looked polished with navy accessories. Received compliments on overall look.
Maybe the perfect fall dress. Comfy and elegant.
Super cute dress but the material is very very thin, recommend wearing with spanx
