I rented this for a work conference and was pleasantly surprised by how comfortable it was when I tried it on. I didn't wind up wearing it for my presentation because, at 5'10", the skirt hit a few inches above the knee and was a little shorter than I was comfortable wearing for the occasion. I would order this again for a daytime date or even a work event if the weather called for tights.

links_reviews_title: I didn't wear this dress as the size was too big.

links_reviews_text: This was my second time renting this dress and I absolutely love the fit and style. I wore it to work and I received so many compliments!

The pleated bottom and simple red bow makes this dress a classic! The material is thick so it will keep you warm. The length of the arms were a bit short on me, I am 5'8. But overall the structure and look was perfect to wear for my sons baptism.
I did not actually wear this bc I did not have the blue tights or the right shoes but was very surprised at the fit. Length was great for me but prob not someone who is taller.
Perfect length, perfect fit, so many compliments!
Would definitely rent again - I though the fit was true to size and super soft. Definitely needed to pair some spanx with it though to smooth everything out underneath though.
Wore this sweater dress for Christmas Eve party and it was perfect! Warm, but not heavy and gave just enough without sagging or stretching out. The bow was perfect touch of color.
Comfortable and fits true to size. It's a very slimming dress.
Great dress! Ordered an XXL because it was the only one in stock. Could have sized to an XL though. Comfortable and cute!
The bow detail and fit is adorable. It was in perfect shape & quality. Fits true to size
Fit true to size, nice fabric, very nice. I loved this dress!
I loved this dress! Received tons of compliments. Looked very cute with my typical makeup (red lip and black cat-eye). Very retro!
Love this dress! Perfect for work in fall. Fitted through the top and midsection but not inappropriately tight.

links_reviews_title: Very cute dress, thick sweater material

links_reviews_text: Super cool shirt by Nanushka. I was pleasantly surprised that it felt lightweight and flexible, not stuffy or rigid like I feared. I loved the dolphin hemline, it's a very unique aspect about this shirt. The faux leather is super high quality. It can make any outfit look 10x cooler. I used it only as a layering piece, I felt it was too forced of a look for me to wear it as a closed shirt. Overall a trendy choice.
Cool to try fashion trends, material very soft, it could be better cut in chest area

Such a fun top -- wore it open for a more casual weekend look paired with faux leather pants. It was a little hard to button so maybe size up for a little extra comfort, but overall a great rental! Super fab.
Very chic and fashion forward! Made a nice little leather moment!

links_reviews_title: Great material BUT runs small & sleeves short
links_reviews_text: Sizing up from my usual sm to md worked for overall fit, but doesn't help the sleeve situation- they are not 3/4 but not full length...I plan to wear but just push back the sleeves so it looks intentional. Don't rent if expecting full length sleeves.

links_reviews_title: I wore this so many times!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful soft material. The buttons came off, good thing I was able to find them and get them back on.

I fell in love with this top. It was so versatile, I wore it with ripped jeans, a skirt, pants, etc. And every time I wore it with a different piece it made the outfit look super polished and edgy. It was comfy and effortless. Definitely renting again or I will probably buy it.

This arrived wrinkled and kinda stayed that way. The sleeves are definitely too short to wear rolled down. But with the sleeves rolled up, it did fetch many compliments. SO soft. Great way to jazz up a simple outfit.
Wore this beautiful soft to the touch blouse for a lovely afternoon in beautiful downtown San Antonio
Styled it a million different ways, received a ton of compliments. Would 1000% rent again.

I loved this top and wore it multiple times. The material is super soft and buttery, very comfy to wear. It falls perfectly, I found it so flattering and easy to pair with different types of pants. It is a little on the warmer side so keep that in mind, I wore it at a concern and did overheat a little.

links_reviews_title: Luxe take on a structured blouse
links_reviews_text: This faux leather blouse is a perfect transition to fall staple. Blouse is lined with very soft material, making the structured top move nicely with you throughout your wear.

links_reviews_title: Loved the feel, not the fit
links_reviews_text: Soooo soft, would have thought it was the best lamb skin leather. But cut small so didn't end up wearing it. Felt like I'd end up fidgeting all day. Life's too short.

I wore this shirt a couple of times and received many compliments! It is very cute and super soft! If you have a larger bust, I would suggest sizing up. The buttons can be seen if the shirt pulls and does not lay flat.

Beautiful shirt... fit pretty true... may want to size up if you're busty. I'm 36D and I had to wear it unbuttoned at the top with a tank. Another solution might be wearing a minimizing bra instead of the VS Very Sexy bra that I wore with it.

links_reviews_title: This shirt is very cool and edgy without being difficult to wear!
links_reviews_text: It fit perfectly and was soooo soft.
I really like the idea of this top but found it runs small. I'm a M and this was too tight.
Wow. This top is so nice! Great fit, super soft, very stylish. Overall loved the top and I will certainly rent again. Thanks RTR!
Multi functional and luxurious top!

I was really looking forward to wearing this top, but didn't like the inside of the fabric when it arrived. The fabric seems to be a kind of faux leather with a foam backing. I started to try it on just enough to confirm that I didn't like the way the top was draping or the feel of the fabric. I decided to return it unworn and exchange for another item. I'm not sure of the overall fit because I didn't finish trying it on. I listed 'True to Size' since I am not sure. Given the positive reviews and the way it looks on others I would recommend this top to other women, so long as you are not as particular as I am about fabrics. It looks like a great top. Enjoy!

links_reviews_title: It was a nice dress up and dress down piece
links_reviews_text: Kind of tight. Not really able to tuck it in.

links_reviews_title: I wore this twice and the snaps started to separate on it. Returning as it is unwearable
links_reviews_text: The fit is very boxy, the fabric is light yet windproof. I liked the short and wore it as an outer layer for fall, as well as a shirt for inside too. As mentioned the snaps started to separate and I had to send it back with the parts in a sandwich bag. I would consider buying it one size smaller, if it held up better. Very versatile.

links_reviews_title: Looks very high-end, very fun to wear
links_reviews_text: First the quality of the vegan leather is really excellent. I bought some inexpensive faux leather pants thinking I could wear the two together and the quality difference was too obvious. The inside of the material is attractive and soft feeling, a nice faux suede. I used this as a sort of sweater one day and was able to throw it in my bag and the wrinkles fell out when I hung it up again. Fit was barely too small. If you normally wear a 12 and are busty think about sizing up to XL. I made it work but needed to wear a minimizer bra.
I liked it. It's just not breathable. Probably wouldn't rent again.
Fits great in arms, shoulders, and length. The chest was good and didn't appear to be tight but it opened between the buttons. I'm 32 D.
Feels luxe. Is subtle. Recommend
This dress was great. Top fit well, because it is is stitched together, so no gaping. Flowed great, very comfortable and vibrant color.
This dress is so fun and flirty! I felt great in it! #ootd #reddress
I'm only 5'1 so this dress was too long for me but I wore it on my date anyway. Also would have benefited from a size smaller. Material and print were beautiful.
Shoulders were too big-probably better on someone taller. Top is very fitted. Skirt is below knee length. I had to keep my jacket on because the shoulders kept falling off.

I wore this dress to a women's event and got compliments from the moment I walked through the door. Dress fit nicely but it was a bit snug in the shoulders so I couldn't raise my hands above my shoulders. Beautiful fit. Great dress.
This was a great weekend dress! I paired it with booties and a denim jacket and loved the look.
Very flattering Light weight silky fabric Great for summer warmer temps Came To my knee at 5'6 Very flattering red color Fits true to size One of my favorite dresses
It was a little snug in the shoulders and big in the waist.
I wanted to love this dress, but it was not made for a curvy girl! Bust too small, waist too big. But the print was super cute!
This is a pretty, feminine dress. The arm openings were tight, though -- but it was fine as long as I didn't lift my arms above my shoulders.
I got this for a family vacation. I chased my toddler with ease in the form fitting, flattering dress. I felt effortlessly casual!
Fits a little loose in a very flattering way (slimming); dainty/feminine and bold at the same time. Love this!
I found this to feel a little... stretched out? In how it fit. The waistline fell really low on my torso. It was comfortable and I wore it with a leather jacket and sneakers.
I'm really sad to say this won't work for me. I have a large chest, but not abnormal for a plus size woman, and this flattened my boobs like pancakes. Otherwise a lovely fall dress.

links_reviews_title: Didn't get to wear this because the fit was strange.
links_reviews_text: The sleeves are way too tight. Couldn't lift my arms. Everywhere else fit fine.
Doesnt show cleavage- can wear to work without flashing coworkers. I have tiny shoulders and the neckline was little wide for me- wound up wear a strapless bra. LOVED this dress.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for formal headshots (I don't have the photos yet!) but this dress looked great!
links_reviews_text: Absolutely loved it and want to buy it!
This one is conservative and chic. I loved the color and tie at the top. It definitely runs large. I'm usually a 4 and the 2 fit perfectly (not right at all).
This was a little big. I would have liked it better had I sized down.
Great color and length for a conservative environment. The bow is a great detail to add interest to the dress. A little large in the hip area

Wore to work. Probably would have kept it but the same week I bought a very similar dress that I thought was black and turned out to be this same green (Donna Morgan high neck sheath - check it out)! Fit and deep green color both great, flattering but conservative for work with the high tie neck.
Great dress. Waist was a little large, so I added a belt.
Great fit, I should have wore spanx, but the fit is great. Loved the color!
This dress was a dream! The color, tie detail and length is perfect for a day in the office. One of my favorite rents!
Pretty color and cut, got a lot of compliments. Did think the material was a little cheap feeling and there was no lining to the dress.
Absolutely love this dress. It fit soo well and can go from the office to a party.

links_reviews_title: Pretty color, ok fabric, not lined
links_reviews_text: This dress is a great length and color, good for a more conservative or formal office. Unfortunately, the fabric and design is not forgiving, the dress is not lined. It shows all the bumps and lumps.

Fit was great and the material was comfortable with some stretch. I received the dress with tags on it so I was the first wear. I am only disappointed that the back seam is not reinforced very well. The 4 was not super tight and I was nervous the seam would rip. Otherwise great dress. If it was a sturdier material/better reinforcement of seams I would have purchased it.
This is the perfect every day dress. There is plenty of stretch in the color is lovely

Note to self: always look closely at the pics for puffy shoulders! It's not my thing, but you may like it. This dress arrived new with tags on, the fabric is thinner than expected and is quite polyester-y. I'd say it runs a little big, the midsection is loose but the top section is more fitted and I'm not sure if a smaller size would be too small.

links_reviews_title: Nice for formal work attire, especially when you don't want to wear a suit.
links_reviews_text: Fits comfortably, love the side neck tie. The dark green color is also a nice substitute to the standard black, navy, grey.
This dress makes you look very polished with minimal effort. I will note, I am rather pear shaped and I felt the dress was slighter larger in the hips which was great for me. Thinking of buying this!
Did not fit.
This dress is made for tall persons. The proportions will be off in the torso, waist, bust, and length if you are petite. Dress will be great for tall people.

I loved this dress and got many compliments all day. The color is just lovely, and the length is perfect-- feels really 50s/60s throwback and elegant. I will say the waist was a little big; I probably could have sized down to a 2, but I wasn't sure how fitted that would be.

I rented this for a conference but didn't end up wearing it. The fit was comfortable and had a 40s era vibe that I didn't expect. It was heavy and felt good quality, the style just didn't match my personal style.

This dress was great. I felt classy and professional while also feeling stylish and a little bit sexy. It was not too tight around the hips which is something I have to watch out for with dresses. This helped with the dress staying professional. Sometimes I avoid dresses with a tie at the neck because I don't know how to tie fancy bows but this one was super easy to just do one tie and call it a day. Highly recommend. I'll rent this lil number again for sure.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for work happy hour/networking events
links_reviews_text: Loved the color, fit was ok. Neck rubbed a little bit but loved the high neck with the tie.
tight in the shoulders, loose in the waist and hips
I'm a lawyer working at a courthouse and this dress was perfect for having the right amount of class and style for an attorney.
Very comfortable and professional for work. Stretchy material but not too tight on the curves.
Looks so good that a coworker went online and ordered one in her size immediately.
Beautiful dress for work, great length and overall fit. Will definitely rent again!
It fit perfect.
This dress had a nice vintage look and was extremely comfortable. Length was good even when sitting down. I wore it several times to work.
Love this look for work. Such a flattering color and shape

links_reviews_title: Great modest option for a company party
links_reviews_text: Form fitting but modest and comfortable, this was a great option for my company's holiday party. Fits true to size.

Oh my! This dress is perfection. It's longish in a Mad Men kind of way, the bow at the neck makes it so festive, and fit like a glove. This was a replacement dress and I could not have been happier with it. Thanks RTR for saving the day!! Definitely would recommend this dress for hour-glass figured gals!
Perfect dress for a client presentation I had!
Great fit and very professional
Material shows underwear lines but other than that is a very nice dress. The keyhole front with neck tie is an awesome combo.
beautiful design, but runs big. looked a little sloppy.

links_reviews_title: was able to go through an entire work day and feel confident
links_reviews_text: dress fit well and looked elegant, wasn't too clingy anywhere and the dark green was a nice subtle color for a work function.

links_reviews_title: Great for a night out with the husband!
links_reviews_text: Great fit. I normally wear a six but went up a size. Wonderful dress and great fit.

Maybe it's me but I have to size way down in Donna Morgan dresses. I got a 2 (normally 4 or 6) and it was still a little large in the waist but fit well enough to wear to work. Very comfy dress and loved color on the plus side
the perfect holiday sweater with a subtle touch of red tread running through. flared in the back for a cute skirted feel. cozy and warm, easy to wear.
Not itchy, great fit! The neck is a bit small though.

Received so many compliments on my unique sweater for a Texas A&M tailgate. Only con might be how wide the sweater flares at the bottom, definitely wasn't the most slimming thing I've ever worn. But even with that, loved wearing it
It kind of "capes" out in the back, makes the fit feel very large. It's interesting and well made. Not sure that I've styled it correctly.
Loved this sweater! Kept me warm on a vacation upstate and wore it again to work upon returning. Very comfy and true to size. Would definitely recommend.
I call this my "baseball" sweater. Love love love! My favorite rental from here ever

this sweater is so cute....I received many compliments. to note: the sweater has more material through the waist than you see in the photos - almost like a swing style, so that was surprising. And the length on the model is longer than in real life. However! this sweater is so cute and the fabric so soft! and the detailed stitching is perfection!

links_reviews_title: Cute design but fit is weird
links_reviews_text: Cropped and wide so very boxy. Does not look like pictures at all fit
Pretty sweater. I probably could have ordered a small, but because the sweater has a "capey" fit, you couldn't tell it was too big. Great for a Friendsgiving and other holiday celebrations!

This was not a flattering piece. It has a lot of material and the waist is flared which was not slimming. That being said, I think if you are tall and thin, it would probably look great (5'6" or taller).
This denim is stretchy but still thick and wonderful. I am definitely a fan of this brand. They do stretch through the day and I would definitely go down a size. For short girls, these are perfect.

Loving this brand! So far I have liked every pair of DL jeans I've rented and these are no exception. The fringe hem on the jeans was the perfect pair to a sequins mock turtleneck for a chic dressed-down holiday look. L. O. T. S. of compliments!
Odd length and weird fit at knee. Almost too stretchy? Overall comfortable and pretty cute, just wouldn't order again.

links_reviews_title: Too short for tall girls, beware!
links_reviews_text: I got these in the mail and loved them but they were WAY too short for my 5'8" height. They would probably work for ladies that are more petite that have a hard time finding cropped pants.
I wasn't in the market for jeans but these were such a great fit and so comfortable (just the right amount of stretch!) that I bought them. Love the hem, particularly because they need no hem.
My daughter wore these and loved them.
Nice lightweight material! The writing is super cool and I got a lot of compliments on this. Also put on some red blue light glasses at work. The shoes were also a fun touch!

The medium fit perfectly IMO. Not tight anywhere. It's a thin sweater yet still warm yet not too warm. Pair this with a cute pair of jeans and you're good to go just about anywhere! Definitely looks expensive and unique.

This sweater has really good quality. I got it with the tags on though, the material is thin but warm. This sweater is the definition of why I have rent the runway. I love it but wouldn't purchase it myself.
Loved the feel of this sweater and the unique details. It was nice and lightweight to be able to tuck in and wear a jacket comfortably over the top.

links_reviews_title: Got tons of compliments on this sweater. Wore during my Zoom Calls.
links_reviews_text: A little big
Only con A bit thin material

Color is off-white/winter white and the lettering is tangerine orange. Not white with red lettering. Fit is true to size. I should have ordered the small, not the medium (usually I'm a 4) but was worried about too tight for a 32F bust. The small would have fit. Really charming and easy to wear. Lovely light weight, a bit sheer, but soft and comfy. Winner!
Fit was perfect. It is a bit sheer so a nude bra is recommended. I wore it with a pair of high waisted COH Rocket jeans, black velvet ankle boots, gold men's style watch and gold hoops.

I loved this top so much! I wore it under a blazer for work and got so many compliments. It's such a comfy piece to wear, and it's not thick at all so it's great for layering. I went a size up to be comfortable, if you're looking for it to be fitted - rent your true size!
Wore this for professional photos and it popped!! Gorgeous color, luxurious fabric. Weird ties at the wrist, but I tucked them. Stunning blouse.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful and a color I haven't worn before.

links_reviews_text: Runs true to size with a side zipper. Ruching is very flattery. It is a wrap wrong but I didn't need to pin it as it laid flat on my chest
Great jewel tone. Comfortable silky fabric. Flattering foe wrap style. A bit low cut but I paired it with a cami and wore it to work.
Great material, color, and cut. I didn't worry about it gapping at the bust at all.

links_reviews_title: I felt so confident in this piece
links_reviews_text: This was an absolutely flattering piece- so many ways to style! I would rent again.

This was rated by many as runs large. I did not have to zip the side zipper and it felt strange to be there. With my large breast it fit very well but still used a fashion tape piece to keep the overlapping fabric from opening up and showing all! I got it as the color is great for me with green eyes and red hair! I wore a dress in this color from RTR and someone commented I should always wear this color. I rented this shirt with this in mind. I'd buy it if it was not so ridiculously expensive.
Loved the color, fabric, fit (didn't need to pin). Perfect with jeans for date night. Easy.

I loved this top. The only thing that made it a little frustrating was the strings on the sleeves making washing hands, etc a little frustrating but otherwise I loved this top. Will definitely be on my list to rent again.
Beautiful blouse.
Gorgeous top. I am between a 8-12 depending on the brand and this top fit me perfectly in a L. It was loose enough for the draping to fall beautifully but tight enough to flatter my figure.

links_reviews_title: Not that flattering if you have any stomach
links_reviews_text: The fit was decent except in the stomach. The one side hiked up pretty high. Not good for an apple/pear shaped body.
Love the design and feel of the shirt. Ended up being too large for me though. Will rent again in a smaller size for a more formal party.
Form-fitting while still being comfortable. Light and airy fabric. The neckline runs a bit low.
Absolutely beautiful but the fiancé immediately knew that it was not polyester and not silk. Could not wear as it arrived with tons of wrinkles.
This shirt is so beautiful and eye-catching. I received many compliments on it! The quality of the fabric is silky smooth and excellent! Beautiful blouse

links_reviews_title: Beautiful shirt, but way too big
links_reviews_text: It's So pretty, but the fit was terrible. It was huge. Usually silk/satin type clothes run small, but this was giant. I couldn't make it ok just to be able to say I wore it. It's beautiful, but definitely go down a size!
Love the festive cut and color. Only problem was the wrap over top didn't want to stay in place.
I loved the color and the material was thick and felt nice but it was absolutely huge on me. I ordered a 14 and probably needed a 10 instead.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for birthday lunch with friends.
links_reviews_text: It "fit", but would have liked slightly looser/longer fit. The ruched waist is flattering and color so rich and pretty. The strings on the wrists were slightly annoying when dressing, but finally double tied and was fine. Neckline came open fairly easily, so have to watch posture or use tape. Got several compliments.
The shirt is a beauty .... I love the over all look of the shirt from the color to the way it just feel on the body... it do run big so be mindful of that
I think RTR sent me a size that was about 15 sizes too big for me. Would have been nice if it was in my size though.
Fit great

links_reviews_title: The plus-size version of this blouse is HUGE in the bust, so not at all work appropriate.
links_reviews_text: The wrap on this is a disaster for pear-shaped women. Full boob exposure while being tight on the hips. Sleeves were gigantic, so overall this is probably a better blouse for someone with a very proportional shape.

links_reviews_title: Loved the look on the app but didn't fit well
links_reviews_text: This was just ok, ended up not wearing it as it fit me weird. I didn't think it was especially flattering.

links_reviews_title: Nice fabric and color, but not so flattering to wear
links_reviews_text: Runs very large. The tag stuck out in the back and because of the (weird!) way it is attached it will constantly come back out. The cut is pretty, but overall to "fluffy" and loose, it would look better to hug the body and curves a bit more. I felt it was boxy on me and not flattering. I rented xs, which is my usual size. If you can size down definitely do so, it might look much better.
This shirt made me feel amazing - super silky, yes, lots of material but it draped in the right areas. I could have sized down but I did like the length on this size so I kept it. Beautiful top!!

links_reviews_title: Loved the color and the cut, was a bit low but sat wonderfully. Had a hard time deciding tuck or not
links_reviews_text: Slightly on the larger side, flare on the hips. The ties at the end of the sleeves got in the way a little bit but were fun to play with. The color is certainly a show stopper got so many complements. Wish I could afford to buy this!

It was a beautiful fabric and color, but it shifted constantly. I was adjusting it all night. I thought it might be just my body type - it sort of rose up to settle around my waist and pool there, then that caused the wrap front to be loose and shift around. Might work better on a smaller bust.
Felt small. Did not come down to my waist on one side. Would have seen my stomach at work. It's pretty in the pictures but not as flattering on.

I could not wear this because it was gigantic. For comparison, the badgley mischka blouse in XXL fit me very well. However, this emerald green blouse is gorgeous, and I will try it again in a different size.

links_reviews_title: Disappointed in size but color and material were gorgeous
links_reviews_text: Too big and baggy

I was unsure how this would fit and sized up - big mistake. I still wore the shirt, which runs quite large, because it's gorgeous. The color is a dream. The details, like the side zipper are impeccable. The fabric is luxe. I honestly felt like a million bucks wearing this. It also hang well in the front so no bra slips!! I can't wait to reorder in s smaller size.

I love the details on this blouse at the sleeves and the side ruching. I think it would work best for a full bust, otherwise the amount of fabric feels and looks overwhelming. I love the longer length on the backside of it too.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous but comes open at front
links_reviews_text: This shirt is so beautiful! My only complaint is that it comes open at the front often so you may need to tape it down or wear a cami under.

Much more emerald green than it appeared online. Great quality silk charmeuse with interesting gathering on the sleeves. The fit is perfect and good with straight jean to balance the volume of the top.
This skirt is so comfortable! It's basically a sweater. I could've probably gone down to a medium but this is a good fit too. Longer than expected on the left side, so heels were necessary.

links_reviews_title: Runs a hair small, size up if you have hips
links_reviews_text: Perfect for 55 degree weather. A sweater for my legs! Almost hit the ground in my height so wear heels if you are short!
I love the fit, the cut out and the material, but - most of all - I love the gigantic pocket! Looks great paired with different tops.

links_reviews_title: Fun (but not the easiest) to style!
links_reviews_text: Had a ton of fun with this skirt and got a lot of compliments! Tried it one day with chunky Fila's and a boxy white cropped tee and then another day as pictured with a black boxy sweatshirt and booties. Pencil skirts are generally not my jam, but the architectural interest of this skirt was a fun challenge. I opted to size up and wore it in a L. It's stretchy and super thick as others mentioned. Fun statement piece, for sure!

super comfortable meets stylish and put-together. high-waist fit pairs perfectly with this jill jill stuart cropped faux-wrap blouse. top-quality sweater material has a great weight to it and a slight stretch.
Rented this for work, and it was easy & comfortable, but had that special something to make it stand out. Would rent again.
The most amazing rental- fit in all the right places. If you're in between sizes- go up just in case. The material can be pretty snug

I would say fit is tts or a bit small. The medium fit great and I'm a 6/8 bottom. Love the thick sweater material and surprisingly used the single pocket much more than I though. Not super flattering if you're an apple shape, but I didn't mind it for 1 wear.

This skirt is great, warm and flattering. Wore it wine tasting so it was nice when it started getting chillier at night. It is extremely heavy though so not very good if you had to take it in your weighed suitcase on a plane. It was fine for me though because we drove (it really is that heavy)
About 5" longer than expected, but it was fine. Very comfortable! I would size down next time personally.
I am obsessed with this set. Fit super well. So soft and cozy and random and stylish. Yessssss!!!!
didnt love this. weird fit. not flattering

Love this skirt. I wore it to work and I'm planning to wear it to a dinner with friends. Super versatile, can be dressed up or down, and comfortable. Also flattering and interesting looking. I got a ton of complements.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a chilly casual day!
links_reviews_text: Rented this with the matching sweater. The skirt was a comfy twist on a modern cut, plus the thick fabric kept me warm on a chilly day. The pocket is great for a phone and ID! Definitely would recommend. Big booty girls beware!

links_reviews_title: All the compliments I received on my skirt!
links_reviews_text: It's a sweater skirt, which is so unique. But navy, which makes it versatile. So comfortable and chic.

links_reviews_title: Feels like a sweater for your legs
links_reviews_text: Loved this skirt! Got so many compliments. It was so comfortable and felt like I was wearing a sweater on my legs. Would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Wore about 4 to 5 different times. Very versatile, stylish, and comfortable
links_reviews_text: Loved this one!!

Such a cool modern skirt but nothing looked quite right with it. Ended up going with a light wash denim button down, which worked ok. A bodysuit or cropped at just the right length top may have worked better.
Interesting skirt. Substantial weight, would be perfect for fall. Did not wear as didn't flatter my figure, but wish it had. This could be a stunner.
I wore this to work functions. It was just the right amount of uniqueness. It fit perfectly
Warm and chic style.
Was a little small but overall chic and comfy!
Loved this skirt! Thick warm material, nice slit and pocket detail. Wish it was a LITTLE tighter in the waist but it's cute! Would rent again.

This skirt is great. It's fitted around the waist and hips and so doesn't look baggy despite the thick knit material (which is nice and warm for the fall/winter). Really, if you're on the fence, get it. I wore it to Thanksgiving dinner and got tons of compliments. Wanted to keep it for a while to wear more, but also wanted more variety for the winter holidays, so I will just have to get it again!

Wore the full set and received so many compliments. I am 5'3" and the skit was a little long on one side but worked with heeled booties. Note: the sweater is very cropped but works with the high waited skirt

Feels like having a blanket on your lap and around your legs. It's a heavier fabric and great with tights in winter temps. I had to side up to a L based on availability. I had to roll it down once for a better fit but it stayed put. Would order again but in M.
Wore this to work function, looked great and professional but was comfortable as well.

links_reviews_title: Loved this skirt! Did not like it out of the bag and so glad I gave it a chance! So flattering.
links_reviews_text: Loved this skirt- so flattering! Looks beautiful with white or cream. Give it a chance! So much better on your bod! Also love how comfortable it is... best!!

links_reviews_title: I wore this for as a casual option to wear to work.
links_reviews_text: i love how warm and flattering this skirt was. It's difficult for me to find a sweater/knit skirt that is forgiving on the body (no lumps or bumps could be seen). this skirt was super comfortable and perfect for work. i paired with a tee and white sneakers for a casual look, and dressed it up with heels and mockneck for work.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous skirt, nice material, unique and versatile cut
links_reviews_text: Disclaimer: I am eight months pregnant. However, I want to purchase this skirt to have forever because it's awesome. Really cool silhouette that worked well with everything from a t-shirt and flats to a blouse and tall boots. Extremely comfortable, plus actually provided support for my big belly. It would look great if you weren't pregnant, and was great for late third trimester. color is awesome too.
I loved this skirt so much. It so comfortable. Thick/Heavy material makes it great for cold weather.
So soft. Super flattering with the matching sweater.

The skirt is amazing for this confusing weather that we're having this September, it's a thick sweater material and is warm but the slit at the bottom means that the skirt isn't too heavy or hot. I feel like this skirt would look amazing on anyone of any shape. I wore this on a day off with a tshirt tucked in and I wore this to work with a nice blouse. Thick fabric = no lines from tucking in a shirt. I will keep this in my regular rotation until spring! 5'3.5, long but not too long at all.
The small was too big and shapeless. I like the zebra pattern and length but the cut is unflattering.
This was a true fit for the size. It was fun and still dressy enough for work.
The waist was a little too big, but otherwise the fit was great. It was warm and comfortable. Very easy to wear. I really like the pockets too.

links_reviews_title: Great warm work dress that doesn't button gape!
links_reviews_text: I'm always pretty impressed when a button-down dress or shirt doesn't gape at the buttons around my bust. Be prepared to steam some of the wrinkles out around the skirt. The sleeves also run short and I'm average height. Overall, very warm, great fit, and the corduroy is so fine it almost has a slight velvety texture. I wore with black suede booties and black opaque tights.
This dress was a good twist on a basic but it is stiff (nature of the material). The skirt of the dress is bigger and less flowy BUT having said that, it was still super comfortable and easy to wear.

I really wanted to like this dress. I love all things navy. But it was a tad too short for my body type. It just looked weird on me. It is also very stiff. Not sure how comfortable I would have been in it. It was not flattering on me at all. I ended up not wearing it.

Rented this for family pictures. It's a very small corduroy fabric best suited for fall/winter. I felt the arms were a tad short but didn't show too much. The A Line fit was very flattering and feminine. Very high quality as well.

Tight to snug, stiff heavy fabric. This was just ok even though I wanted to love it because it had pockets and was tailored well. It just didn't have any movement to it. Wore twice to work. Maybe better for fall than spring.

This dress is a nice, sturdy fabric, and unlike most shirt dresses, the buttons didn't gap around my large chest. However, because the corduroy fabric is so stiff, the dress had weird, unflattering look overall. The sleeves were too short, and the skirt stuck out in stiff way.

This dress was cute for an everyday work dress. I am pear-shaped and typically a size 10. The size 12 fit me well in the bust (34DD), but I found the waist / hips a little generous which is unusual for me. Overall, I liked it.
The fabric didn't move at all.
The dress fit well but the pockets made the skirt unflattering.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress. Heavy weight is good for winter.
links_reviews_text: So flattering.

The fabric of this dress is super structured and soft making it hold the A line silhouette. It's length and neck line is great for work. Draper James fits true to size for me s/4 - 136lb 5'2- however I can't help but to think their fit is for large busted women. It was as though the waistline was too low on me (34A) or there was excess fabric in the torso/ chest area. I rented this and another Draper James dress and felt the same way.

Beautiful dress I had lots of compliments from the color to the fabric to just the overall dress being adorable. There's a bit of a stretch to the dress which is great especially because it is fitted around the waist- when I received it it did not come with the belt though so I'm not sure how it would have looked with that on.

This purse is adorable! I rented it for my honeymoon in Portugal and Spain and it was the perfect size. I was able to fit a small wallet, hand sanitizer, phone, and lipstick. The only con is that the top is a drawstring not a zipper.
This was the perfect bag for vacation. It fit what I needed and I loved the adjustable cross body strap option
The quality was close to brand new, I was impressed. My first purse rental from RTR -- will re rent!!
Fun fabric and fun jumpsuit. Long enough for my long torso, loose in hips and legs, the tie on top allowed me to tighten up the top. Adjustable straps and pockets- yay! I'll rent again!
Rented this for a trip to South Africa and it was perfect! Wore a few times throughout the trip, super comfy and great for summer.

Overall, I enjoyed this jumper. It was comfy and cute. I wore this around on Halloween day and it was fun since the material has little black cats on it. I live in a warmer climate so was able to pair it with and without a sweater with black booties. Cons: The fit on this was not perfect. The chest area was weirdly placed despite having adjustable straps (which was a definite bonus!).
Brought to Hawaii. Loved this! Very comfortable. Light and breezy, very cute. Kinda hard to zip myself. Wore a strapless bra.

This jumper is such a cute RTR find. Super comfortable due to the smocking on the sides. Im tall and it fits me great in the length. It has adjustable straps and and a cute tie front. The pattern is of large cats/Panthers. Looks very High end and great quality!

links_reviews_title: Love it, more like this RTR!
links_reviews_text: Well the print is phenomenal as well as the fabric. It's comfortable while still being dressy. Will rent this again! I want more prints like this in my life- less floral more jungle.
The fit is supposed to be flowy, but I would recommend sizing down so you don't loose a lot of shape.
Really comfortable, super versatile, great rental.

I never considered myself a jumpsuit person and always felt strange in them, but this one was beautiful and fit perfectly. The print is fun and the cut was sexy and comfortable. I wore it to a concert and danced all night. Would have loved to buy it. Will definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Comfortable, light and airy fabric.. just Not my style
links_reviews_text: Cute romper. Very comfortable.. light airy fabric. Just not really my style

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a Palm Springs getaway!
links_reviews_text: Great fit, super comfortable and lightweight. I'm 5'3 and length was good. Loved the print!

This jumper is so very cute. I wore it three times because I loved it so much. It did run a little big, and it got even bigger as I wore it. Very comfortable and the pattern is adorable. I would definitely rent this again, and may have even bought it if it wasn't so expensive.

Absolutely loved everything about this! The pattern, the fit, the pockets, the fabric. I originally rented it to wear on a casual day while traveling for a wedding, but ended up wearing it to the actual wedding. I was worried it was too casual, but it was perfect and I got so many compliments. Straps are adjustable, so that wasn't an issue.

The picture doesn't do it justice! This jumpsuit was extremely comfortable and flattering and the elephants made for a cute print. I wore it multiple times and strongly considered buying it. It would be even more flattering on a slightly larger bust.

So I read the reviews and it said this ran large so I tested my luck and it fit! I wore it to Coachella and successfully did not have to use the potter potty in a romper! No but seriously this romper is cute, comfy and flattering. I will be renting again!

I rented this for a vacation to Cuba and loved this piece. It was super comfortable and kept my relatively cool. I have a slightly long torso and was happy it didn't ride up at all. I wore it without a bra, as well. Would rent again.

This jumpsuit was great for a vacation down to Florida. I wore it with sneakers and a jean jacket to travel, and then could also dress it up with wedges to wear out in the evening. Fit true to size. I have a smaller bust and didn't wear a bra; the jumpsuit might be more challenging for girls with larger chests. Super comfortable jumpsuit. Overall would definitely rent again.

Great option for tropical vacation. Can wear during the day and be dressed up for night. Thin material so it doesn't get too hot yet not see through. The shoulder straps and the bust ties are adjustable. The cat print is fun too.

Flattering, colorful, and playful. The straps are adjustable which is great. I wore a regular strapless bra. For busty gals, the "cups" of the breast part of the jumpsuit will be too small but the material is forgiving and the pattern makes it hard to see the seams (you can see this if you zoom in on the chest in my photo). The back is smocked so it has a lot of give. Didn't really wrinkle and was pretty and flowy all evening. Accentuated my waist. Husband loved it.
More yellow than green but awesome print, cute comfy sexy

i liked this jumpsuit but it wasn't as high of quality as i had expected it to be based on the retail value. the print is super fun and the fit is true to size, i am an 8 and the 10 ran slightly big. wore it out to dinner with heels and a leather jacket and was pleased overall!
This jumpsuit was so cute and flattering. I wore it with wedges for a night out but would work for day time too. I usually wear a 4 or 6 and went with the 4.

links_reviews_title: Love it, wish it wasn't so pricey
links_reviews_text: So fun, so flattering, so comfortable, so soft ... so crazy expensive!

It's rare I find a jumpsuit I like, and this I loved! It fit great, was able to wear it without a bra. the adjustable straps really help to adjust for your height, I was able to lengthen them to avoid a camel toe and it still wasn't too low cut. It was super comfortable and a fun pattern and color outside of my normal go to outfits. Got lots of compliments.

Did you ever wear something unflattering because it was just so darn cute? That's this jumpsuit. It made my bum look absolutely enormous but it has polka-dot panthers on it so...it evens out? It's a very comfortable and casual fabric and the print is beyond adorable. I wouldn't want to own it because it really doesn't suit my body shape, but it's the perfect rental! Would love to see more fun prints like this.

i loved this romper! no need to wear a bra if you are small chested like me. originally rented for vacation, but i ended up wearing it in the airport on the way home bc it was that comfortable. This romper has the ability to dress up or down. I wore with sandals and a simple jean jacket but could easily dress up with wedges for a wedding. oh and did i mention it has pockets?!

links_reviews_title: Cute but too large, going to size down!
links_reviews_text: I rented this to bring to Costa Rica, but it's too large on me. I love it, however, so I'm going to try a size down!!
Loved this. Wore it for a party in SouthAm, it was HOT weather but I felt great. I liked the fabric and how original it is with the little tigers. Also, it feels soft and fresh.

It is hard for me to find jumpsuits that fit properly because I have a really long torso, but this one was great! No fear of camel toe! I loved wearing it with red heels to dress it up in the evening, and white sneakers during the day for more casual wear. The print is very unique and fun.
Love the pattern and flow of the jumpsuit but the bow tie is awkward.
kind of big looking

links_reviews_title: When else can you wear an expensive cat romper?!
links_reviews_text: Unfortunately my normal size (4) wasn't available but I made the 6 work. Super comfy but does wrinkle easily. Would rent again.
perfect
I went to keep this jumpsuit forever! I love it!

links_reviews_title: was a great romper for Sunday bbq
links_reviews_text: It fit well and was a nice fabric.
This has to be one of my favorite rentals. Absolutely stunning! Can dress up with heels and cute earrings or dress down with sandals. Got so many compliments! Very comfortable and has pockets!
Fit is amazing even for a shorty like me! Highly recommend!
I got so many compliments on this jumpsuit. It fit perfectly and look great and was comfortable.
Perfect for everyday or for a night out with heels! Comfortable and fits true to size. A must rent item!
Great for summer time.. works for tall girls too which is always hard to find. Love love love!
Cute, everyday shirt. Comfortable fit and a cute neck/sleeve flutter detail.

This top is lovely. The fabric is perfect for a hot muggy day since it's a super light and airy linen-like fabric. The material felt very high quality - it didn't feel cheap. The fit in the chest runs on the ever-so-slightly small side, so while the 6 worked fine and I loved wearing it, I'd try for an 8 the next time since it's meant to be an easy breezy fit. The length hit just at or slightly-above the hip (and I have a short torso); this made it feel a smidge shorter than I would have preferred in the perfect world. Even so, it's a pretty near perfect shirt that I will def rent again.

Such a classic style from Ulla Johnson. Loved the lightweight fabric (I wore the shirt tucked into high waisted denim and was comfortable!) and pattern, especially paired with the denim from her pre-fall collection. The cap sleeves are also super fun!
Breezy summer shirt for work or casual. It was very loose so not the most flattering, but comfortable yet tied together for hot days. Super easy to wear & style, but I wouldn't buy it.
Just ok, not something I would rent again
I'm normally between size 8&10. The 10 was actually a little right across the bust. Liked the fabric and cut.
The top was cute, but it kept ridding up because of my large chest.
Fun to wear and got several compliments

links_reviews_title: Very cute! Size up if have larger chest.
links_reviews_text: Very cute! I typically wear a 6 and had to size up to a 10 due to the chest being tight. I am a 34D so I’m sure it’d be fine in regular size for smaller chested women. I wore with white jeans and flats. Would rent again.
Love Ulla! Wore this w dark denim, also white denim. Stylish and comfortable.

The top is true to size and the arm openings didn't reveal your bra. However the size 10 which fit me fine had a button on the neck that was barely hanging on. Therefore, I opted for the looser fit of the 12 since the button was more intact. Lovely top and would rent again.
Great with white jeans. Elegant and effortless. Runs slightly on small side but 6 was generally true to size.
Super cute top...perfect with black pants for work, white jeans in the summer! Want to buy! It is a little short so wore with high waisted jeans.
Super versatile, can be dressed up or down and fit is great. Beautiful colors.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for my floral themed bachelorette party!
Even though I loved it, looking back at photos, it wasn't that flattering... :(
links_reviews_text: More than just your basic wrap dress. Gorgeous puff sleeve, funky 70s inspired print. Perfect for a warm day exploring on vacation. Maybe not as flattering as I thought when I saw photos, maybe too much fullness and not enough waist shape
Perfect warm weather vacation dress. So comfy and fun, and nice cinch at the waist. Good for curvy women and as a short person the length of this worked
spring transition perfected: midi-length plus sleeves with volume for the right mix of coverage. add a chunky cardigan or jean jacket on cooler days. adjustable wrap-closure for personalized fit.
A perfect summer dress with poof sleeves. Incredibly flattering and the fabric is cotton and light weight
I thought I might be underwhelmed by this, but no! Very cute, perfect for vacation.
This dress is made of the lightest, most breathable cotton! So perfect for exploring a new city!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful breezy dress for a daytime event!
links_reviews_text: This was my backup dress and it was gorgeous, however, I didn't have the chance to wear it as the Rhode Resort Ella dress fit a little better for my daytime party event. The reason for the review is I didn't see anyone mention the bust size. I have a shorter torso, with a larger chest, and I *barely* fit in the size small, and would have had to use a safety pin to not have it show a ton of cleavage. Even then, it was tight. I would have sized up to a medium if I was to want to comfortably wear this dress. If you have a larger chest, size up. It was such a pretty print, but suggested a slight formality with the length of the dress and sleeves so I chose another dress by the same brand. Overall a beautiful dress, but unless you're rail thin with a small chest, be careful with sizing.

Loved renting this dress. Wore it on a friend date, and also to work. The pattern is lovely and the fabric lightweight and perfect for summer or a tropical vacation. Only downside is that it's a true wrap dress, and sometimes flies open unexpectedly when walking. Other than that, lovey lovey dress!

links_reviews_title: Pretty but more casual than expected
links_reviews_text: Rented for a rehearsal dinner but ended up wearing for casual wedding event the previous evening. Lots of compliments on the print. Dress was a bit large in the chest (I am an A Cup) and the sleeves but because it wraps you can make it work. Very lightweight material and great for end summer!

Super special dress! I wore this dress on multiple occasions the first of which ended up being the best. "Why don't you wear the one you got from RTW?" he casually suggested. I got ready for what I thought was going to be dinner with friends and ended up being the night he proposed!! I took this dress with me on vacation the following week and didn't want to take it off. So many compliments!
Feminine, on trend and great for a hot Summer day.

When I rented this dress I was concerned about the puffy sleeves making me look like a linebacker but that totally wasn't the case. The fabric is super light weight and breathable. The waist wraps making it suitable for for many. The print reminded me of that chic Italian brand "La DoubleJ"
I wore this 7 months pregnant! Def a good option for maternity.
Such a flattering dress and so comfortable! Great for a wedding. Lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: The fabric is very see thru and if you have a bust, it would never close, unless you want them out.
links_reviews_text: cheap fabric not flattering if you have a bust!
the fit is great and flattering on this dress
So cute! The sleeves aren't as huge as the picture. Only thing I didn't love- when it was windy, the dress completely blows open. But definitely rent again.
Soft fabric makes it a great pick for lounging at home or running errands on the weekend.

Nothing too special but I liked this one. It's super comfortable and easy to throw on. It's cropped but not too short. It's slouchy but wasn't too boxy, thought I don't think it was especially flattering.
It fits great in every aspect but the length. I had to wear a tank top underneath otherwise my stomach would have shown consistently. It was so comfortable and cute though!
This top was comfy and fine. Nothing in particular stands out. The sleeves were a little long.
Modern take on the classic Breton top. Extremely soft cotton with a good amount of stretch. Its slightly cropped in the front. Super cute and comfortable to wear. 💛
Soft material, flattering fit (not too boxy), slightly on the short side. A cute top for everyday.

links_reviews_title: The perfect lounge or running errands top... or throw it on after a yoga class!
links_reviews_text: Super soft. Cozy. Loose fit. Wore it with gray jeans and black yoga pants.
It's very cute but I took off one star because it's cropped and I didn't like that length
This is my second time renting this too. I love it! I got so many compliments. I'm considering buying. Rent it!

links_reviews_title: Stunning blouse for everyday, or dresses up for an evening out
links_reviews_text: Colorful thick crisp material which stays fresh after several wears; tons and tons of compliments! My husband wants me to purchase this because he likes it so much :D Note, you will need to wear a camisole with this blouse. Also, I'm tall and found the sleeves to be a bit short.
Felt expensive, I loved the color.

Loved this top it has a beautiful pattern, and is great for work, dates, and is very "day to night". I love it! Definitely pretty low cut, so that is something to be aware of. The collar of this top is really unique and chic.

I Was going to say this runs big and is low cut, but then realized I got a large by accident, and not a medium. Whoops! So I guess it runs true to size! The fabric is very pretty on this, and the pattern is very lovely. My two issues - The sleeves do have a lot of puffy presence, and I wish it was a tiny bit longer so it stayed tucked in.

Feels like I could audition for "That 70s Show" in this top, but that's exactly what I love about it. The material is great and the colors are so vibrant! It fits big so I had to layer but still thought it was cute for a day in the city.

Loved this top so much!! Low cute so I had to wear sticky boobs and periodically check to make sure it wasn't gaping open but loved this top. A little on the shorter side but fit perfect with high waisted jeans
Loved this top for all occasions! It's comfortable and flowy, and one of the most beautiful prints I've ever seen! Is a little low cut but I wore a camisole underneath.
Great bright print, flattering cut, fun flowey sleeves. It is a bit low cut. The medium felt a bit large, but I expected that as I am usually a small but that wasn't available.
Very lovely shirt. Great fit, got tons of compliments. Great with jeans or black pants for work.
This top was loose and flattering. It was a little low cut so you needed a camisole underneath. Looked great and got lots of complements.
Such a beautiful silky blouse! It's super v necked so I wore a fitted tee underneath. I loved the pattern and the puffy sleeves. Compliments galore :)
Loved this lightweight shirt - perfect for temperate summer or a warm spring or fall day. Very 70s but works as a daily look. Loved it

This top was a lot of fun to wear. The drape and fabric are great. No wrinkles, even after a day of traveling. I know it's supposed to be loose, but I still think it runs a little big. My only real complaint was when the neckline slipped forward.
Sleeves are wide and long but overall very pretty
Would have preferred if this was made with silk but it's polyester. Also very low cut.
So flattering and unique. I wish I could buy it!

links_reviews_title: I got tons of compliments every time I wore it...to an art opening, dance performances & benefit
links_reviews_text: Colors are beautiful. It's a conversation piece. A little low cut, but not enough to be a problem. My deep plunge bra worked fine. I liked it best when I added a necklace so the open neck wasn't too bare. The puffy sleeves are fun to play with. Would have purchased if it weren't so expensive.
Low cut - size down - volume in sleeves - easy to wear - versatile - dress up or down

This was a fun floral top perfect to welcome spring. I am petite and this was a bit loose for me but maybe that’s the style. I wore this with a blue tank top underneath, black pants, and gray boots. This is great for various occasions. Follow me on Instagram for more: Anisha2Rao
Got so many compliments. The colors are fantastic and fabric super flowy. The neckline is very flattering as well. Will rent again!

links_reviews_title: Great top for work! The fabric isn't super breathable, but it was comfortable.
links_reviews_text: Great fit, a bit low cut, my bra showed a little, but looked like I was wearing a tank top underneath

This fit perfectly and the material was so light and airy. I received multiple compliments wearing it out for a date night. It's a little low cut so you would need to wear a tank top under it for work.
Texture was nice, beautiful detail! Had a rich feel, true to size. Fun sleeve!!
Pretty color and lines. Buttons are tough. Next time I'll just put over my head. I have no boobs and it's a little too low. You can see my bra, but refuse to wear a shirt under. Really comfortable.

links_reviews_title: A statement and an understatement all at once
links_reviews_text: I love this too. Fits true to size, but billowy. I ordered up because the large was out and I was afraid the medium would not flow/billow as much as I wanted. I would recommend ordering true to size or size up for more of a statement. The fabric is beautiful and not thin. #floralflow #roomforboobs
Because I got the recommended large, the chest area dipped way too low. The shoulders and sleeves seemed appropriately sized. The colors and fabric was gorgeous, but I couldn't wear.
So many compliments!

LOVED this top SO much, but wish I would have sized down. It fit perfectly aside from the neckline...I didn't want to wear a cami underneath so I wore a low cut bralette, but felt pretty exposed even though I am small-chested. Still got tons of compliments and had lots of fun wearing it!
I loved this top. It was perfect for an outdoor work event in Florida in February. I did use fashion tap on the neckline so I didn't have to worry about flashing anyone.

links_reviews_title: Wanted to love it and kept it an extra month so I could wear it but felt a bit clown-ish in it.
links_reviews_text: I received several compliments but it was very low cut (below my bra) and the arms were too flouncy IMO.

links_reviews_title: Very deep neckline - too low cut
links_reviews_text: I had been eyeing this for a while. Loved the pattern, fit, and construction. But the neckline is incredibly low cut - like the center of my deep-V bra was still showing. I tried with a cami underneath, but it just didn't look right. Too bad because it looked cute with jeans and booties.
This is a screamingly bright floral but so unique and flowy with soft billowing sleeves. It is low cut so I did need to pin shut at décolletage. Lots of compliments.
You do need a tank or cami
Fit was cute but I got tired of the print fast. That said it fits well and the fabric was nice

Flattering and relaxed fit. A little bit big for my petite frame, so the neckline was low for what I'm comfortable with, but easily fixed with a pin. Drapes so nicely and beautiful print. Great shirt for dressing up a pair of jeans.
A little low cut for everyday...had to put a cami underneath
I would buy this shirt. It was bright and bold. Had great lines. Fit well. Sleeves weren't too pouffy. Many compliments.
Great sleeves ... but I would Have ordered a size smaller (I am usually a 10)
This is probably my favorite rental so far! It does run small so definitely size up.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable! Terrible picture, sorry but the only one I had:)
links_reviews_text: I liked these okay, I felt like they weren't flattering but received multiple compliments. Major pro was the comfort, I rented these to see how this style would look on me. I'm apple shaped and the fit was very loose, probably could have sized down and been okay too. Overall, they encompass the loose wide leg look, which wasn't as bad on me as I thought it would be.

These are definitely comfy as the other reviews say, but I didn't find them to be casual at all. The material is definitely better suited for dress attire and not running errands. I rent the 8R because the 6 was unavailable, but definitely needed to size down to a 6 or maybe even 4. They also run a bit long. They're great quality and heavy fabric.

links_reviews_title: Kicking myself that I didn't buy it
links_reviews_text: Such a classic work pant. It's casual yet classy, and so comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Comfy but still cute with heels
links_reviews_text: I wore the large, but probably could have worn the medium. Would have liked them to stay a little higher on the waist. They are cropped on the model but I'm a shorty so was able to wear them full length with heels. Nice quality. Would rent again.

These are great pants. They fit really well and I was comfortable all day. They were also the right length on my short frame. I wore them to work but will almost certainly wear them on the weekend too.
Super pilled on the inside of one leg, but not the other?

I am a true 10 and probably could have sized down in these, they felt a little big in the waist and thighs (and I have athletic thighs). I rented these for a weekend in New Orleans in the winter and they were a great weight and versatile. I dressed them up for a benefit dinner w/ a blouse and long white vest and dressed them down with a t-shirt, jean jacket and sneakers for daytime. Would recommend but would perhaps consider sizing down for a more sleek fit.
not very flattering if you have a tummy issue. The fastener in the front of the pants add extra bulk

Fit was easy throughout the waist and hips. The loose fit of the leg is comfortable without being oversized or baggy looking. The length hit in between crop and not, sometimes I felt it looked better on the shorter side and I would use the drawstring to keep it up higher on my waist. The black color was beautiful, the quality was excellent, and it was like new. I wore it on a 15 hour flight as well as in hot weather for work–it was very comfortable and resisted wrinkles.
Probably look cute on tall girls but I'm short and petite and these were not a good look for me
A little boxy and the bottoms were not as skinny as I imagined. For a short curvy frame I don't think I'll be renting these again. They were average

I'm a solid size 8 and these ran very large, I didn't get to wear them because of it. The photos show more of a slim leg but they were much wider on. However, the quality was great, I wish I could have worn them! Size down

These pants are cute but too long for my short legs. I'm 5'4" for reference with a longer torso. They didn't hit the floor when I had them pulled up but they just really hit at an odd length on me. They are gorgeous. I could see them being beautiful on a taller person, I'd recommend sizing down.
These pants were too big and I can be either a 6 or an 8. Not sure if a 4 would've fit. But they were baggier than they looked in the picture so not for me!

Comfortable. They blur the lines between businessy and comfort, so I found them a little hard to style. I think it works best if you wear a tighter fitting, tucked in top. I also found the length to be a little strange on me, sitting somewhere between full length and a crop (I'm 5-2).

links_reviews_title: Such amazing quality and so comfortable for the office!
Super cute and comfortable but too long for short legs
links_reviews_text: Wished these fit me lengthwise as they looked great and we're very comfortable. Not a good look if legs are shorter.

Loved the fabric but they ran a bit large! I am normally a size 27 jean, size 26 once in a blue moon. These fit pretty loose through the leg in the 4R so I will probably try a 2 at some point since the fabric felt really comfy and luxe.

These are great pants for work if you're looking for something that's super comfortable (elastic waistband!) but tailored. I'm 5'3 so I had to roll them up to get the cropped look. There's even a drawstring that can make them a little tighter - so if you need to size up, you can probably still get them to fit your waist.
Don't purchase these for the snake pattern- it's pretty faded.

links_reviews_title: Hugs in all the right places
links_reviews_text: These jeans were so cute and comfortable!! The high rise hit right above my belly button and was not constricting at all. The pockets on the back were very flattering on my behind and the length hit perfectly below my ankle. I would definitely have purchased if the leopard weren't so memorable and they came in a solid color fabric.

The fit of these is perfect for curves. My legs are a bit athletic and it can be tough to find pants that fit my waist and legs. The fact that they button up instead of zip and hit at a perfect part of the waist made them so flattering. The animal print detail is so subtle that at first glance and/or in certain lights they just look black. Once people saw the pattern up close, I got so many compliments. I loved how subtle it was. I'm shorter and they hit me perfectly for short booties.

These pants were comfy and flattering, I'm short and a regular length was perfect for a right at the ankle fit. I love the faint leopard print and the stretch on these! Would buy them if they weren't faded, I might try to find them elsewhere and purchase a new pair.

These fit me like a glove and we're soft and stretchy. I personally like the button fly and the high waist was very flattering without being tight or uncomfortable. I was able to eat a giant burger without the too tight jeans feeling. The print was bolder than I expected from other reviews and they were more grey than black but still fun.

J brand jeans are always my favorite. The high waisted jeans were amazing. I got so many compliments on these. There's a bit of stretch which is nice given the high waisted buttons didn't pull. The length was perfect for a little cropped @ the ankle.

Rented for work bc I thought they were more fun than regular black jeans and they were perfect. I also decided to wear them out at night and they were great for that too. I rented a 29 bc I have another pair of j brands that are a 28 and a little tight, but the 29s were a little loose on me.

links_reviews_title: Cute leopard print. True skinny jeans with stretch.
links_reviews_text: These jeans looked very small on the hanger, but they fit great. They did stretch out after a couple wearings but not too bad. I loved the pattern and am a big fan of J Brand jeans. Would rent again.
I love to wear different prints so these jeans were perfect. Nice subtle print. It's difficult for me to find jeans with stretch that fit just right and these are them. Would recommend
Not too thick, stretchy, true to size.
Love these pants!! I wore them all over Chicago for a weekend trip. Perfect fit. They have a subtle grey animal print which keeps them interesting.

links_reviews_title: Didn't see the animal prints in the picture
links_reviews_text: I have seen the animal prints on these jeans when I rented it. I thought it was just solid dark color. For a stretch skinny pants it's kind of loose and not tight fitting. Also I'm too short to pull off these cropped pants. I ended up not wearing these.

links_reviews_title: Fun but not for tall women
links_reviews_text: These jeans would have been great for a dinner date however, even as a crop jean, they were too short for this 5'11" girl.

Rented for work but only wore after work or on weekends. I wasn't thinking about a button fly - I am in front of teenagers all day and for some reason a button fly get weird. I love these jeans though! Do stretchy and comfy. Go with everything!
I loved that they looked liked jeans but felt like leggings. So comfortable. They kept their form too. Perfect modern print!

links_reviews_title: I LOVE THEM, but size down
links_reviews_text: super cute jeans. couldn't resist wearing them, but they're big. i usually wear a 27 but may get a 25 next time in these
Loved the subtle animal print pattern and buttons on the fly. Super comfortable and got lots of compliments! A fun alternative to an everyday black jean

links_reviews_title: I could live in these jeans and be happy.
links_reviews_text: I almost didn't get these because I thought I needed a size 26, but I'm so glad I tried then out in size 25. They fit wonderfully! Nice thick material with just enough stretch to fit nicely and maintain a great shape.
Wanted to buy these so bad.
Lots of room to bend and stretch in these jeans. Comfortable, but will size down next time.

links_reviews_title: Cute fit, minimal print, perfect for "casual dress down day" at the office. Very thin though!
links_reviews_text: I am 5'5 roughly 120 lbs. I think the pants were cute, but they seemed to be a little worn out and faded. I was worried with the size 25, but followed fellow reviewers and they were actually sort of baggy after a couple of hours. Cute, but not awesome.
Loved these so much I could let them go, so I bought them. Amazing fit - they make your waist look tiny and your booth noice

links_reviews_title: Loved these jeans... So much I purchased them.
links_reviews_text: Great fit, comfortable and a bit of elegant punk - if that's a thing ;)
These are super cute. If they were a bit more in my price range I'd buy them. Very comfy and flattering fit!

For true to size. Had some stretch but didn't stretch out over time. The pattern was subtle and easy to match. Buttons were a cute touch but the covering on them was scraping off so the pants looked somewhat worn even though they were fairly new.
The fit was amazing and stretchy so they were super comfortable. The print is subtle but noticeable so if you don't like animal print don't get these! Wish I could keep!!
Easy and flattering everyday wear.

links_reviews_title: LOVE these jeans! Wish I could keep!!
links_reviews_text: Great, comfortable pair of jeans. Do not stretch too much with wear, great for everyday. Very true to size and are high waisted, which is a bonus for me!
These were fun for a different pair of jeans. I am usually a 24/25 but got the 25. They were a little big on the waist. I would size down if you are in doubt.

links_reviews_title: Wish I felt like I could pull them off...
links_reviews_text: I liked these in theory but I ended up not wearing them. The leopard print looks more subtle in the photo. These fit very well and hugged my curvier figure just right. I just felt like the pattern somehow made me look fuller than I actually am. :(

links_reviews_title: Didn't end up wearing because they felt more like jeggings - very stretchy.

links_reviews_text: If I could afford these jeans they would be in my closet yesterday. In fact I'm tempted to buy them! They fit like a glove, very sexy, great for the curves. They weren't tight or uncomfortable. I wore them with short boots sometimes and sandals other times so they were very versatile. Don't hesitate - these jeans are great!!!

Love these pants! The print is subtle enough I could pair with a blazer for casual Friday, and switch to a leather jacket for a night out. They are so comfortable -- the high waist hits in the perfect spot. Would rent again

Love the subtle leopard print, rise, and button fly. Fit was almost perfect but because there's stretch in these jeans they ended up being big around the booty and waist. I'll definitely rent again, but go down a size.

links_reviews_title: My husband asked where I got these leggings from, they run small!
links_reviews_text: These are super skinny in the leg and run a big snug. I liked the animal print but it was subtle enough. They were comfortable just did not fit my style.
I've had these for a week now, and I'm seriously considering the $200 price tag to make them mine forever. The animal print is subtle, the rise is perfect, the fabric is soft.
This ran a bit big-would order size down. Cute.
Fit was perfect for me.. normally I am a 26 or 27 so I was nervous they might be too small, but worked out well

links_reviews_title: Flattering fit and modern twist on a classic style
links_reviews_text: Color is black w subtle leopard print design. Such a comfortable flattering fit with stretch for curves and flexibility.

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much I bought it!
links_reviews_text: Great price, great fit! Super flattering. A bit short for the tall girls like myself but with tights or leggings it's perfect.
Overall cute and comfortable. Liked the colors and was perfect sweater dress for office.
Wasn't crazy about this one! The neck was a lot of fabric for me!

Really love this one! Color scheme is great and the dress is super comfortable and versatile. I've work with Uggs, ankle boots, knee high boots, and heels. Highly recommend for an easy and chic go-to dress.
I love this dress trendy & classic at the same time!!!
Love this for a more casual day at the office. Works with high or low boots. Lots of stretch. The colors are fresh for winter.
Runs true to size and nice material. This is a good dress for fall.
Got plenty of compliments! It is fitted and the color is great. Recommend shape wear if you are self conscious of your mid section. I wear a size 16 and the XXL was perfect.
The dress is more form fitting and tapered towards the hem than pictured. Still very cute but I wouldn't have picked it knowing how much it hugs the body.

links_reviews_title: Wore it for my YouTube channel
links_reviews_text: Simple, light material, and very true to the pictures. It does have the hips sewed in them but luckily I had enough hips to fill it. I never understand that on stretch material but it is what it is. I like that it matched black as well.
Perfect for fall with tights and OTK boots. Fit well and not too tight
Sweater dress fits perfectly! Fabric is very stretchy, not too heavy, perfect for fall. The colors are fantastic. Great rental!
This is really comfy. The fit is tts and perfect length. I think it's a bit shorter on me with a 5 month baby bump but perfect dress for a shall bump or if size up for a bigger one.

links_reviews_title: This dress was great. Really comfortable and fit well! Very cute!
links_reviews_text: Comfortable fit. Felt great on.
Fit very well and was comfortable. Wore with moto boots
Wore with black leggings and mid-calf boots. Several comments about how nice it looked.
Loved this dress. The colors are great together. The dress hit me mid-thigh and was super comfortable.

I really liked this sweater dress. The material isn't quite form fitting - so this is okay to wear for work. I wore this for an office party with black tights. I'm 5-2 and the dress was a few inches above the knee. The material is a bit thinner than typical sweater dresses so it won't be that forgiving

links_reviews_title: Ok for casual day at the office
links_reviews_text: It was an ok dress, but one I would not have bought had a tried it on at a store ( but was certainly willing to wear on an unlimited membership). It was a little more stretched out than I expected, but like I said ok for a casual day at the office
was a great sweater dress. wore around NYC walking around with tights - a ton of compliments. overall great dress

links_reviews_title: I wore this for my boyfriend's office holiday party and it was perfect.
links_reviews_text: SO flattering on. Paired it with tights and booties. The length of the dress is perfect for any and all winter events.
Excellent dress for work! Was a little big but I liked that look because it feels comfier. Will definitely rent again!
I got lots of compliments. It was easy to pair with tights and a black bootie.
Cute and work-appropriate for fall. The material was a little too thin for me to buy, but definitely a great one-time wear.
Dress was a little short for my height but I wore it with tights and booties and it worked well. Plus is the sleeves were nice and long!

links_reviews_title: Bit short for work and I'm petite
links_reviews_text: I didn't feel comfortable wearing this to work and I am 5'1". Might rent again when it's tights season. Otherwise loved the colors.

links_reviews_title: So unremarkable I don't even have a photo to show for it
links_reviews_text: This dress NEEDS something to go with it. Killer combat boots. Stunning handbag. Gorgeous teddy coat thrown over it. Idk, but it didn't wow me at all just putting it on, and I had intentionally been going for the effortless, simple look. But it was just a little too simple!
I loved this dress, I am usually a 0-2 and got a size small for everyday wear, I might even do an XS next time so it hugs my body a bit more. Beautiful make and perfect length.
Love the fit and ease of this jumpsuit!

The jumpsuit was a little tight in a few places with long pants. It still worked but was a little difficult to get in and out of. I wore it for a volunteering meet and greet and definitely made a good first impression

This one's a real crowd pleaser across a wide spectrum, thanks to its JC Penny 1980 print and bosslady fit. One woman shouted from across the grocery store that she had coral sandals that would match perfectly, another said she used to have similar drapes. So just be ready for that.
Lots of compliments on this one. Very light weight material so it was great for a hot day!

links_reviews_title: An orange jumpsuit that is actually cute.
links_reviews_text: This is a bold look, but I enjoyed wearing it. But just to mention, there are buttons, a hook and a zipper in the way between you and going pee
Comfortable but small in waist and shoulders and a little see through (not bad but can see pockets)

links_reviews_title: Fun Color and Pattern for Summer
links_reviews_text: This was a really fun and light weight jumpsuit for summer. It is see-through so use it as a bathing suit cover up.

This jumpsuit was cute but the fit was a bit off for me. It was looser in the waist and really tight in the arms. I know it's tough to make a garment that fits everywhere but this one was a bit uncomfortable to wear. Since we're in lock down right now I was only able to wear it around the house and it made certain tasks difficult that required me to lift my arms above my head.
Didn’t end up wearing this because you can see your underwear right through it, very see through

links_reviews_title: A tight fit at the tummy
links_reviews_text: Loved the color and fit in the leg area but the hips definitely struggled getting this up. Would recommend getting a size up.
